original: BhP_01.01.001/1 janmādyasya yato 'nvayāditarataścārtheṣvabhijñaḥ svarāṭ
analyzed: janma ādyasya yatas nu ayāt itaratas ca artheṣu abhijñaḥ svarāj

original: BhP_01.01.001/2 tene brahma hṛdā ya ādikavaye muhyanti yat sūrayaḥ
analyzed: tene brahma hṛdā yaḥ ādikavaye muhyanti yat sūrayaḥ

original: BhP_01.01.001/3 tejovārimṛdāṃ yathā vinimayo yatra trisargo 'mṛṣā
analyzed: tejaḥ vāri mṛdām yathā vinimayaḥ yatra trisargaḥ mṛṣā

original: BhP_01.01.001/4 dhāmnā svena sadā nirastakuhakaṃ satyaṃ paraṃ dhīmahi
analyzed: dhāmnā svena sadā nirasta kuhakam satyam param dhīmahi

original: BhP_01.01.002/1 dharmaḥ projjhitakaitavo 'tra paramo nirmatsarāṇāṃ satāṃ
analyzed: dharmaḥ projjhita kaitavaḥ paramaḥ nirmatsarāṇām satām

original: BhP_01.01.002/2 vedyaṃ vāstavam atra vastu śivadaṃ tāpatrayonmūlanam
analyzed: vedyam vāstavam atra vastu śiva dam tāpa traya unmūlanam

original: BhP_01.01.002/3 śrīmadbhāgavate mahāmunikṛte kiṃ vā parairīśvaraḥ
analyzed: śrīmat bhāgavate mahāmuni kṛte kim vā paraiḥ īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_01.01.002/4 sadyo hṛdyavarudhyate 'tra kṛtibhiḥ śuśrūṣubhistatkṣaṇāt
analyzed: sadyas hṛdi avarudhyate kṛtibhiḥ śuśrūṣubhiḥ tad kṣaṇāt

original: BhP_01.01.003/1 nigamakalpatarorgalitaṃ phalaṃ
analyzed: nigama kalpataroḥ galitam phalam

original: BhP_01.01.003/2 śukamukhādamṛtadravasaṃyutam
BhP_01.01.003/3 pibata bhāgavataṃ rasam ālayaṃ
analyzed: pibata bhāgavatam rasam ālayam

original: BhP_01.01.003/4 muhuraho rasikā bhuvi bhāvukāḥ
analyzed: muhur aho rasikāḥ bhuvi bhāvukāḥ

original: BhP_01.01.004/1 naimiṣe 'nimiṣakṣetre īśayaḥ śaunakādayaḥ
analyzed: naimiṣe nimiṣa kṣetre śaunaka ādayaḥ

original: BhP_01.01.004/3 satraṃ svargāya lokāya sahasrasamam āsata
analyzed: satram svargāya lokāya sahasrasamam āsata

original: BhP_01.01.005/1 ta ekadā tu munayaḥ prātarhutahutāgnayaḥ
analyzed: te ekadā tu munayaḥ prātarhuta huta agnayaḥ

original: BhP_01.01.005/3 satkṛtaṃ sūtam āsīnaṃ papracchuridam ādarāt
analyzed: satkṛtam sūtam āsīnam papracchuḥ idam ādarāt

original: BhP_01.01.006/0 ṛṣaya ūcuḥ
analyzed: ṛṣayaḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_01.01.006/1 tvayā khalu purāṇāni setihāsāni cānagha
analyzed: tvayā khalu purāṇāni sa itihāsāni ca anagha

original: BhP_01.01.006/3 ākhyātānyapyadhītāni dharmaśāstrāṇi yānyuta
analyzed: ākhyātāni api adhītāni dharma śāstrāṇi yāni uta

original: BhP_01.01.007/1 yāni vedavidāṃ śreṣṭho bhagavān bādarāyaṇaḥ
analyzed: yāni veda vidām śreṣṭhaḥ bhagavān bādarāyaṇaḥ

original: BhP_01.01.007/3 anye ca munayaḥ sūta parāvaravido viduḥ
analyzed: anye ca munayaḥ sūta parāvara vidaḥ viduḥ

original: BhP_01.01.008/1 vettha tvaṃ saumya tat sarvaṃ tattvatastadanugrahāt
analyzed: vettha tvam saumya tat sarvam tattvataḥ tad anugrahāt

original: BhP_01.01.008/3 brūyuḥ snigdhasya śiṣyasya guravo guhyam apyuta
analyzed: brūyuḥ snigdhasya śiṣyasya guravaḥ guhyam api uta

original: BhP_01.01.009/1 tatra tatrāñjasāyuṣman bhavatā yadviniścitam
analyzed: tatra tatra añjasā āyuṣman bhavatā yat viniścitam

original: BhP_01.01.009/3 puṃsām ekāntataḥ śreyastan naḥ śaṃsitum arhasi
analyzed: puṃsām ekāntataḥ śreyaḥ tat naḥ śaṃsitum arhasi

original: BhP_01.01.010/1 prāyeṇālpāyuṣaḥ sabhya kalāvasmin yuge janāḥ
analyzed: prāyeṇa alpa āyuṣaḥ sabhya kalau asmin yuge janāḥ

original: BhP_01.01.010/3 mandāḥ sumandamatayo mandabhāgyā hyupadrutāḥ
analyzed: mandāḥ su manda matayaḥ mandabhāgyāḥ hi upadrutāḥ

original: BhP_01.01.011/1 bhūrīṇi bhūrikarmāṇi śrotavyāni vibhāgaśaḥ
analyzed: bhūrīṇi bhūri karmāṇi śrotavyāni vibhāgaśaḥ

original: BhP_01.01.011/3 ataḥ sādho 'tra yat sāraṃ samuddhṛtya manīṣayā
analyzed: atas sādho tra yat sāram samuddhṛtya manīṣayā

original: BhP_01.01.011/5 brūhi bhadrāya bhūtānāṃ yenātmā suprasīdati
analyzed: brūhi bhadrāya bhūtānām yena ātmā suprasīdati

original: BhP_01.01.012/1 sūta jānāsi bhadraṃ te bhagavān sātvatāṃ patiḥ
analyzed: sūta jānāsi bhadram te bhagavān sātvatām patiḥ

original: BhP_01.01.012/3 devakyāṃ vasudevasya jāto yasya cikīrṣayā
analyzed: devakyām vasudevasya jātaḥ yasya cikīrṣayā

original: BhP_01.01.013/1 tan naḥ śuṣrūṣamāṇānām arhasyaṅgānuvarṇitum
analyzed: tat naḥ śuṣrūṣamāṇānām arhasi aṅga anuvarṇitum

original: BhP_01.01.013/3 yasyāvatāro bhūtānāṃ kṣemāya ca bhavāya ca
analyzed: yasya avatāraḥ bhūtānām kṣemāya ca bhavāya ca

original: BhP_01.01.014/1 āpannaḥ saṃsṛtiṃ ghorāṃ yannāma vivaśo gṛṇan
analyzed: āpannaḥ saṃsṛtim ghorām yad nāma vivaśaḥ gṛṇan

original: BhP_01.01.014/3 tataḥ sadyo vimucyeta yadbibheti svayaṃ bhayam
analyzed: tatas sadyas vimucyeta yat bibheti svayam bhayam

original: BhP_01.01.015/1 yatpādasaṃśrayāḥ sūta munayaḥ praśamāyanāḥ
analyzed: yad pāda saṃśrayāḥ sūta munayaḥ praśama ayanāḥ

original: BhP_01.01.015/3 sadyaḥ punantyupaspṛṣṭāḥ svardhunyāpo 'nusevayā
analyzed: sadyas punanti upaspṛṣṭāḥ svardhunī apaḥ nu sevayā

original: BhP_01.01.016/1 ko vā bhagavatastasya puṇyaślokeḍyakarmaṇaḥ
analyzed: kaḥ vā bhagavataḥ tasya puṇya śloka īḍya karmaṇaḥ

original: BhP_01.01.016/3 śuddhikāmo na śṛṇuyādyaśaḥ kalimalāpaham
analyzed: śuddhi kāmaḥ na śṛṇuyāt yaśaḥ kali mala apaham

original: BhP_01.01.017/1 tasya karmāṇyudārāṇi parigītāni sūribhiḥ
analyzed: tasya karmāṇi udārāṇi parigītāni sūribhiḥ

original: BhP_01.01.017/3 brūhi naḥ śraddadhānānāṃ līlayā dadhataḥ kalāḥ
analyzed: brūhi naḥ śraddadhānānām līlayā dadhataḥ kalāḥ

original: BhP_01.01.018/1 athākhyāhi harerdhīmann avatārakathāḥ śubhāḥ
analyzed: athā ākhyāhi hareḥ dhīman avatāra kathāḥ śubhāḥ

original: BhP_01.01.018/3 īlā vidadhataḥ svairam īśvarasyātmamāyayā
analyzed: vidadhataḥ svairam īśvarasya ātma māyayā

original: BhP_01.01.019/1 vayaṃ tu na vitṛpyāma uttamaślokavikrame
analyzed: vayam tu na vitṛpyāmaḥ uttama śloka vikrame

original: BhP_01.01.019/3 yacchṛṇvatāṃ rasajñānāṃ svādu svādu pade pade
analyzed: yat śṛṇvatām rasajñānām svādu svādu pade pade

original: BhP_01.01.020/1 kṛtavān kila karmāṇi saha rāmeṇa keśavaḥ
analyzed: kṛtavān kila karmāṇi saha rāmeṇa keśavaḥ

original: BhP_01.01.020/3 atimartyāni bhagavān gūḍhaḥ kapaṭamānuṣaḥ
analyzed: atimartyāni bhagavān gūḍhaḥ kapaṭa mānuṣaḥ

original: BhP_01.01.021/1 kalim āgatam ājñāya kṣetre 'smin vaiṣṇave vayam
analyzed: kalim āgatam ājñāya kṣetre smin vaiṣṇave vayam

original: BhP_01.01.021/3 āsīnā dīrghasatreṇa kathāyāṃ sakṣaṇā hareḥ
analyzed: āsīnāḥ dīrgha satreṇa kathāyām sakṣaṇāḥ hareḥ

original: BhP_01.01.022/1 tvaṃ naḥ sandarśito dhātrā dustaraṃ nistitīrṣatām
analyzed: tvam naḥ sandarśitaḥ dhātrā dustaram

original: BhP_01.01.022/3 kaliṃ sattvaharaṃ puṃsāṃ karṇadhāra ivārṇavam
analyzed: kalim sattva haram puṃsām karṇadhāraḥ iva arṇavam

original: BhP_01.01.023/1 brūhi yogeśvare kṛṣṇe brahmaṇye dharmavarmaṇi
analyzed: brūhi yogeśvare kṛṣṇe brahmaṇye dharmavarmaṇi

original: BhP_01.01.023/3 svāṃ kāṣṭhām adhunopete dharmaḥ kaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ
analyzed: svām kāṣṭhām adhunā upete dharmaḥ kam śaraṇam gataḥ

original: BhP_01.02.001/0 vyāsa uvāca
analyzed: vyāsaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.02.001/1 iti sampraśnasaṃhṛṣṭo viprāṇāṃ raumaharśaṇiḥ
analyzed: iti sampraśna saṃhṛṣṭaḥ viprāṇām raumaharśaṇiḥ

original: BhP_01.02.001/3 pratipūjya vacasteśāṃ pravaktum upacakrame
analyzed: pratipūjya vacaḥ tā īśām pravaktum upacakrame

original: BhP_01.02.002/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.02.002/1 yaṃ pravrajantam anupetam apetakṛtyaṃ dvaipāyano virahakātara ājuhāva
analyzed: yam pravrajantam anupetam apeta kṛtyam dvaipāyanaḥ viraha kātaraḥ ājuhāva

original: BhP_01.02.002/3 putreti tanmayatayā taravo 'bhinedus taṃ sarvabhūtahṛdayaṃ munim ānato 'smi
analyzed: putra iti tad maya tayā taravaḥ bhineduḥ tam sarva bhūta hṛdayam munim ānataḥ smi

original: BhP_01.02.003/1 yaḥ svānubhāvam akhilaśrutisāram ekam adhyātmadīpam atititīrṣatāṃ tamo 'ndham
analyzed: yaḥ sva anubhāvam akhila śruti sāram ekam adhyātma dīpam atititīrṣatām tamaḥ ndham

original: BhP_01.02.003/3 saṃsāriṇāṃ karuṇayāha purāṇaguhyaṃ taṃ vyāsasūnum upayāmi guruṃ munīnām
analyzed: saṃsāriṇām karuṇayā āha purāṇa guhyam tam vyāsa sūnum upayāmi gurum munīnām

original: BhP_01.02.004/1 nārāyaṇaṃ namaskṛtya naraṃ caiva narottamam
analyzed: nārāyaṇam namaskṛtya naram ca eva narottamam

original: BhP_01.02.004/3 devīṃ sarasvatīṃ vyāsaṃ tato jayam udīrayet
analyzed: devīm sarasvatīm vyāsam tatas jayam udīrayet

original: BhP_01.02.005/1 munayaḥ sādhu pṛṣṭo 'haṃ bhavadbhirlokamaṅgalam
analyzed: munayaḥ sādhu pṛṣṭaḥ ham bhavadbhiḥ loka maṅgalam

original: BhP_01.02.005/3 yat kṛtaḥ kṛṣṇasampraśno yenātmā suprasīdati
analyzed: yat kṛtaḥ kṛṣṇa sampraśnaḥ yena ātmā suprasīdati

original: BhP_01.02.006/2 sa vai puṃsāṃ paro dharmo yato bhaktiradhokṣaje
analyzed: sa vai puṃsām paraḥ dharmaḥ yatas bhaktiḥ adhokṣaje

original: BhP_01.02.006/3 ahaitukyapratihatā yayātmā suprasīdati
analyzed: ahaitukī a pratihatā yayā ātmā suprasīdati

original: BhP_01.02.007/1 vāsudeve bhagavati bhaktiyogaḥ prayojitaḥ
analyzed: vāsudeve bhagavati bhakti yogaḥ prayojitaḥ

original: BhP_01.02.007/3 janayatyāśu vairāgyaṃ jñānaṃ ca yadahaitukam
analyzed: janayati āśu vairāgyam jñānam ca yat ahaitukam

original: BhP_01.02.008/1 dharmaḥ svanuṣṭhitaḥ puṃsāṃ viṣvaksenakathāsu yaḥ
analyzed: dharmaḥ su anuṣṭhitaḥ puṃsām viṣvaksena kathāsu yaḥ

original: BhP_01.02.008/3 notpādayedyadi ratiṃ śrama eva hi kevalam
analyzed: na utpādayet yadi ratim śramaḥ eva hi kevalam

original: BhP_01.02.009/1 dharmasya hyāpavargyasya nārtho 'rthāyopakalpate
analyzed: dharmasya hi āpavargyasya na arthaḥ rthāya upakalpate

original: BhP_01.02.009/3 nārthasya dharmaikāntasya kāmo lābhāya hi smṛtaḥ
analyzed: na arthasya dharma ekāntasya kāmaḥ lābhāya hi smṛtaḥ

original: BhP_01.02.010/1 kāmasya nendriyaprītirlābho jīveta yāvatā
analyzed: kāmasya nā indriya prītiḥ lābhaḥ jīveta yāvatā

original: BhP_01.02.010/3 jīvasya tattvajijñāsā nārtho yaśceha karmabhiḥ
analyzed: jīvasya tattva jijñāsā na arthaḥ yaḥ ca iha karmabhiḥ

original: BhP_01.02.011/1 vadanti tat tattvavidastattvaṃ yaj jñānam advayam
analyzed: vadanti tat tattva vidaḥ tattvam yat jñānam advayam

original: BhP_01.02.011/3 brahmeti paramātmeti bhagavān iti śabdyate
analyzed: brahma iti paramātmā iti bhagavān iti śabdyate

original: BhP_01.02.012/1 tac chraddadhānā munayo jñānavairāgyayuktayā
analyzed: tat śraddadhānāḥ munayaḥ jñāna vairāgya yuktayā

original: BhP_01.02.012/3 paśyantyātmani cātmānaṃ bhaktyā śrutagṛhītayā
analyzed: paśyanti ātmani ca ātmānam bhaktyā śruta gṛhītayā

original: BhP_01.02.010/1 ataḥ pumbhirdvijaśreṣṭhā varṇāśramavibhāgaśaḥ
analyzed: atas pumbhiḥ dvijaśreṣṭhāḥ varṇa āśrama vibhāgaśaḥ

original: BhP_01.02.013/3 svanuṣṭhitasya dharmasya saṃsiddhirharitoṣaṇam
analyzed: su anuṣṭhitasya dharmasya saṃsiddhiḥ hari toṣaṇam

original: BhP_01.02.014/1 tasmādekena manasā bhagavān sātvatāṃ patiḥ
analyzed: tasmāt ekena manasā bhagavān sātvatām patiḥ

original: BhP_01.02.014/3 śrotavyaḥ kīrtitavyaśca dhyeyaḥ pūjyaśca nityadā
analyzed: śrotavyaḥ kīrtitavyaḥ ca dhyeyaḥ pūjyaḥ ca nityadā

original: BhP_01.02.015/1 yadanudhyāsinā yuktāḥ karmagranthinibandhanam
analyzed: yuktāḥ karma granthi nibandhanam

original: BhP_01.02.015/3 chindanti kovidāstasya ko na kuryāt kathāratim
analyzed: chindanti kovidāḥ tasya kaḥ na kuryāt kathā ratim

original: BhP_01.02.016/1 śuśrūṣoḥ śraddadhānasya vāsudevakathāruciḥ
analyzed: śuśrūṣoḥ śraddadhānasya vāsudeva kathā ruciḥ

original: BhP_01.02.016/3 syān mahatsevayā viprāḥ puṇyatīrthaniṣevaṇāt
analyzed: syāt mahat sevayā viprāḥ puṇya tīrtha niṣevaṇāt

original: BhP_01.02.017/1 śṛṇvatāṃ svakathāḥ kṛṣṇaḥ puṇyaśravaṇakīrtanaḥ
analyzed: śṛṇvatām sva kathāḥ kṛṣṇaḥ puṇya śravaṇa kīrtanaḥ

original: BhP_01.02.017/3 hṛdyantaḥstho hyabhadrāṇi vidhunoti suhṛtsatām
analyzed: hṛdi antar sthaḥ hi abhadrāṇi vidhunoti suhṛd satām

original: BhP_01.02.018/1 naṣṭaprāyeṣvabhadreṣu nityaṃ bhāgavatasevayā
analyzed: naṣṭa prāyeṣu abhadreṣu nityam bhāgavata sevayā

original: BhP_01.02.018/3 bhagavatyuttamaśloke bhaktirbhavati naiṣṭhikī
BhP_01.02.019/1 tadā rajastamobhāvāḥ kāmalobhādayaśca ye
analyzed: tadā rajaḥ tamaḥ bhāvāḥ kāma lobha ādayaḥ ca ye

original: BhP_01.02.019/3 ceta etairanāviddhaṃ sthitaṃ sattve prasīdati
analyzed: cetaḥ etaiḥ anāviddham sthitam sattve prasīdati

original: BhP_01.02.020/1 evaṃ prasannamanaso bhagavadbhaktiyogataḥ
analyzed: evam prasanna manasaḥ bhagavat bhakti yogataḥ

original: BhP_01.02.020/3 bhagavattattvavijñānaṃ muktasaṅgasya jāyate
analyzed: bhagavat tattva vijñānam mukta saṅgasya jāyate

original: BhP_01.02.021/1 bhidyate hṛdayagranthiśchidyante sarvasaṃśayāḥ
analyzed: bhidyate hṛdaya granthiḥ chidyante sarva saṃśayāḥ

original: BhP_01.02.021/3 kṣīyante cāsya karmāṇi dṛṣṭa evātmanīśvare
analyzed: kṣīyante ca asya karmāṇi dṛṣṭe eva ātmani īśvare

original: BhP_01.02.022/1 ato vai kavayo nityaṃ bhaktiṃ paramayā mudā
analyzed: atas vai kavayaḥ nityam bhaktim paramayā mudā

original: BhP_01.02.022/3 vāsudeve bhagavati kurvantyātmaprasādanīm
analyzed: vāsudeve bhagavati kurvanti ātma prasādanīm

original: BhP_01.02.023/1 sattvaṃ rajastama iti prakṛterguṇāstair yuktaḥ paramapuruṣa eka ihāsya dhatte
analyzed: sattvam rajaḥ tamaḥ iti prakṛteḥ guṇāḥ taiḥ yuktaḥ paramapuruṣaḥ ekaḥ iha asya dhatte

original: BhP_01.02.023/3 sthityādaye hariviriñcihareti saṃjñāḥ śreyāṃsi tatra khalu sattvatanornṛṇāṃ syuḥ
analyzed: sthiti ādaye hari viriñci hara iti saṃjñāḥ śreyāṃsi tatra khalu sattva tanoḥ nṛṇām syuḥ

original: BhP_01.02.024/1 pārthivāddāruṇo dhūmastasmādagnistrayīmayaḥ
analyzed: pārthivāt dāruṇaḥ dhūmaḥ tasmāt agniḥ trayī mayaḥ

original: BhP_01.02.024/3 tamasastu rajastasmāt sattvaṃ yadbrahmadarśanam
analyzed: tamasaḥ tu rajaḥ tasmāt sattvam yat brahma darśanam

original: BhP_01.02.025/1 bhejire munayo 'thāgre bhagavantam adhokṣajam
analyzed: bhejire munayaḥ thā agre bhagavantam adhokṣajam

original: BhP_01.02.025/3 sattvaṃ viśuddhaṃ kṣemāya kalpante ye 'nu tān iha
analyzed: sattvam viśuddham kṣemāya kalpante ye nu tān iha

original: BhP_01.02.026/1 mumukṣavo ghorarūpān hitvā bhūtapatīn atha
analyzed: mumukṣavaḥ ghora rūpān hitvā bhūtapatīn atha

original: BhP_01.02.026/3 nārāyaṇakalāḥ śāntā bhajanti hyanasūyavaḥ
analyzed: nārāyaṇa kalāḥ śāntāḥ bhajanti hi anasūyavaḥ

original: BhP_01.02.027/1 rajastamaḥprakṛtayaḥ samaśīlā bhajanti vai
analyzed: rajaḥ tamaḥ prakṛtayaḥ sama śīlāḥ bhajanti vai

original: BhP_01.02.027/3 pitṛbhūtaprajeśādīn śriyaiśvaryaprajepsavaḥ
analyzed: pitṛ bhūta prajā īśa ādīn śriyā aiśvarya prajepsavaḥ

original: BhP_01.02.028/1 vāsudevaparā vedā vāsudevaparā makhāḥ
analyzed: vāsudeva parāḥ vedāḥ vāsudeva parāḥ makhāḥ

original: BhP_01.02.028/3 vāsudevaparā yoga vāsudevaparāḥ kriyāḥ
analyzed: vāsudeva parāḥ yoga vāsudeva parāḥ kriyāḥ

original: BhP_01.02.029/1 vāsudevaparaṃ jñānaṃ vāsudevaparaṃ tapaḥ
analyzed: vāsudeva param jñānam vāsudeva param tapaḥ

original: BhP_01.02.029/3 vāsudevaparo dharmo vāsudevaparā gatiḥ
analyzed: vāsudeva paraḥ dharmaḥ vāsudeva parā gatiḥ

original: BhP_01.02.030/1 sa evedaṃ sasarjāgre bhagavān ātmamāyayā
analyzed: saḥ eva idam sasarja agre bhagavān ātma māyayā

original: BhP_01.02.030/3 sadasadrūpayā cāsau guṇamayāguṇo vibhuḥ
analyzed: sat asat rūpayā ca asau guṇa maya aguṇaḥ vibhuḥ

original: BhP_01.02.031/1 tayā vilasiteṣveṣu guṇeṣu guṇavān iva
analyzed: tayā vilasiteṣu eṣu guṇeṣu guṇavān iva

original: BhP_01.02.031/3 antaḥpraviṣṭa ābhāti vijñānena vijṛmbhitaḥ
analyzed: antar praviṣṭaḥ ābhāti vijñānena vijṛmbhitaḥ

original: BhP_01.02.032/1 yathā hyavahito vahnirdāruṣvekaḥ svayoniṣu
analyzed: yathā hi avahitaḥ vahniḥ dāruṣu ekaḥ svayoniṣu

original: BhP_01.02.032/3 nāneva bhāti viśvātmā bhūteṣu ca tathā pumān
analyzed: nānā iva bhāti viśvātmā bhūteṣu ca tathā pumān

original: BhP_01.02.033/1 asau guṇamayairbhāvairbhūtasūkṣmendriyātmabhiḥ
analyzed: asau guṇa mayaiḥ bhāvaiḥ bhūta sūkṣma indriya ātmabhiḥ

original: BhP_01.02.033/3 svanirmiteṣu nirviṣṭo bhuṅkte bhūteṣu tadguṇān
analyzed: sva nirmiteṣu nirviṣṭaḥ bhuṅkte bhūteṣu tad guṇān

original: BhP_01.02.034/1 bhāvayatyeṣa sattvena lokān vai lokabhāvanaḥ
analyzed: bhāvayati eṣa sattvena lokān vai loka bhāvanaḥ

original: BhP_01.02.034/3 līlāvatārānurato devatiryaṅnarādiṣu
BhP_01.03.001/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.03.001/1 jagṛhe pauruṣaṃ rūpaṃ bhagavān mahadādibhiḥ
analyzed: jagṛhe pauruṣam rūpam bhagavān mahat ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_01.03.001/3 sambhūtaṃ ṣoḍaśakalam ādau lokasisṛkṣayā
analyzed: sambhūtam ṣoḍaśa kalam ādau loka sisṛkṣayā

original: BhP_01.03.002/1 yasyāmbhasi śayānasya yoganidrāṃ vitanvataḥ
analyzed: yasya ambhasi śayānasya yoganidrām vitanvataḥ

original: BhP_01.03.002/3 nābhihradāmbujādāsīdbrahmā viśvasṛjāṃ patiḥ
analyzed: nābhi hrada ambujāt āsīt brahmā viśvasṛjām patiḥ

original: BhP_01.03.003/1 yasyāvayavasaṃsthānaiḥ kalpito lokavistaraḥ
analyzed: yasya avayava saṃsthānaiḥ kalpitaḥ loka vistaraḥ

original: BhP_01.03.003/3 tadvai bhagavato rūpaṃ viśuddhaṃ sattvam ūrjitam
analyzed: tat vai bhagavataḥ rūpam viśuddham sattvam ūrjitam

original: BhP_01.03.004/1 paśyantyado rūpam adabhracakṣuṣā sahasrapādorubhujānanādbhutam
analyzed: paśyanti adaḥ rūpam adabhra cakṣuṣā sahasra pāda ūru bhuja ānana adbhutam

original: BhP_01.03.004/3 sahasramūrdhaśravaṇākṣināsikaṃ sahasramaulyambarakuṇḍalollasat
BhP_01.03.005/1 etan nānāvatārāṇāṃ nidhānaṃ bījam avyayam
analyzed: etat nānā avatārāṇām nidhānam bījam avyayam

original: BhP_01.03.005/3 yasyāṃśāṃśena sṛjyante devatiryaṅnarādayaḥ
analyzed: yasya aṃśa aṃśena sṛjyante

original: BhP_01.03.006/1 sa eva prathamaṃ devaḥ kaumāraṃ sargam āśritaḥ
analyzed: saḥ eva prathamam devaḥ kaumāram sargam āśritaḥ

original: BhP_01.03.006/3 cacāra duścaraṃ brahmā brahmacaryam akhaṇḍitam
analyzed: cacāra duścaram brahmā brahmacaryam akhaṇḍitam

original: BhP_01.03.007/1 dvitīyaṃ tu bhavāyāsya rasātalagatāṃ mahīm
analyzed: dvitīyam tu bhavāya asya rasātala gatām mahīm

original: BhP_01.03.007/3 uddhariṣyann upādatta yajñeśaḥ saukaraṃ vapuḥ
analyzed: uddhariṣyan upādatta yajñeśaḥ saukaram vapuḥ

original: BhP_01.03.008/1 tṛtīyam ṛṣisargaṃ vai devarṣitvam upetya saḥ
analyzed: tṛtīyam ṛṣi sargam vai devarṣi tvam upetya saḥ

original: BhP_01.03.008/3 tantraṃ sātvatam ācaṣṭa naiṣkarmyaṃ karmaṇāṃ yataḥ
analyzed: tantram sātvatam ācaṣṭa naiṣkarmyam karmaṇām yatas

original: BhP_01.03.009/1 turye dharmakalāsarge naranārāyaṇāvṛṣī
analyzed: turye dharma kalā sarge nara nārāyaṇau ṛṣī

original: BhP_01.03.009/3 bhūtvātmopaśamopetam akarodduścaraṃ tapaḥ
analyzed: bhūtvā ātma upaśama upetam akarot duścaram tapaḥ

original: BhP_01.03.010/1 pañcamaḥ kapilo nāma siddheśaḥ kālaviplutam
analyzed: pañcamaḥ kapilaḥ nāma siddha īśaḥ kāla viplutam

original: BhP_01.03.010/3 provācāsuraye sāṅkhyaṃ tattvagrāmavinirṇayam
analyzed: provāca asuraye sāṅkhyam tattva grāma vinirṇayam

original: BhP_01.03.011/1 ṣaṣṭham atrerapatyatvaṃ vṛtaḥ prāpto 'nasūyayā
analyzed: ṣaṣṭham atreḥ apatya tvam vṛtaḥ prāptaḥ nasūyayā

original: BhP_01.03.011/3 ānvīkṣikīm alarkāya prahlādādibhya ūcivān
analyzed: ānvīkṣikīm alarkāya prahlāda ādibhyaḥ ūcivān

original: BhP_01.03.012/1 tataḥ saptama ākūtyāṃ ruceryajño 'bhyajāyata
analyzed: tatas saptame ākūtyām ruceḥ yajñaḥ bhyajāyata

original: BhP_01.03.012/3 sa yāmādyaiḥ suragaṇairapāt svāyambhuvāntaram
analyzed: sa yām ādyaiḥ sura gaṇaiḥ apāt svāyambhuva antaram

original: BhP_01.03.013/1 aṣṭame merudevyāṃ tu nābherjāta urukramaḥ
analyzed: aṣṭame merudevyām tu nābheḥ jātaḥ uru kramaḥ

original: BhP_01.03.013/3 darśayan vartma dhīrāṇāṃ sarvāśramanamaskṛtam
analyzed: darśayan vartma dhīrāṇām sarva āśrama namaskṛtam

original: BhP_01.03.014/1 ṛṣibhiryācito bheje navamaṃ pārthivaṃ vapuḥ
analyzed: ṛṣibhiḥ yācitaḥ bheje navamam pārthivam vapuḥ

original: BhP_01.03.014/3 dugdhemām oṣadhīrviprāstenāyaṃ sa uśattamaḥ
analyzed: dugdha imām oṣadhīḥ viprāḥ tena ayam saḥ uśattamaḥ

original: BhP_01.03.015/1 rūpaṃ sa jagṛhe mātsyaṃ cākṣuṣodadhisamplave
analyzed: rūpam sa jagṛhe mātsyam cākṣuṣa udadhi samplave

original: BhP_01.03.015/3 nāvyāropya mahīmayyām apādvaivasvataṃ manum
analyzed: naau āropya mahīmayyām apāt vaivasvatam manum

original: BhP_01.03.016/1 surāsurāṇām udadhiṃ mathnatāṃ mandarācalam
analyzed: sura asurāṇām udadhim mathnatām mandara acalam

original: BhP_01.03.016/3 dadhre kamaṭharūpeṇa pṛṣṭha ekādaśe vibhuḥ
analyzed: dadhre kamaṭha rūpeṇa pṛṣṭhe ekādaśe vibhuḥ

original: BhP_01.03.017/1 dhānvantaraṃ dvādaśamaṃ trayodaśamam eva ca
analyzed: dhānvantaram dvādaśamam trayodaśamam eva ca

original: BhP_01.03.017/3 apāyayat surān anyān mohinyā mohayan striyā
analyzed: apāyayat surān anyān mohinyā mohayan striyā

original: BhP_01.03.018/1 caturdaśaṃ nārasiṃhaṃ bibhraddaityendram ūrjitam
analyzed: caturdaśam nārasiṃham bibhrat daitya indram ūrjitam

original: BhP_01.03.018/3 dadāra karajairūrāverakāṃ kaṭakṛdyathā
analyzed: dadāra karajaiḥ ūrāverakām kaṭakṛt yathā

original: BhP_01.03.019/1 pañcadaśaṃ vāmanakaṃ kṛtvāgādadhvaraṃ baleḥ
analyzed: pañcadaśam vāmanakam kṛtvā agāt adhvaram baleḥ

original: BhP_01.03.019/3 padatrayaṃ yācamānaḥ pratyāditsustripiṣṭapam
analyzed: pada trayam yācamānaḥ pratyāditsuḥ tripiṣṭapam

original: BhP_01.03.020/1 avatāre ṣoḍaśame paśyan brahmadruho nṛpān
analyzed: avatāre ṣoḍaśame paśyan brahma druhaḥ nṛpān

original: BhP_01.03.020/3 triḥsaptakṛtvaḥ kupito niḥkṣatrām akaron mahīm
analyzed: tris sapta kṛtvas kupitaḥ niḥkṣatrām akarot mahīm

original: BhP_01.03.021/1 tataḥ saptadaśe jātaḥ satyavatyāṃ parāśarāt
analyzed: tatas saptadaśe jātaḥ satyavatyām parāśarāt

original: BhP_01.03.021/3 cakre vedataroḥ śākhā dṛṣṭvā puṃso 'lpamedhasaḥ
analyzed: cakre veda taroḥ śākhāḥ dṛṣṭvā puṃsaḥ lpamedhasaḥ

original: BhP_01.03.022/1 naradevatvam āpannaḥ surakāryacikīrṣayā
analyzed: naradeva tvam āpannaḥ sura kārya cikīrṣayā

original: BhP_01.03.022/3 samudranigrahādīni cakre vīryāṇyataḥ param
analyzed: samudra nigraha ādīni cakre vīryāṇi atas param

original: BhP_01.03.023/1 ekonaviṃśe viṃśatime vṛṣṇiṣu prāpya janmanī
analyzed: ekonaviṃśe viṃśatime vṛṣṇiṣu prāpya janmanī

original: BhP_01.03.023/3 rāmakṛṣṇāviti bhuvo bhagavān aharadbharam
analyzed: rāma kṛṣṇau iti bhuvaḥ bhagavān aharat bharam

original: BhP_01.03.024/1 tataḥ kalau sampravṛtte sammohāya suradviṣām
analyzed: tatas kalau sampravṛtte sammohāya suradviṣām

original: BhP_01.03.024/3 buddho nāmnāñjanasutaḥ kīkaṭeṣu bhaviṣyati
analyzed: buddhaḥ nāmnā añjana sutaḥ kīkaṭeṣu bhaviṣyati

original: BhP_01.03.025/1 athāsau yugasandhyāyāṃ dasyuprāyeṣu rājasu
analyzed: atha asau yuga sandhyāyām dasyu prāyeṣu rājasu

original: BhP_01.03.025/3 janitā viṣṇuyaśaso nāmnā kalkirjagatpatiḥ
analyzed: janitā viṣṇuyaśasaḥ nāmnā kalkiḥ jagatpatiḥ

original: BhP_01.03.026/1 avatārā hyasaṅkhyeyā hareḥ sattvanidherdvijāḥ
analyzed: avatārāḥ hi asaṅkhyeyāḥ hareḥ sattva nidheḥ dvijāḥ

original: BhP_01.03.026/3 yathāvidāsinaḥ kulyāḥ sarasaḥ syuḥ sahasraśaḥ
analyzed: yathā vidāsinaḥ kulyāḥ sarasaḥ syuḥ sahasraśas

original: BhP_01.03.027/1 ṛṣayo manavo devā manuputrā mahaujasaḥ
analyzed: ṛṣayaḥ manavaḥ devāḥ manu putrāḥ mahā ojasaḥ

original: BhP_01.03.027/3 kalāḥ sarve harereva saprajāpatayaḥ smṛtāḥ
analyzed: kalāḥ sarve hareḥ eva sa prajāpatayaḥ smṛtāḥ

original: BhP_01.03.028/1 ete cāṃśakalāḥ puṃsaḥ kṛṣṇastu bhagavān svayam
analyzed: ete ca aṃśa kalāḥ puṃsaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ tu bhagavān svayam

original: BhP_01.03.028/3 indrārivyākulaṃ lokaṃ mṛḍayanti yuge yuge
analyzed: indra ari vyākulam lokam mṛḍayanti yuge yuge

original: BhP_01.03.029/1 janma guhyaṃ bhagavato ya etat prayato naraḥ
analyzed: janma guhyam bhagavataḥ yaḥ etat prayataḥ naraḥ

original: BhP_01.03.029/3 sāyaṃ prātargṛṇan bhaktyā duḥkhagrāmādvimucyate
analyzed: sāyam prātar gṛṇan bhaktyā duḥkha grāmāt vimucyate

original: BhP_01.03.030/1 etadrūpaṃ bhagavato hyarūpasya cidātmanaḥ
analyzed: etat rūpam bhagavataḥ hi arūpasya cit ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_01.03.030/3 māyāguṇairviracitaṃ mahadādibhirātmani
analyzed: māyā guṇaiḥ viracitam mahat ādibhiḥ ātmani

original: BhP_01.03.031/1 yathā nabhasi meghaugho reṇurvā pārthivo 'nile
analyzed: yathā nabhasi megha oghaḥ reṇuḥ vā pārthivaḥ nile

original: BhP_01.03.031/3 evaṃ draṣṭari dṛśyatvam āropitam abuddhibhiḥ
analyzed: evam draṣṭari dṛśya tvam āropitam abuddhibhiḥ

original: BhP_01.03.032/1 ataḥ paraṃ yadavyaktam avyūḍhaguṇabṛṃhitam
analyzed: atas param yat avyaktam a vyūḍha guṇa bṛṃhitam

original: BhP_01.03.032/3 adṛṣṭāśrutavastutvāt sa jīvo yat punarbhavaḥ
analyzed: adṛṣṭa aśruta vastu tvāt sa jīvaḥ yat punarbhavaḥ

original: BhP_01.03.033/1 yatreme sadasadrūpe pratiṣiddhe svasaṃvidā
analyzed: yatra ime sat asat rūpe pratiṣiddhe sva saṃvidā

original: BhP_01.03.033/3 avidyayātmani kṛte iti tadbrahmadarśanam
analyzed: avidyayā ātmani kṛte iti tat brahma darśanam

original: BhP_01.03.034/1 yadyeṣoparatā devī māyā vaiśāradī matiḥ
analyzed: yadi eṣā uparatā devī māyā vaiśāradī matiḥ

original: BhP_01.03.034/3 sampanna eveti vidurmahimni sve mahīyate
analyzed: sampannaḥ eva iti viduḥ mahimni sve mahīyate

original: BhP_01.03.035/1 evaṃ ca janmāni karmāṇi hyakarturajanasya ca
analyzed: evam ca janmāni karmāṇi hi akartuḥ ajanasya ca

original: BhP_01.03.035/3 varṇayanti sma kavayo vedaguhyāni hṛtpateḥ
analyzed: varṇayanti sma kavayaḥ veda guhyāni hṛtpateḥ

original: BhP_01.03.036/1 sa vā idaṃ viśvam amoghalīlaḥ sṛjatyavatyatti na sajjate 'smin
analyzed: sa vai idam viśvam amogha līlaḥ sṛjati avati atti na sajjate smin

original: BhP_01.03.036/3 bhūteṣu cāntarhita ātmatantraḥ ṣāḍvargikaṃ jighrati ṣaḍguṇeśaḥ
analyzed: bhūteṣu ca antarhitaḥ ātmatantraḥ ṣāḍvargikam jighrati ṣaḍguṇa īśaḥ

original: BhP_01.03.037/1 na cāsya kaścin nipuṇena dhātur avaiti jantuḥ kumanīṣa ūtīḥ
analyzed: na ca asya kaścid nipuṇena dhātuḥ avaiti jantuḥ kumanīṣe ūtīḥ

original: BhP_01.03.037/3 nāmāni rūpāṇi manovacobhiḥ santanvato naṭacaryām ivājñaḥ
analyzed: nāmāni rūpāṇi manaḥ vacobhiḥ santanvataḥ naṭa caryām iva ajñaḥ

original: BhP_01.03.038/1 sa veda dhātuḥ padavīṃ parasya durantavīryasya rathāṅgapāṇeḥ
analyzed: sa veda dhātuḥ padavīm parasya duranta vīryasya rathāṅga pāṇeḥ

original: BhP_01.03.038/3 yo 'māyayā santatayānuvṛttyā bhajeta tatpādasarojagandham
analyzed: yaḥ māyayā santatayā anuvṛttyā bhajeta tad pāda saroja gandham

original: BhP_01.03.039/1 atheha dhanyā bhagavanta itthaṃ yadvāsudeve 'khilalokanāthe
analyzed: athā iha dhanyāḥ bhagavantaḥ ittham yat vāsudeve khila loka nāthe

original: BhP_01.03.039/3 kurvanti sarvātmakam ātmabhāvaṃ na yatra bhūyaḥ parivarta ugraḥ
analyzed: kurvanti sarva ātmakam ātma bhāvam na yatra bhūyas parivartaḥ ugraḥ

original: BhP_01.03.040/1 idaṃ bhāgavataṃ nāma purāṇaṃ brahmasammitam
analyzed: idam bhāgavatam nāma purāṇam brahma sammitam

original: BhP_01.03.040/3 uttamaślokacaritaṃ cakāra bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
analyzed: uttamaśloka caritam cakāra bhagavān ṛṣiḥ

original: BhP_01.03.041/1 niḥśreyasāya lokasya dhanyaṃ svastyayanaṃ mahat
analyzed: niḥśreyasāya lokasya dhanyam svastyayanam mahat

original: BhP_01.03.041/3 tadidaṃ grāhayām āsasutam ātmavatāṃ varam
analyzed: tat idam grāhayām āsa sutam ātmavatām varam

original: BhP_01.03.042/1 sarvavedetihāsānāṃ sāraṃ sāraṃ samuddhṛtam
analyzed: sarva veda itihāsānām sāram sāram samuddhṛtam

original: BhP_01.03.042/3 sa tu saṃśrāvayām āsamahārājaṃ parīkṣitam
analyzed: sa tu saṃśrāvayām āsa mahā rājam parīkṣitam

original: BhP_01.03.043/1 prāyopaviṣṭaṃ gaṅgāyāṃ parītaṃ paramarṣibhiḥ
analyzed: prāya upaviṣṭam gaṅgāyām parītam parama ṛṣibhiḥ

original: BhP_01.03.043/3 kṛṣṇe svadhāmopagate dharmajñānādibhiḥ saha
analyzed: kṛṣṇe sva dhāma upagate dharma jñāna ādibhiḥ saha

original: BhP_01.03.044/1 kalau naṣṭadṛśām eṣa purāṇārko 'dhunoditaḥ
analyzed: kalau naṣṭa dṛśām eṣa purāṇa arkaḥ dhunā uditaḥ

original: BhP_01.03.044/3 tatra kīrtayato viprā viprarṣerbhūritejasaḥ
analyzed: tatra kīrtayataḥ viprāḥ viprarṣeḥ bhūri tejasaḥ

original: BhP_01.03.045/1 ahaṃ cādhyagamaṃ tatra niviṣṭastadanugrahāt
analyzed: aham ca adhyagamam tatra niviṣṭaḥ tad anugrahāt

original: BhP_01.03.045/3 so 'haṃ vaḥ śrāvayiṣyāmi yathādhītaṃ yathāmati
analyzed: saḥ ham vaḥ śrāvayiṣyāmi yathā adhītam yathāmati

original: BhP_01.04.001/0 vyāsa uvāca
analyzed: vyāsaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.04.001/1 iti bruvāṇaṃ saṃstūya munīnāṃ dīrghasatriṇām
analyzed: iti bruvāṇam saṃstūya munīnām dīrgha satriṇām

original: BhP_01.04.001/3 vṛddhaḥ kulapatiḥ sūtaṃ bahvṛcaḥ śaunako 'bravīt
analyzed: vṛddhaḥ kula patiḥ sūtam bahvṛcaḥ śaunakaḥ bravīt

original: BhP_01.04.002/0 śaunaka uvāca
analyzed: śaunakaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.04.002/1 sūta sūta mahābhāga vada no vadatāṃ vara
analyzed: sūta sūta mahābhāga vada naḥ vadatām vara

original: BhP_01.04.002/3 kathāṃ bhāgavatīṃ puṇyāṃ yadāha bhagavāñ chukaḥ
analyzed: kathām bhāgavatīm puṇyām yadā āha

original: BhP_01.04.003/1 kasmin yuge pravṛtteyaṃ sthāne vā kena hetunā
analyzed: kasmin yuge pravṛttā iyam sthāne vā kena hetunā

original: BhP_01.04.003/3 kutaḥ sañcoditaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ kṛtavān saṃhitāṃ muniḥ
analyzed: kutas sañcoditaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ kṛtavān saṃhitām muniḥ

original: BhP_01.04.004/1 tasya putro mahāyogī samadṛṅ nirvikalpakaḥ
analyzed: tasya putraḥ mahā yogī samadṛś nirvikalpakaḥ

original: BhP_01.04.004/3 ekāntamatirunnidro gūḍho mūḍha iveyate
analyzed: ekānta matiḥ unnidraḥ gūḍhaḥ mūḍhaḥ iva iyate

original: BhP_01.04.005/1 dṛṣṭvānuyāntam ṛṣim ātmajam apyanagnaṃ devyo hriyā paridadhurna sutasya citram
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā anuyāntam ṛṣim ātmajam api anagnam devyaḥ hriyā paridadhuḥ na sutasya citram

original: BhP_01.04.005/3 tadvīkṣya pṛcchati munau jagadustavāsti strīpumbhidā na tu sutasya viviktadṛṣṭeḥ
analyzed: tat vīkṣya pṛcchati munau jagaduḥ tava asti strī pum bhidā na tu sutasya vivikta dṛṣṭeḥ

original: BhP_01.04.006/1 katham ālakṣitaḥ pauraiḥ samprāptaḥ kurujāṅgalān
analyzed: katham ālakṣitaḥ pauraiḥ samprāptaḥ kurujāṅgalān

original: BhP_01.04.006/3 unmattamūkajaḍavadvicaran gajasāhvaye
analyzed: unmatta mūka jaḍa vat vicaran gajasāhvaye

original: BhP_01.04.007/1 kathaṃ vā pāṇḍaveyasya rājarṣermuninā saha
analyzed: katham vā pāṇḍaveyasya rājarṣeḥ muninā saha

original: BhP_01.04.007/3 saṃvādaḥ samabhūt tāta yatraiṣā sātvatī śrutiḥ
analyzed: saṃvādaḥ samabhūt tāta yatra eṣā sātvatī śrutiḥ

original: BhP_01.04.008/1 sa godohanamātraṃ hi gṛheṣu gṛhamedhinām
analyzed: sa godohana mātram hi gṛheṣu gṛhamedhinām

original: BhP_01.04.008/3 avekṣate mahābhāgastīrthīkurvaṃstadāśramam
analyzed: avekṣate mahābhāgaḥ tīrthīkurvan tad āśramam

original: BhP_01.04.009/1 abhimanyusutaṃ sūta prāhurbhāgavatottamam
analyzed: abhimanyu sutam sūta prāhuḥ bhāgavata uttamam

original: BhP_01.04.009/3 tasya janma mahāścaryaṃ karmāṇi ca gṛṇīhi naḥ
analyzed: tasya janma mahā āścaryam karmāṇi ca gṛṇīhi naḥ

original: BhP_01.04.010/1 sa samrāṭ kasya vā hetoḥ pāṇḍūnāṃ mānavardhanaḥ
analyzed: sa samrāj kasya vā hetoḥ pāṇḍūnām māna vardhanaḥ

original: BhP_01.04.010/3 prāyopaviṣṭo gaṅgāyām anādṛtyādhirāṭśriyam
analyzed: prāya upaviṣṭaḥ gaṅgāyām an ādṛtya adhirāj śriyam

original: BhP_01.04.011/1 namanti yatpādaniketam ātmanaḥ śivāya hānīya dhanāni śatravaḥ
analyzed: namanti yat pādaniketam ātmanaḥ śivāya ha ānīya dhanāni śatravaḥ

original: BhP_01.04.011/3 kathaṃ sa vīraḥ śriyam aṅga dustyajāṃ yuvaiṣatotsraṣṭum aho sahāsubhiḥ
analyzed: katham sa vīraḥ śriyam aṅga dustyajām aho saha asubhiḥ

original: BhP_01.04.012/1 śivāya lokasya bhavāya bhūtaye ya uttamaślokaparāyaṇā janāḥ
analyzed: śivāya lokasya bhavāya bhūtaye ye uttamaśloka parāyaṇāḥ janāḥ

original: BhP_01.04.012/3 jīvanti nātmārtham asau parāśrayaṃ mumoca nirvidya kutaḥ kalevaram
analyzed: jīvanti na ātma artham asau para āśrayam mumoca nirvidya kutas kalevaram

original: BhP_01.04.013/1 tat sarvaṃ naḥ samācakṣva pṛṣṭo yadiha kiñcana
analyzed: tat sarvam naḥ samācakṣva pṛṣṭaḥ yat iha kiñcana

original: BhP_01.04.013/3 manye tvāṃ viṣaye vācāṃ snātam anyatra chāndasāt
analyzed: manye tvām viṣaye vācām snātam anyatra chāndasāt

original: BhP_01.04.014/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.04.014/1 dvāpare samanuprāpte tṛtīye yugaparyaye
analyzed: dvāpare samanuprāpte tṛtīye yuga paryaye

original: BhP_01.04.014/3 jātaḥ parāśarādyogī vāsavyāṃ kalayā hareḥ
analyzed: jātaḥ parāśarāt yogī vāsavyām kalayā hareḥ

original: BhP_01.04.015/1 sa kadācit sarasvatyā upaspṛśya jalaṃ śuciḥ
analyzed: sa kadācid sarasvatyāḥ upaspṛśya jalam śuciḥ

original: BhP_01.04.015/3 vivikta eka āsīna udite ravimaṇḍale
analyzed: viviktaḥ ekaḥ āsīnaḥ udite ravi maṇḍale

original: BhP_01.04.016/1 parāvarajñaḥ sa ṛṣiḥ kālenāvyaktaraṃhasā
analyzed: parāvara jñaḥ saḥ ṛṣiḥ kālena avyakta raṃhasā

original: BhP_01.04.016/3 yugadharmavyatikaraṃ prāptaṃ bhuvi yuge yuge
analyzed: yuga dharma vyatikaram prāptam bhuvi yuge yuge

original: BhP_01.04.017/1 bhautikānāṃ ca bhāvānāṃ śaktihrāsaṃ ca tatkṛtam
analyzed: bhautikānām ca bhāvānām śakti hrāsam ca tad kṛtam

original: BhP_01.04.017/3 aśraddadhānān niḥsattvān durmedhān hrasitāyuṣaḥ
analyzed: aśraddadhānān niḥsattvān durmedhān hrasita āyuṣaḥ

original: BhP_01.04.018/1 durbhagāṃśca janān vīkṣya munirdivyena cakṣuṣā
analyzed: durbhagān ca janān vīkṣya muniḥ divyena cakṣuṣā

original: BhP_01.04.018/3 sarvavarṇāśramāṇāṃ yaddadhyau hitam amoghadṛk
analyzed: sarva varṇa āśramāṇām yat dadhyau hitam amogha dṛś

original: BhP_01.04.019/1 cāturhotraṃ karma śuddhaṃ prajānāṃ vīkṣya vaidikam
analyzed: cāturhotram karma śuddham prajānām vīkṣya vaidikam

original: BhP_01.04.019/3 vyadadhādyajñasantatyai vedam ekaṃ caturvidham
analyzed: vyadadhāt yajña santatyai vedam ekam caturvidham

original: BhP_01.04.020/1 ṛgyajuḥsāmātharvākhyā vedāścatvāra uddhṛtāḥ
analyzed: ṛk yajuḥ sāma atharva ākhyāḥ vedāḥ catvāraḥ uddhṛtāḥ

original: BhP_01.04.020/3 itihāsapurāṇaṃ ca pañcamo veda ucyate
analyzed: itihāsa purāṇam ca pañcamaḥ vedaḥ ucyate

original: BhP_01.04.021/1 tatrargvedadharaḥ pailaḥ sāmago jaiminiḥ kaviḥ
analyzed: tatra ṛgveda dharaḥ pailaḥ sāmagaḥ jaiminiḥ kaviḥ

original: BhP_01.04.021/3 vaiśampāyana evaiko niṣṇāto yajuṣām uta
analyzed: vaiśampāyanaḥ eva ekaḥ niṣṇātaḥ yajuṣām uta

original: BhP_01.04.022/1 atharvāṅgirasām āsīt sumanturdāruṇo muniḥ
analyzed: atharva aṅgirasām āsīt sumantuḥ dāruṇaḥ muniḥ

original: BhP_01.04.022/3 itihāsapurāṇānāṃ pitā me romaharṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: itihāsa purāṇānām pitā me romaharṣaṇaḥ

original: BhP_01.04.023/1 ta eta ṛṣayo vedaṃ svaṃ svaṃ vyasyann anekadhā
analyzed: te ete ṛṣayaḥ vedam svam svam vyasyan anekadhā

original: BhP_01.04.023/3 śiṣyaiḥ praśiṣyaistacchiṣyairvedāste śākhino 'bhavan
analyzed: śiṣyaiḥ praśiṣyaiḥ tad śiṣyaiḥ vedāḥ te śākhinaḥ bhavan

original: BhP_01.04.024/1 ta eva vedā durmedhairdhāryante puruṣairyathā
analyzed: te eva vedāḥ durmedhaiḥ dhāryante puruṣaiḥ yathā

original: BhP_01.04.024/3 evaṃ cakāra bhagavān vyāsaḥ kṛpaṇavatsalaḥ
analyzed: evam cakāra bhagavān vyāsaḥ kṛpaṇa vatsalaḥ

original: BhP_01.04.025/1 strīśūdradvijabandhūnāṃ trayī na śrutigocarā
analyzed: strī śūdra dvijabandhūnām trayī na śruti gocarā

original: BhP_01.04.025/3 karmaśreyasi mūḍhānāṃ śreya evaṃ bhavediha
analyzed: karma śreyasi mūḍhānām śreyaḥ evam bhavet iha

original: BhP_01.04.025/5 iti bhāratam ākhyānaṃ kṛpayā muninā kṛtam
analyzed: iti bhāratam ākhyānam kṛpayā muninā kṛtam

original: BhP_01.04.026/1 evaṃ pravṛttasya sadā bhūtānāṃ śreyasi dvijāḥ
analyzed: evam pravṛttasya sadā bhūtānām śreyasi dvijāḥ

original: BhP_01.04.026/3 sarvātmakenāpi yadā nātuṣyaddhṛdayaṃ tataḥ
analyzed: sarvātmakena api yadā na atuṣyat hṛdayam tatas

original: BhP_01.04.027/1 nātiprasīdaddhṛdayaḥ sarasvatyāstaṭe śucau
analyzed: na ati prasīdat hṛdayaḥ sarasvatyāḥ taṭe śucau

original: BhP_01.04.027/3 vitarkayan viviktastha idaṃ covāca dharmavit
analyzed: vitarkayan vivikta sthaḥ idam ca uvāca dharma vid

original: BhP_01.04.028/1 dhṛtavratena hi mayā chandāṃsi guravo 'gnayaḥ
analyzed: dhṛta vratena hi mayā chandāṃsi guravaḥ gnayaḥ

original: BhP_01.04.028/3 mānitā nirvyalīkena gṛhītaṃ cānuśāsanam
analyzed: māni tā nirvyalīkena gṛhītam ca anuśāsanam

original: BhP_01.04.029/1 bhāratavyapadeśena hyāmnāyārthaśca pradarśitaḥ
analyzed: bhārata vyapadeśena hi āmnāya arthaḥ ca pradarśitaḥ

original: BhP_01.04.029/3 dṛśyate yatra dharmādi strīśūdrādibhirapyuta
analyzed: dṛśyate yatra dharma ādi strī śūdra ādibhiḥ api uta

original: BhP_01.04.030/1 tathāpi bata me daihyo hyātmā caivātmanā vibhuḥ
analyzed: tathā api bata me daihyaḥ hi ātmā ca eva ātmanā vibhuḥ

original: BhP_01.04.030/3 asampanna ivābhāti brahmavarcasya sattamaḥ
analyzed: asampannaḥ iva ābhāti brahmavarcasya sattamaḥ

original: BhP_01.04.031/1 kiṃ vā bhāgavatā dharmā na prāyeṇa nirūpitāḥ
analyzed: kim vā bhāgavatāḥ dharmāḥ na prāyeṇa nirūpitāḥ

original: BhP_01.04.031/3 priyāḥ paramahaṃsānāṃ ta eva hyacyutapriyāḥ
analyzed: priyāḥ paramahaṃsānām te eva hi acyuta priyāḥ

original: BhP_01.04.032/1 tasyaivaṃ khilam ātmānaṃ manyamānasya khidyataḥ
analyzed: tasya evam khilam ātmānam manyamānasya

original: BhP_01.04.032/3 kṛṣṇasya nārado 'bhyāgādāśramaṃ prāg udāhṛtam
analyzed: kṛṣṇasya nāradaḥ bhyāgāt āśramam prāk udāhṛtam

original: BhP_01.04.033/1 tam abhijñāya sahasā pratyutthāyāgataṃ muniḥ
analyzed: tam abhijñāya sahasā pratyutthāya āgatam muniḥ

original: BhP_01.04.033/3 pūjayām āsa vidhivan nāradaṃ surapūjitam
analyzed: pūjayām āsa vidhivat nāradam sura pūjitam

original: BhP_01.05.001/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.05.001/1 atha taṃ sukham āsīna upāsīnaṃ bṛhacchravāḥ
analyzed: atha tam sukham āsīnaḥ upāsīnam bṛhacchravāḥ

original: BhP_01.05.001/3 devarṣiḥ prāha viprarṣiṃ vīṇāpāṇiḥ smayann iva
analyzed: devarṣiḥ prāha viprarṣim vīṇāpāṇiḥ smayan iva

original: BhP_01.05.002/0 nārada uvāca
analyzed: nāradaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.05.002/1 pārāśarya mahābhāga bhavataḥ kaccidātmanā
analyzed: pārāśarya mahābhāga bhavataḥ kaccit ātmanā

original: BhP_01.05.002/3 parituṣyati śārīra ātmā mānasa eva vā
analyzed: parituṣyati śārīraḥ ātmā mānasaḥ eva vā

original: BhP_01.05.003/1 jijñāsitaṃ susampannam api te mahadadbhutam
analyzed: jijñāsitam su sampannam api te mahat adbhutam

original: BhP_01.05.003/3 kṛtavān bhārataṃ yastvaṃ sarvārthaparibṛṃhitam
analyzed: kṛtavān bhāratam yaḥ tvam sarva artha paribṛṃhitam

original: BhP_01.05.004/1 jijñāsitam adhītaṃ ca brahma yat tat sanātanam
analyzed: jijñāsitam adhītam ca brahma yat tat sanātanam

original: BhP_01.05.004/3 tathāpi śocasyātmānam akṛtārtha iva prabho
analyzed: tathā api śocasi ātmānam akṛtārthaḥ iva prabho

original: BhP_01.05.005/0 vyāsa uvāca
analyzed: vyāsaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.05.005/1 astyeva me sarvam idaṃ tvayoktaṃ tathāpi nātmā parituṣyate me
analyzed: asti eva me sarvam idam tvayā uktam tathā api na ātmā parituṣyate me

original: BhP_01.05.005/3 tanmūlam avyaktam agādhabodhaṃ pṛcchāmahe tvātmabhavātmabhūtam
analyzed: tad mūlam avyaktam agādha bodham pṛcchāmahe tvā ātmabhava ātmabhūtam

original: BhP_01.05.006/1 sa vai bhavān veda samastaguhyam upāsito yat puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ
analyzed: sa vai bhavān veda samasta guhyam upāsitaḥ yat puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ

original: BhP_01.05.006/3 parāvareśo manasaiva viśvaṃ sṛjatyavatyatti guṇairasaṅgaḥ
analyzed: parāvara īśaḥ manasā eva viśvam sṛjati avati atti guṇaiḥ asaṅgaḥ

original: BhP_01.05.007/1 tvaṃ paryaṭann arka iva trilokīm antaścaro vāyurivātmasākṣī
analyzed: tvam paryaṭan arkaḥ iva trilokīm antaścaraḥ vāyuḥ iva ātma sākṣī

original: BhP_01.05.007/3 parāvare brahmaṇi dharmato vrataiḥ snātasya me nyūnam alaṃ vicakṣva
analyzed: parāvare brahmaṇi dharmataḥ vrataiḥ snātasya me nyūnam alam vicakṣva

original: BhP_01.05.008/0 śrīnārada uvāca
analyzed: uvāca

original: BhP_01.05.008/1 bhavatānuditaprāyaṃ yaśo bhagavato 'malam
analyzed: bhavatā anudita prāyam yaśaḥ bhagavataḥ malam

original: BhP_01.05.008/3 yenaivāsau na tuṣyeta manye taddarśanaṃ khilam
analyzed: yena eva asau na tuṣyeta manye tad darśanam khilam

original: BhP_01.05.009/1 yathā dharmādayaścārthā munivaryānukīrtitāḥ
analyzed: yathā dharma ādayaḥ ca arthāḥ muni varya anukīrtitāḥ

original: BhP_01.05.009/3 na tathā vāsudevasya mahimā hyanuvarṇitaḥ
analyzed: na tathā vāsudevasya mahimā hi anuvarṇitaḥ

original: BhP_01.05.010/1 na yadvacaścitrapadaṃ hareryaśo jagatpavitraṃ pragṛṇīta karhicit
analyzed: na yat vacaḥ citra padam hareḥ yaśaḥ jagat pavitram pragṛṇīta karhicit

original: BhP_01.05.010/3 tadvāyasaṃ tīrtham uśanti mānasā na yatra haṃsā niramantyuśikkṣayāḥ
analyzed: tat vāyasam tīrtham uśanti mānasāḥ na yatra haṃsāḥ niramanti uśikkṣayāḥ

original: BhP_01.05.011/1 tadvāgvisargo janatāghaviplavo yasmin pratiślokam abaddhavatyapi
analyzed: tad vāgvisargaḥ janatā agha viplavaḥ yasmin pratiślokam a baddhavatī api

original: BhP_01.05.011/3 nāmānyanantasya yaśo 'ṅkitāni yat śṛṇvanti gāyanti gṛṇanti sādhavaḥ
analyzed: nāmāni anantasya yaśaḥ ṅkitāni yat śṛṇvanti gāyanti gṛṇanti sādhavaḥ

original: BhP_01.05.012/1 naiṣkarmyam apyacyutabhāvavarjitaṃ na śobhate jñānam alaṃ nirañjanam
analyzed: naiṣkarmyam api acyuta bhāva varjitam na śobhate jñānam alam nirañjanam

original: BhP_01.05.012/3 kutaḥ punaḥ śaśvadabhadram īśvare na cārpitaṃ karma yadapyakāraṇam
analyzed: kutas punar śaśvat abhadram īśvare na ca arpitam karma yat api akāraṇam

original: BhP_01.05.013/1 atho mahābhāga bhavān amoghadṛk śuciśravāḥ satyarato dhṛtavrataḥ
analyzed: atho mahābhāga bhavān amogha dṛś śuciśravāḥ satyarataḥ dhṛtavrataḥ

original: BhP_01.05.013/3 urukramasyākhilabandhamuktaye samādhinānusmara tadviceṣṭitam
analyzed: urukramasya akhila bandha muktaye samādhinā anusmara tat viceṣṭitam

original: BhP_01.05.014/1 tato 'nyathā kiñcana yadvivakṣataḥ pṛthag dṛśastatkṛtarūpanāmabhiḥ
analyzed: tatas nyathā kiñcana yat vivakṣataḥ pṛthak dṛśaḥ tad kṛta rūpa nāmabhiḥ

original: BhP_01.05.014/3 na karhicit kvāpi ca duḥsthitā matir labheta vātāhatanaurivāspadam
analyzed: na karhicit kvāpi ca duḥsthitā matiḥ labheta vāta āhata nauḥ iva āspadam

original: BhP_01.05.015/1 jugupsitaṃ dharmakṛte 'nuśāsataḥ svabhāvaraktasya mahān vyatikramaḥ
analyzed: jugupsitam dharma kṛte nuśāsataḥ svabhāva raktasya mahān vyatikramaḥ

original: BhP_01.05.015/3 yadvākyato dharma itītaraḥ sthito na manyate tasya nivāraṇaṃ janaḥ
analyzed: yad vākyataḥ dharmaḥ iti itaraḥ sthitaḥ na manyate tasya nivāraṇam janaḥ

original: BhP_01.05.016/1 vicakṣaṇo 'syārhati vedituṃ vibhor anantapārasya nivṛttitaḥ sukham
analyzed: vicakṣaṇaḥ sya arhati veditum vibhoḥ anantapārasya nivṛttitaḥ sukham

original: BhP_01.05.016/3 pravartamānasya guṇairanātmanas tato bhavān darśaya ceṣṭitaṃ vibhoḥ
analyzed: pravartamānasya guṇaiḥ anātmanaḥ tatas bhavān darśaya ceṣṭitam vibhoḥ

original: BhP_01.05.017/1 tyaktvā svadharmaṃ caraṇāmbujaṃ harer bhajann apakvo 'tha patet tato yadi
analyzed: tyaktvā svadharmam caraṇa ambujam hareḥ bhajan apakvaḥ patet tatas yadi

original: BhP_01.05.017/3 yatra kva vābhadram abhūdamuṣya kiṃ ko vārtha āpto 'bhajatāṃ svadharmataḥ
analyzed: yatra kva vā abhadram abhūt amuṣya kim kaḥ vā arthaḥ āptaḥ bhajatām svadharmataḥ

original: BhP_01.05.018/1 tasyaiva hetoḥ prayateta kovido na labhyate yadbhramatām uparyadhaḥ
analyzed: tasya eva hetoḥ prayateta kovidaḥ na labhyate yat bhramatām upari adhas

original: BhP_01.05.018/3 tal labhyate duḥkhavadanyataḥ sukhaṃ kālena sarvatra gabhīraraṃhasā
analyzed: tat labhyate duḥkha vat anyatas sukham kālena sarvatra gabhīra raṃhasā

original: BhP_01.05.019/1 na vai jano jātu kathañcanāvrajen mukundasevyanyavadaṅga saṃsṛtim
analyzed: na vai janaḥ jātu kathañcana āvrajet mukunda sevi anya vat aṅga saṃsṛtim

original: BhP_01.05.019/3 smaran mukundāṅghryupagūhanaṃ punar vihātum icchen na rasagraho janaḥ
analyzed: smaran mukunda aṅghri upagūhanam punar vihātum icchet na rasagrahaḥ janaḥ

original: BhP_01.05.020/1 idaṃ hi viśvaṃ bhagavān ivetaro yato jagatsthānanirodhasambhavāḥ
analyzed: idam hi viśvam bhagavān iva itaraḥ yatas jagat sthāna nirodha sambhavāḥ

original: BhP_01.05.020/3 taddhi svayaṃ veda bhavāṃstathāpi te prādeśamātraṃ bhavataḥ pradarśitam
analyzed: tat hi svayam veda bhavān tathā api te prādeśa mātram bhavataḥ pradarśitam

original: BhP_01.05.021/1 tvam ātmanātmānam avehyamoghadṛk parasya puṃsaḥ paramātmanaḥ kalām
analyzed: tvam ātmanā ātmānam avehi amogha dṛś parasya puṃsaḥ paramātmanaḥ kalām

original: BhP_01.05.021/3 ajaṃ prajātaṃ jagataḥ śivāya tan mahānubhāvābhyudayo 'dhigaṇyatām
analyzed: ajam prajātam jagataḥ śivāya tat mahā anubhāva abhyudayaḥ dhigaṇyatām

original: BhP_01.05.022/1 idaṃ hi puṃsastapasaḥ śrutasya vā sviṣṭasya sūktasya ca buddhidattayoḥ
analyzed: idam hi puṃsaḥ tapasaḥ śrutasya vā su iṣṭasya sūktasya ca buddhi dattayoḥ

original: BhP_01.05.022/3 avicyuto 'rthaḥ kavibhirnirūpito yaduttamaślokaguṇānuvarṇanam
analyzed: avicyutaḥ ṛthaḥ kavibhiḥ nirūpitaḥ yat uttamaśloka guṇa anuvarṇanam

original: BhP_01.05.023/1 ahaṃ purātītabhave 'bhavaṃ mune dāsyāstu kasyāścana vedavādinām
analyzed: aham purā atīta bhave bhavam mune dāsyāḥ tu kasyāścana veda vādinām

original: BhP_01.05.023/3 nirūpito bālaka eva yogināṃ śuśrūṣaṇe prāvṛṣi nirvivikṣatām
analyzed: nirūpitaḥ bālakaḥ eva yoginām śuśrūṣaṇe prāvṛṣi nirvivikṣatām

original: BhP_01.05.024/1 te mayyapetākhilacāpale 'rbhake dānte 'dhṛtakrīḍanake 'nuvartini
analyzed: te mayi apeta akhila cāpale ṛbhake dānte dhṛta krīḍanake nuvartini

original: BhP_01.05.024/3 cakruḥ kṛpāṃ yadyapi tulyadarśanāḥ śuśrūṣamāṇe munayo 'lpabhāṣiṇi
analyzed: cakruḥ kṛpām yadi api tulya darśanāḥ śuśrūṣamāṇe munayaḥ lpa bhāṣiṇi

original: BhP_01.05.025/1 ucchiṣṭalepān anumodito dvijaiḥ sakṛt sma bhuñje tadapāstakilbiṣaḥ
analyzed: ucchiṣṭa lepān anumoditaḥ dvijaiḥ sakṛt sma bhuñje tad apāsta kilbiṣaḥ

original: BhP_01.05.025/3 evaṃ pravṛttasya viśuddhacetasas taddharma evātmaruciḥ prajāyate
analyzed: evam pravṛttasya viśuddha cetasaḥ tad dharme eva ātma ruciḥ prajāyate

original: BhP_01.05.026/1 tatrānvahaṃ kṛṣṇakathāḥ pragāyatām anugraheṇāśṛṇavaṃ manoharāḥ
analyzed: tatra anvaham kṛṣṇa kathāḥ pragāyatām anugraheṇa aśṛṇavam manoharāḥ

original: BhP_01.05.026/3 tāḥ śraddhayā me 'nupadaṃ viśṛṇvataḥ priyaśravasyaṅga mamābhavadruciḥ
analyzed: tāḥ śraddhayā me nu padam viśṛṇvataḥ priyaśravasi aṅga mama abhavat ruciḥ

original: BhP_01.05.027/1 tasmiṃstadā labdharucermahāmate priyaśravasyaskhalitā matirmama
analyzed: tasmin tadā labdha ruceḥ mahāmate priyaśravasi askhalitā matiḥ mama

original: BhP_01.05.027/3 yayāham etat sadasat svamāyayā paśye mayi brahmaṇi kalpitaṃ pare
analyzed: yayā aham etat sadasat sva māyayā paśye mayi brahmaṇi kalpitam pare

original: BhP_01.05.028/1 itthaṃ śaratprāvṛṣikāvṛtū harer viśṛṇvato me 'nusavaṃ yaśo 'malam
analyzed: ittham śarad prāvṛṣikau ṛtū hareḥ viśṛṇvataḥ me yaśaḥ malam

original: BhP_01.05.028/3 saṅkīrtyamānaṃ munibhirmahātmabhir bhaktiḥ pravṛttātmarajastamopahā
analyzed: saṅkīrtyamānam munibhiḥ mahātmabhiḥ bhaktiḥ pravṛttā ātma rajaḥ tamaḥ upahā

original: BhP_01.05.029/1 tasyaivaṃ me 'nuraktasya praśritasya hatainasaḥ
analyzed: tasya evam me nuraktasya praśritasya hata enasaḥ

original: BhP_01.05.029/3 śraddadhānasya bālasya dāntasyānucarasya ca
analyzed: śraddadhānasya bālasya dāntasya anucarasya ca

original: BhP_01.05.030/1 jñānaṃ guhyatamaṃ yat tat sākṣādbhagavatoditam
analyzed: jñānam guhyatamam yat tat sākṣāt bhagavatā uditam

original: BhP_01.05.030/3 anvavocan gamiṣyantaḥ kṛpayā dīnavatsalāḥ
analyzed: anvavocan gamiṣyantaḥ kṛpayā dīna vatsalāḥ

original: BhP_01.05.031/1 yenaivāhaṃ bhagavato vāsudevasya vedhasaḥ
analyzed: yena eva aham bhagavataḥ vāsudevasya vedhasaḥ

original: BhP_01.05.031/3 māyānubhāvam avidaṃ yena gacchanti tatpadam
analyzed: māyā anubhāvam avidam yena gacchanti tat padam

original: BhP_01.05.032/1 etat saṃsūcitaṃ brahmaṃstāpatrayacikitsitam
analyzed: etat saṃsūcitam brahman tāpa traya cikitsitam

original: BhP_01.05.032/3 yadīśvare bhagavati karma brahmaṇi bhāvitam
analyzed: yadi īśvare bhagavati karma brahmaṇi bhāvitam

original: BhP_01.05.033/1 āmayo yaśca bhūtānāṃ jāyate yena suvrata
analyzed: āmayaḥ yaḥ ca bhūtānām jāyate yena suvrata

original: BhP_01.05.033/3 tadeva hyāmayaṃ dravyaṃ na punāti cikitsitam
analyzed: tat eva hi āmayam dravyam na punāti cikitsitam

original: BhP_01.05.034/1 evaṃ nṛṇāṃ kriyāyogāḥ sarve saṃsṛtihetavaḥ
analyzed: evam nṛṇām kriyāyogāḥ sarve saṃsṛti hetavaḥ

original: BhP_01.05.034/3 ta evātmavināśāya kalpante kalpitāḥ pare
analyzed: te eva ātma vināśāya kalpante kalpitāḥ pare

original: BhP_01.05.035/1 yadatra kriyate karma bhagavatparitoṣaṇam
analyzed: yat atra kriyate karma bhagavat paritoṣaṇam

original: BhP_01.05.035/3 jñānaṃ yat tadadhīnaṃ hi bhaktiyogasamanvitam
analyzed: jñānam yat tad adhīnam hi bhakti yoga samanvitam

original: BhP_01.05.036/1 kurvāṇā yatra karmāṇi bhagavacchikṣayāsakṛt
analyzed: kurvāṇāḥ yatra karmāṇi bhagavat śikṣayā asakṛt

original: BhP_01.05.036/3 gṛṇanti guṇanāmāni kṛṣṇasyānusmaranti ca
analyzed: gṛṇanti guṇa nāmāni kṛṣṇasya anusmaranti ca

original: BhP_01.05.037/1 oṃ namo bhagavate tubhyaṃ vāsudevāya dhīmahi
analyzed: om namaḥ bhagavate tubhyam vāsudevāya dhīmahi

original: BhP_01.05.037/3 pradyumnāyāniruddhāya namaḥ saṅkarṣaṇāya ca
analyzed: pradyumnāya aniruddhāya namaḥ saṅkarṣaṇāya ca

original: BhP_01.05.038/1 iti mūrtyabhidhānena mantramūrtim amūrtikam
analyzed: iti mūrti abhidhānena mantramūrtim amūrtikam

original: BhP_01.05.038/3 yajate yajñapuruṣaṃ sa samyag darśanaḥ pumān
analyzed: yajate yajñapuruṣam sa samyak darśanaḥ pumān

original: BhP_01.05.039/1 imaṃ svanigamaṃ brahmann avetya madanuṣṭhitam
analyzed: imam sva nigamam brahman avetya mad anuṣṭhitam

original: BhP_01.05.039/3 adān me jñānam aiśvaryaṃ svasmin bhāvaṃ ca keśavaḥ
analyzed: adāt me jñānam aiśvaryam svasmin bhāvam ca keśavaḥ

original: BhP_01.05.040/1 tvam apyadabhraśruta viśrutaṃ vibhoḥ samāpyate yena vidāṃ bubhutsitam
analyzed: tvam api adabhra śruta viśrutam vibhoḥ samāpyate yena vidām bubhutsitam

original: BhP_01.05.040/3 prākhyāhi duḥkhairmuhurarditātmanāṃ saṅkleśanirvāṇam uśanti nānyathā
analyzed: prākhyāhi duḥkhaiḥ muhur ardita ātmanām saṅkleśa nirvāṇam uśanti nā anyathā

original: BhP_01.06.001/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.06.001/1 evaṃ niśamya bhagavān devarṣerjanma karma ca
analyzed: evam niśamya bhagavān devarṣeḥ janma karma ca

original: BhP_01.06.001/3 bhūyaḥ papraccha taṃ brahman vyāsaḥ satyavatīsutaḥ
analyzed: bhūyas papraccha tam brahman vyāsaḥ satyavatī sutaḥ

original: BhP_01.06.002/0 vyāsa uvāca
analyzed: vyāsaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.06.002/1 bhikṣubhirvipravasite vijñānādeṣṭṛbhistava
analyzed: bhikṣubhiḥ vipravasite vijñāna ādeṣṭṛbhiḥ tava

original: BhP_01.06.002/3 vartamāno vayasyādye tataḥ kim akarodbhavān
analyzed: vartamānaḥ vayasi ādye tatas kim akarot bhavān

original: BhP_01.06.003/1 svāyambhuva kayā vṛttyā vartitaṃ te paraṃ vayaḥ
analyzed: svāyambhuva kayā vṛttyā vartitam te param vayaḥ

original: BhP_01.06.003/3 kathaṃ cedam udasrākṣīḥ kāle prāpte kalevaram
analyzed: katham ca idam udasrākṣīḥ kāle prāpte kalevaram

original: BhP_01.06.004/1 prākkalpaviṣayām etāṃ smṛtiṃ te munisattama
analyzed: prākkalpa viṣayām etām smṛtim te muni sattama

original: BhP_01.06.004/3 na hyeṣa vyavadhāt kāla eṣa sarvanirākṛtiḥ
analyzed: na hi eṣa kālaḥ eṣa sarva nirākṛtiḥ

original: BhP_01.06.005/0 nārada uvāca
analyzed: nāradaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.06.005/1 bhikṣubhirvipravasite vijñānādeṣṭṛbhirmama
analyzed: bhikṣubhiḥ vipravasite vijñāna ādeṣṭṛbhiḥ mama

original: BhP_01.06.005/3 vartamāno vayasyādye tata etadakāraṣam
analyzed: vartamānaḥ vayasi ādye tatas etat akāraṣam

original: BhP_01.06.006/1 ekātmajā me jananī yoṣin mūḍhā ca kiṅkarī
analyzed: eka ātmajā me jananī yoṣit mūḍhā ca kiṅkarī

original: BhP_01.06.006/3 mayyātmaje 'nanyagatau cakre snehānubandhanam
analyzed: mayi ātmaje cakre sneha anubandhanam

original: BhP_01.06.007/1 sāsvatantrā na kalpāsīdyogakṣemaṃ mamecchatī
analyzed: sā asvatantrā na kalpā āsīt yogakṣemam mama icchatī

original: BhP_01.06.007/3 īśasya hi vaśe loko yoṣā dārumayī yathā
analyzed: īśasya hi vaśe lokaḥ yoṣā dāru mayī yathā

original: BhP_01.06.008/1 ahaṃ ca tadbrahmakule ūṣivāṃstadupekṣayā
analyzed: aham ca tad brahmakule ūṣivān tad upekṣayā

original: BhP_01.06.008/3 digdeśakālāvyutpanno bālakaḥ pañcahāyanaḥ
BhP_01.06.009/1 ekadā nirgatāṃ gehādduhantīṃ niśi gāṃ pathi
analyzed: ekadā nirgatām gehāt duhantīm niśi gām pathi

original: BhP_01.06.009/3 sarpo 'daśat padā spṛṣṭaḥ kṛpaṇāṃ kālacoditaḥ
analyzed: sarpaḥ daśat spṛṣṭaḥ kṛpaṇām kāla coditaḥ

original: BhP_01.06.010/1 tadā tadaham īśasya bhaktānāṃ śam abhīpsataḥ
analyzed: tadā tat aham īśasya bhaktānām śam abhīpsataḥ

original: BhP_01.06.010/3 anugrahaṃ manyamānaḥ prātiṣṭhaṃ diśam uttarām
analyzed: anugraham manyamānaḥ prātiṣṭham diśam uttarām

original: BhP_01.06.011/1 sphītāñ janapadāṃstatra puragrāmavrajākarān
analyzed: sphītām janapadān tatra pura grāma vraja ākarān

original: BhP_01.06.011/3 kheṭakharvaṭavāṭīśca vanānyupavanāni ca
analyzed: kheṭa kharvaṭa vāṭīḥ ca vanāni upavanāni ca

original: BhP_01.06.012/1 citradhātuvicitrādrīn ibhabhagnabhujadrumān
analyzed: citra dhātu vicitra adrīn ibha bhagna bhuja drumān

original: BhP_01.06.012/3 jalāśayāñ chivajalān nalinīḥ surasevitāḥ
analyzed: nalinīḥ sura sevitāḥ

original: BhP_01.06.013/1 citrasvanaiḥ patrarathairvibhramadbhramaraśriyaḥ
analyzed: citra svanaiḥ patrarathaiḥ vibhramat bhramara śriyaḥ

original: BhP_01.06.013/3 nalaveṇuśarastanba kuśakīcakagahvaram
analyzed: kuśa kīcaka gahvaram

original: BhP_01.06.014/1 eka evātiyāto 'ham adrākṣaṃ vipinaṃ mahat
analyzed: ekaḥ eva atiyātaḥ ham adrākṣam vipinam mahat

original: BhP_01.06.014/3 ghoraṃ pratibhayākāraṃ vyālolūkaśivājiram
analyzed: ghoram pratibhayā ākāram vyāla ulūka śivā ajiram

original: BhP_01.06.015/1 pariśrāntendriyātmāhaṃ tṛṭparīto bubhukṣitaḥ
analyzed: pariśrānta indriya ātmā aham tṛṣ parītaḥ bubhukṣitaḥ

original: BhP_01.06.015/3 snātvā pītvā hrade nadyā upaspṛṣṭo gataśramaḥ
analyzed: snātvā pītvā hrade nadyāḥ upaspṛṣṭaḥ gata śramaḥ

original: BhP_01.06.016/1 tasmin nirmanuje 'raṇye pippalopastha āśritaḥ
analyzed: tasmin nirmanuje raṇye pippala upasthaḥ āśritaḥ

original: BhP_01.06.016/3 ātmanātmānam ātmasthaṃ yathāśrutam acintayam
analyzed: ātmanā ātmānam ātma stham yathāśrutam acintayam

original: BhP_01.06.017/1 dhyāyataścaraṇāmbhojaṃ bhāvanirjitacetasā
analyzed: dhyāyataḥ caraṇa ambhojam bhāva nirjita cetasā

original: BhP_01.06.017/3 autkaṇṭhyāśrukalākṣasya hṛdyāsīn me śanairhariḥ
analyzed: autkaṇṭhya aśru kalā akṣasya hṛdi āsīt me śanais hariḥ

original: BhP_01.06.018/1 premātibharanirbhinna pulakāṅgo 'tinirvṛtaḥ
analyzed: prema atibhara nirbhinna ti nirvṛtaḥ

original: BhP_01.06.018/3 ānandasamplave līno nāpaśyam ubhayaṃ mune
analyzed: ānanda samplave līnaḥ na apaśyam ubhayam mune

original: BhP_01.06.019/1 rūpaṃ bhagavato yat tan manaḥkāntaṃ śucāpaham
analyzed: rūpam bhagavataḥ yat tat manaḥ kāntam śucā apaham

original: BhP_01.06.019/3 apaśyan sahasottasthe vaiklavyāddurmanā iva
analyzed: a paśyan sahasā uttasthe vaiklavyāt durmanāḥ iva

original: BhP_01.06.020/1 didṛkṣustadahaṃ bhūyaḥ praṇidhāya mano hṛdi
analyzed: didṛkṣuḥ tat aham bhūyas praṇidhāya manaḥ hṛdi

original: BhP_01.06.020/3 vīkṣamāṇo 'pi nāpaśyam avitṛpta ivāturaḥ
analyzed: vīkṣamāṇaḥ pi na apaśyam a vitṛptaḥ iva āturaḥ

original: BhP_01.06.021/1 evaṃ yatantaṃ vijane mām āhāgocaro girām
analyzed: evam yatantam vijane mām āha agocaraḥ girām

original: BhP_01.06.021/3 gambhīraślakṣṇayā vācā śucaḥ praśamayann iva
analyzed: gambhīra ślakṣṇayā vācā śucaḥ praśamayan iva

original: BhP_01.06.022/1 hantāsmiñ janmani bhavān mā māṃ draṣṭum ihārhati
analyzed: hanta asmin janmani bhavān mā mām draṣṭum iha arhati

original: BhP_01.06.022/3 avipakvakaṣāyāṇāṃ durdarśo 'haṃ kuyoginām
analyzed: avipakva kaṣāyāṇām durdarśaḥ ham ku yoginām

original: BhP_01.06.023/1 sakṛdyaddarśitaṃ rūpam etat kāmāya te 'nagha
analyzed: sakṛt yad darśitam rūpam etat kāmāya te nagha

original: BhP_01.06.023/3 matkāmaḥ śanakaiḥ sādhu sarvān muñcati hṛcchayān
analyzed: mad kāmaḥ śanakais sādhu sarvān muñcati hṛcchayān

original: BhP_01.06.024/1 satsevayādīrghayāpi jātā mayi dṛḍhā matiḥ
analyzed: satsevayā adīrghayā api jātā mayi dṛḍhā matiḥ

original: BhP_01.06.024/3 hitvāvadyam imaṃ lokaṃ gantā majjanatām asi
analyzed: hitvā avadyam imam lokam gantā mad janatām asi

original: BhP_01.06.025/1 matirmayi nibaddheyaṃ na vipadyeta karhicit
analyzed: matiḥ mayi nibaddhā iyam na vipadyeta karhicit

original: BhP_01.06.025/3 prajāsarganirodhe 'pi smṛtiśca madanugrahāt
analyzed: prajā sarga nirodhe smṛtiḥ ca mad anugrahāt

original: BhP_01.06.026/1 etāvaduktvopararāma tan mahad bhūtaṃ nabholiṅgam aliṅgam īśvaram
analyzed: etāvat uktvā upararāma tat mahat bhūtam nabhaḥ liṅgam aliṅgam īśvaram

original: BhP_01.06.026/3 ahaṃ ca tasmai mahatāṃ mahīyase śīrṣṇāvanāmaṃ vidadhe 'nukampitaḥ
analyzed: aham ca tasmai mahatām mahīyase vidadhe nukampitaḥ

original: BhP_01.06.027/1 nāmānyanantasya hatatrapaḥ paṭhan guhyāni bhadrāṇi kṛtāni ca smaran
analyzed: nāmāni anantasya hata trapaḥ paṭhan guhyāni bhadrāṇi kṛtāni ca smaran

original: BhP_01.06.027/3 gāṃ paryaṭaṃstuṣṭamanā gataspṛhaḥ kālaṃ pratīkṣan vimado vimatsaraḥ
analyzed: gām paryaṭan tuṣṭa manāḥ gata spṛhaḥ kālam pratīkṣan vimadaḥ vimatsaraḥ

original: BhP_01.06.028/1 evaṃ kṛṣṇamaterbrahman nāsaktasyāmalātmanaḥ
analyzed: evam kṛṣṇa mateḥ brahman na āsaktasya amala ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_01.06.028/3 kālaḥ prādurabhūt kāle taḍit saudāmanī yathā
analyzed: kālaḥ prādurabhūt kāle taḍit saudāmanī yathā

original: BhP_01.06.029/1 prayujyamāne mayi tāṃ śuddhāṃ bhāgavatīṃ tanum
analyzed: prayujyamāne mayi tām śuddhām bhāgavatīm tanum

original: BhP_01.06.029/3 ārabdhakarmanirvāṇo nyapatat pāñcabhautikaḥ
analyzed: ārabdha karma nirvāṇaḥ nyapatat pāñcabhautikaḥ

original: BhP_01.06.030/1 kalpānta idam ādāya śayāne 'mbhasyudanvataḥ
analyzed: kalpānte idam ādāya śayāne mbhasi udanvataḥ

original: BhP_01.06.030/3 śiśayiṣoranuprāṇaṃ viviśe 'ntarahaṃ vibhoḥ
analyzed: śiśayiṣoḥ anuprāṇam viviśe ntar aham vibhoḥ

original: BhP_01.06.031/1 sahasrayugaparyante utthāyedaṃ sisṛkṣataḥ
analyzed: sahasra yuga paryante utthāya idam sisṛkṣataḥ

original: BhP_01.06.031/3 marīcimiśrā ṛṣayaḥ prāṇebhyo 'haṃ ca jajñire
analyzed: marīci miśrāḥ ṛṣayaḥ prāṇebhyaḥ haṃ ca jajñire

original: BhP_01.06.032/1 antarbahiśca lokāṃstrīn paryemyaskanditavrataḥ
analyzed: antar bahis ca lokān trīn paryemi askandita vrataḥ

original: BhP_01.06.032/3 anugrahān mahāviṣṇoravighātagatiḥ kvacit
analyzed: anugrahāt mahā viṣṇoḥ avighāta gatiḥ kvacid

original: BhP_01.06.033/1 devadattām imāṃ vīṇāṃ svarabrahmavibhūṣitām
analyzed: deva dattām imām vīṇām svarabrahma vibhūṣitām

original: BhP_01.06.033/3 mūrcchayitvā harikathāṃ gāyamānaścarāmyaham
analyzed: mūrcchayitvā hari kathām gāyamānaḥ carāmi aham

original: BhP_01.06.034/1 pragāyataḥ svavīryāṇi tīrthapādaḥ priyaśravāḥ
analyzed: pragāyataḥ sva vīryāṇi tīrthapādaḥ priyaśravāḥ

original: BhP_01.06.034/3 āhūta iva me śīghraṃ darśanaṃ yāti cetasi
analyzed: āhūtaḥ iva me śīghram darśanam yāti cetasi

original: BhP_01.06.035/1 etaddhyāturacittānāṃ mātrāsparśecchayā muhuḥ
analyzed: etad dhyātuḥ acittānām mātrā sparśa icchayā muhur

original: BhP_01.06.035/3 bhavasindhuplavo dṛṣṭo haricaryānuvarṇanam
BhP_01.06.036/1 yamādibhiryogapathaiḥ kāmalobhahato muhuḥ
analyzed: yama ādibhiḥ yogapathaiḥ kāma lobha hataḥ muhur

original: BhP_01.06.036/3 mukundasevayā yadvat tathātmāddhā na śāmyati
analyzed: mukunda sevayā yadvat tathā ātmā addhā na śāmyati

original: BhP_01.06.037/1 sarvaṃ tadidam ākhyātaṃ yat pṛṣṭo 'haṃ tvayānagha
analyzed: sarvam tat idam ākhyātam yat pṛṣṭaḥ ham tvayā anagha

original: BhP_01.06.037/3 janmakarmarahasyaṃ me bhavataścātmatoṣaṇam
analyzed: janma karma rahasyam me bhavataḥ ca ātma toṣaṇam

original: BhP_01.06.038/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.06.038/1 evaṃ sambhāṣya bhagavān nārado vāsavīsutam
analyzed: evam sambhāṣya bhagavān nāradaḥ vāsavī sutam

original: BhP_01.06.038/3 āmantrya vīṇāṃ raṇayan yayau yādṛcchiko muniḥ
analyzed: āmantrya vīṇām raṇayan yayau yādṛcchikaḥ muniḥ

original: BhP_01.06.039/1 aho devarṣirdhanyo 'yaṃ yatkīrtiṃ śārṅgadhanvanaḥ
analyzed: aho devarṣiḥ dhanyaḥ yam yat kīrtim śārṅgadhanvanaḥ

original: BhP_01.06.039/3 gāyan mādyann idaṃ tantryā ramayatyāturaṃ jagat
analyzed: gāyan mādyan idam tantryā ramayati āturam jagat

original: BhP_01.07.001/0 śaunaka uvāca
analyzed: śaunakaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.07.001/1 nirgate nārade sūta bhagavān bādarāyaṇaḥ
analyzed: nirgate nārade sūta bhagavān bādarāyaṇaḥ

original: BhP_01.07.001/1 śrutavāṃstadabhipretaṃ tataḥ kim akarodvibhuḥ
analyzed: śrutavān tad abhipretam tatas kim akarot vibhuḥ

original: BhP_01.07.002/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.07.002/1 brahmanadyāṃ sarasvatyām āśramaḥ paścime taṭe
analyzed: brahmanadyām sarasvatyām āśramaḥ paścime taṭe

original: BhP_01.07.002/3 śamyāprāsa iti prokta ṛṣīṇāṃ satravardhanaḥ
analyzed: śamyāprāsaḥ iti proktaḥ ṛṣīṇām satravardhanaḥ

original: BhP_01.07.003/1 tasmin sva āśrame vyāso badarīṣaṇḍamaṇḍite
analyzed: tasmin sve āśrame vyāsaḥ badarī ṣaṇḍa maṇḍite

original: BhP_01.07.003/3 āsīno 'pa upaspṛśya praṇidadhyau manaḥ svayam
analyzed: āsīnā u pa upaspṛśya praṇidadhyau manaḥ svayam

original: BhP_01.07.004/1 bhaktiyogena manasi samyak praṇihite 'male
analyzed: bhakti yogena manasi samyak praṇihite male

original: BhP_01.07.004/3 apaśyat puruṣaṃ pūrṇaṃ māyāṃ ca tadapāśrayam
analyzed: apaśyat puruṣam pūrṇam māyām ca tad apāśrayam

original: BhP_01.07.005/1 yayā sammohito jīva ātmānaṃ triguṇātmakam
analyzed: yayā sammohitaḥ jīvaḥ ātmānam triguṇa ātmakam

original: BhP_01.07.005/3 paro 'pi manute 'narthaṃ tatkṛtaṃ cābhipadyate
analyzed: paraḥ pi manute nartham tat kṛtam ca abhipadyate

original: BhP_01.07.006/1 anarthopaśamaṃ sākṣādbhaktiyogam adhokṣaje
analyzed: anartha upaśamam sākṣāt bhaktiyogam adhokṣaje

original: BhP_01.07.006/3 lokasyājānato vidvāṃścakre sātvatasaṃhitām
analyzed: lokasya a jānataḥ vidvān cakre sātvatasaṃhitām

original: BhP_01.07.007/1 yasyāṃ vai śrūyamāṇāyāṃ kṛṣṇe paramapūruṣe
analyzed: yasyām vai śrūyamāṇāyām kṛṣṇe parama pūruṣe

original: BhP_01.07.007/3 bhaktirutpadyate puṃsaḥ śokamohabhayāpahā
analyzed: bhaktiḥ utpadyate puṃsaḥ śoka moha bhaya apahā

original: BhP_01.07.008/1 sa saṃhitāṃ bhāgavatīṃ kṛtvānukramya cātmajam
analyzed: sa saṃhitām bhāgavatīm kṛtvā anukramya ca ātmajam

original: BhP_01.07.008/3 śukam adhyāpayām āsa nivṛttinirataṃ muniḥ
analyzed: śukam adhyāpayām āsa nivṛtti niratam muniḥ

original: BhP_01.07.009/0 śaunaka uvāca
analyzed: śaunakaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.07.009/1 sa vai nivṛttinirataḥ sarvatropekṣako muniḥ
analyzed: sa vai nivṛtti nirataḥ sarvatra upekṣakaḥ muniḥ

original: BhP_01.07.009/3 kasya vā bṛhatīm etām ātmārāmaḥ samabhyasat
analyzed: kasya vā bṛhatīm etām ātma ārāmaḥ

original: BhP_01.07.010/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.07.010/1 ātmārāmāśca munayo nirgranthā apyurukrame
analyzed: ātma ārāmāḥ ca munayaḥ nirgranthāḥ api urukrame

original: BhP_01.07.010/3 kurvantyahaitukīṃ bhaktim itthambhūtaguṇo hariḥ
analyzed: kurvanti ahaitukīm bhaktim ittham bhūta guṇaḥ hariḥ

original: BhP_01.07.011/1 harerguṇākṣiptamatirbhagavān bādarāyaṇiḥ
analyzed: hareḥ guṇa ākṣipta matiḥ bhagavān bādarāyaṇiḥ

original: BhP_01.07.011/3 adhyagān mahadākhyānaṃ nityaṃ viṣṇujanapriyaḥ
analyzed: adhyagāt mahat ākhyānam nityam viṣṇu jana priyaḥ

original: BhP_01.07.012/1 parīkṣito 'tha rājarṣerjanmakarmavilāpanam
analyzed: rājarṣeḥ janma karma vilāpanam

original: BhP_01.07.012/3 saṃsthāṃ ca pāṇḍuputrāṇāṃ vakṣye kṛṣṇakathodayam
analyzed: saṃsthām ca pāṇḍu putrāṇām vakṣye kṛṣṇa kathā udayam

original: BhP_01.07.013/1 yadā mṛdhe kauravasṛñjayānāṃ vīreṣvatho vīragatiṃ gateṣu
analyzed: yadā mṛdhe kaurava sṛñjayānām vīreṣu atho vīragatim gateṣu

original: BhP_01.07.013/3 vṛkodarāviddhagadābhimarśa bhagnorudaṇḍe dhṛtarāṣṭraputre
analyzed: vṛkodara āviddha gada abhimarśa bhagnorudaṇḍe dhṛtarāṣṭra putre

original: BhP_01.07.014/1 bhartuḥ priyaṃ drauṇiriti sma paśyan kṛṣṇāsutānāṃ svapatāṃ śirāṃsi
analyzed: bhartuḥ priyam drauṇiḥ iti sma paśyan kṛṣṇā sutānām svapatām śirāṃsi

original: BhP_01.07.014/3 upāharadvipriyam eva tasya jugupsitaṃ karma vigarhayanti
analyzed: upāharat vipriyam eva tasya jugupsitam karma vigarhayanti

original: BhP_01.07.015/1 mātā śiśūnāṃ nidhanaṃ sutānāṃ niśamya ghoraṃ paritapyamānā
analyzed: mātā śiśūnām nidhanam sutānām niśamya ghoram paritapyamānā

original: BhP_01.07.015/3 tadārudadvāṣpakalākulākṣī tāṃ sāntvayann āha kirīṭamālī
analyzed: tadā arudat vāṣpa kalā ākula akṣī tām sāntvayan āha kirīṭamālī

original: BhP_01.07.016/1 tadā śucaste pramṛjāmi bhadre yadbrahmabandhoḥ śira ātatāyinaḥ
analyzed: tadā śucaḥ te pramṛjāmi bhadre yat brahmabandhoḥ śiraḥ ātatāyinaḥ

original: BhP_01.07.016/3 gāṇḍīvamuktairviśikhairupāhare tvākramya yat snāsyasi dagdhaputrā
analyzed: gāṇḍīva muktaiḥ viśikhaiḥ upāhare tvā ākramya yat snāsyasi dagdha putrā

original: BhP_01.07.017/1 iti priyāṃ valguvicitrajalpaiḥ sa sāntvayitvācyutamitrasūtaḥ
analyzed: iti priyām valgu vicitra jalpaiḥ sa sāntvayitvā acyuta mitra sūtaḥ

original: BhP_01.07.017/3 anvādravaddaṃśita ugradhanvā kapidhvajo guruputraṃ rathena
analyzed: anvādravat daṃśitaḥ ugra dhanvā kapidhvajaḥ guru putram rathena

original: BhP_01.07.018/1 tam āpatantaṃ sa vilakṣya dūrāt kumārahodvignamanā rathena
analyzed: tam āpatantam sa vilakṣya dūrāt kumāra hā udvigna manāḥ rathena

original: BhP_01.07.018/3 parādravat prāṇaparīpsururvyāṃ yāvadgamaṃ rudrabhayādyathā kaḥ
analyzed: parādravat prāṇa parīpsuḥ urvyām yāvadgamam rudra bhayāt yathā kaḥ

original: BhP_01.07.019/1 yadāśaraṇam ātmānam aikṣata śrāntavājinam
analyzed: yadā śaraṇam ātmānam aikṣata śrānta vājinam

original: BhP_01.07.019/3 astraṃ brahmaśiro mene ātmatrāṇaṃ dvijātmajaḥ
analyzed: astram brahmaśiraḥ mene ātma trāṇam dvija ātmajaḥ

original: BhP_01.07.020/1 athopaspṛśya salilaṃ sandadhe tat samāhitaḥ
analyzed: atha upaspṛśya salilam sandadhe tat samāhitaḥ

original: BhP_01.07.020/3 ajānann api saṃhāraṃ prāṇakṛcchra upasthite
analyzed: a jānan api saṃhāram prāṇa kṛcchre upasthite

original: BhP_01.07.021/1 tataḥ prāduṣkṛtaṃ tejaḥ pracaṇḍaṃ sarvato diśam
analyzed: tatas prāduṣkṛtam tejaḥ pracaṇḍam sarvatas diśam

original: BhP_01.07.021/3 prāṇāpadam abhiprekṣya viṣṇuṃ jiṣṇuruvāca ha
analyzed: prāṇa āpadam abhiprekṣya viṣṇum jiṣṇuḥ uvāca ha

original: BhP_01.07.022/0 arjuna uvāca
analyzed: arjunaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.07.022/1 kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa mahābāho bhaktānām abhayaṅkara
analyzed: kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa mahā bāho bhaktānām abhayaṅkara

original: BhP_01.07.022/3 tvam eko dahyamānānām apavargo 'si saṃsṛteḥ
analyzed: tvam ekaḥ dahyamānānām si saṃsṛteḥ

original: BhP_01.07.023/1 tvam ādyaḥ puruṣaḥ sākṣādīśvaraḥ prakṛteḥ paraḥ
analyzed: tvam ādyaḥ puruṣaḥ sākṣāt īśvaraḥ prakṛteḥ paraḥ

original: BhP_01.07.023/3 māyāṃ vyudasya cicchaktyā kaivalye sthita ātmani
analyzed: māyām vyudasya cicchaktyā kaivalye sthitaḥ ātmani

original: BhP_01.07.024/1 sa eva jīvalokasya māyāmohitacetasaḥ
analyzed: saḥ eva jīva lokasya māyā mohita cetasaḥ

original: BhP_01.07.024/3 vidhatse svena vīryeṇa śreyo dharmādilakṣaṇam
analyzed: vidhatse svena vīryeṇa śreyaḥ dharma ādi lakṣaṇam

original: BhP_01.07.025/1 tathāyaṃ cāvatāraste bhuvo bhārajihīrṣayā
analyzed: tathā ayam ca avatāraḥ te bhuvaḥ bhāra jihīrṣayā

original: BhP_01.07.025/3 svānāṃ cānanyabhāvānām anudhyānāya cāsakṛt
analyzed: svānām ca ananya bhāvānām anudhyānāya ca asakṛt

original: BhP_01.07.026/1 kim idaṃ svit kuto veti devadeva na vedmyaham
analyzed: kim idam svid kutas vā iti devadeva na vedmi aham

original: BhP_01.07.026/3 sarvato mukham āyāti tejaḥ paramadāruṇam
analyzed: sarvatas mukham āyāti tejaḥ parama dāruṇam

original: BhP_01.07.027/0 śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_01.07.027/1 vetthedaṃ droṇaputrasya brāhmam astraṃ pradarśitam
analyzed: vā itthā idam droṇaputrasya brāhmam astram pradarśitam

original: BhP_01.07.027/3 naivāsau veda saṃhāraṃ prāṇabādha upasthite
analyzed: na eva asau veda saṃhāram prāṇa bādhe upasthite

original: BhP_01.07.028/1 na hyasyānyatamaṃ kiñcidastraṃ pratyavakarśanam
analyzed: na hi asya anyatamam kiñcid astram pratyavakarśanam

original: BhP_01.07.028/3 jahyastrateja unnaddham astrajño hyastratejasā
analyzed: jahi astra tejaḥ unnaddham astra jñaḥ hi astra tejasā

original: BhP_01.07.029/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.07.029/1 śrutvā bhagavatā proktaṃ phālgunaḥ paravīrahā
analyzed: śrutvā bhagavatā proktam phālgunaḥ para vīra hā

original: BhP_01.07.029/3 spṛṣṭvāpastaṃ parikramya brāhmaṃ brāhmāstraṃ sandadhe
analyzed: spṛṣṭvā apaḥ tam parikramya brāhmam brāhma astram sandadhe

original: BhP_01.07.030/1 saṃhatyānyonyam ubhayostejasī śarasaṃvṛte
analyzed: saṃhatya anyonyam ubhayoḥ tejasī śara saṃvṛte

original: BhP_01.07.030/3 āvṛtya rodasī khaṃ ca vavṛdhāte 'rkavahnivat
analyzed: āvṛtya rodasī kham ca vavṛdhāte rka vahni vat

original: BhP_01.07.031/1 dṛṣṭvāstratejastu tayostrīl lokān pradahan mahat
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā astra tejaḥ tu tayoḥ trīn lokān pradahat mahat

original: BhP_01.07.031/3 dahyamānāḥ prajāḥ sarvāḥ sāṃvartakam amaṃsata
analyzed: dahyamānāḥ prajāḥ sarvāḥ sāṃvartakam amaṃsata

original: BhP_01.07.032/1 prajopadravam ālakṣya lokavyatikaraṃ ca tam
analyzed: prajā upadravam ālakṣya loka vyatikaram ca tam

original: BhP_01.07.032/3 mataṃ ca vāsudevasya sañjahārārjuno dvayam
analyzed: matam ca vāsudevasya sañjahāra arjunaḥ dvayam

original: BhP_01.07.033/1 tata āsādya tarasā dāruṇaṃ gautamīsutam
analyzed: tatas āsādya tarasā dāruṇam gautamīsutam

original: BhP_01.07.033/3 babandhāmarṣatāmrākṣaḥ paśuṃ raśanayā yathā
analyzed: babandha āmarṣa tāmra akṣaḥ paśum raśanayā yathā

original: BhP_01.07.034/1 śibirāya ninīṣantaṃ rajjvā baddhvā ripuṃ balāt
analyzed: śibirāya rajjvā baddhvā ripum balāt

original: BhP_01.07.034/3 prāhārjunaṃ prakupito bhagavān ambujekṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: prāha arjunam prakupitaḥ bhagavān ambuja īkṣaṇaḥ

original: BhP_01.07.035/1 mainaṃ pārthārhasi trātuṃ brahmabandhum imaṃ jahi
analyzed: mā enam pārtha arhasi trātum brahmabandhum imam jahi

original: BhP_01.07.035/3 yo 'sāvanāgasaḥ suptān avadhīn niśi bālakān
analyzed: yaḥ saḥ avanāgasaḥ suptān avadhīt niśi bālakān

original: BhP_01.07.036/1 mattaṃ pramattam unmattaṃ suptaṃ bālaṃ striyaṃ jaḍam
analyzed: mattam pramattam unmattam suptam bālam striyam jaḍam

original: BhP_01.07.036/3 prapannaṃ virathaṃ bhītaṃ na ripuṃ hanti dharmavit
analyzed: prapannam viratham bhītam na ripum hanti dharma vid

original: BhP_01.07.037/1 svaprāṇān yaḥ paraprāṇaiḥ prapuṣṇātyaghṛṇaḥ khalaḥ
analyzed: sva prāṇān yaḥ para prāṇaiḥ prapuṣṇāti aghṛṇaḥ khalaḥ

original: BhP_01.07.037/3 tadvadhastasya hi śreyo yaddoṣādyātyadhaḥ pumān
analyzed: tad vadhaḥ tasya hi śreyaḥ yad doṣāt yāti adhas pumān

original: BhP_01.07.038/1 pratiśrutaṃ ca bhavatā pāñcālyai śṛṇvato mama
analyzed: pratiśrutam ca bhavatā pāñcālyai śṛṇvataḥ mama

original: BhP_01.07.038/3 āhariṣye śirastasya yaste mānini putrahā
analyzed: āhariṣye śiraḥ tasya yaḥ te mānini putra hā

original: BhP_01.07.039/1 tadasau vadhyatāṃ pāpa ātatāyyātmabandhuhā
analyzed: tat asau vadhyatām pāpaḥ ātatāyī ātmabandhu hā

original: BhP_01.07.039/3 bhartuśca vipriyaṃ vīra kṛtavān kulapāṃsanaḥ
analyzed: bhartuḥ ca vipriyam vīra kṛtavān kula pāṃsanaḥ

original: BhP_01.07.040/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.07.040/1 evaṃ parīkṣatā dharmaṃ pārthaḥ kṛṣṇena coditaḥ
analyzed: evam parīkṣatā dharmam pārthaḥ kṛṣṇena coditaḥ

original: BhP_01.07.040/3 naicchaddhantuṃ gurusutaṃ yadyapyātmahanaṃ mahān
analyzed: na aicchat hantum guru sutam yadi api ātma hanam mahān

original: BhP_01.07.041/1 athopetya svaśibiraṃ govindapriyasārathiḥ
analyzed: athā upetya sva śibiram govinda priya sārathiḥ

original: BhP_01.07.041/3 nyavedayat taṃ priyāyai śocantyā ātmajān hatān
analyzed: nyavedayat tam priyāyai śocantyai ātmajān hatān

original: BhP_01.07.042/1 tathāhṛtaṃ paśuvat pāśabaddham avāṅmukhaṃ karmajugupsitena
analyzed: tathā āhṛtam paśu vat pāśa baddham avāṅmukham karma jugupsitena

original: BhP_01.07.042/3 nirīkṣya kṛṣṇāpakṛtaṃ guroḥ sutaṃ vāmasvabhāvā kṛpayā nanāma ca
analyzed: nirīkṣya kṛṣṇa apakṛtam guroḥ sutam vāmasvabhāvā kṛpayā nanāma ca

original: BhP_01.07.043/1 uvāca cāsahantyasya bandhanānayanaṃ satī
analyzed: uvāca ca asahantī asya bandhana ānayanam satī

original: BhP_01.07.043/3 mucyatāṃ mucyatām eṣa brāhmaṇo nitarāṃ guruḥ
analyzed: mucyatām mucyatām eṣa brāhmaṇaḥ nitarām guruḥ

original: BhP_01.07.044/1 sarahasyo dhanurvedaḥ savisargopasaṃyamaḥ
analyzed: sa rahasyaḥ dhanurvedaḥ sa visarga upasaṃyamaḥ

original: BhP_01.07.044/3 astragrāmaśca bhavatā śikṣito yadanugrahāt
analyzed: astra grāmaḥ ca bhavatā śikṣitaḥ yad anugrahāt

original: BhP_01.07.045/1 sa eṣa bhagavān droṇaḥ prajārūpeṇa vartate
analyzed: saḥ eṣa bhagavān droṇaḥ prajā rūpeṇa vartate

original: BhP_01.07.045/3 tasyātmano 'rdhaṃ patnyāste nānvagādvīrasūḥ kṛpī
analyzed: tasya ātmanaḥ ṛdham patnī āste na anvagāt vīrasūḥ kṛpī

original: BhP_01.07.046/1 taddharmajña mahābhāga bhavadbhirgauravaṃ kulam
analyzed: tad dharma jña mahābhāga bhavadbhiḥ gauravam kulam

original: BhP_01.07.046/3 vṛjinaṃ nārhati prāptuṃ pūjyaṃ vandyam abhīkṣṇaśaḥ
analyzed: vṛjinam nā arhati prāptum pūjyam vandyam abhīkṣṇaśas

original: BhP_01.07.047/1 mā rodīdasya jananī gautamī patidevatā
analyzed: mā rodīt asya jananī gautamī pati devatā

original: BhP_01.07.047/3 yathāhaṃ mṛtavatsārtā rodimyaśrumukhī muhuḥ
analyzed: yathā aham mṛta vatsā ārtā rodimi aśru mukhī muhur

original: BhP_01.07.048/1 yaiḥ kopitaṃ brahmakulaṃ rājanyairajitātmabhiḥ
analyzed: yaiḥ kopitam brahma kulam rājanyaiḥ ajitātmabhiḥ

original: BhP_01.07.048/3 tat kulaṃ pradahatyāśu sānubandhaṃ śucārpitam
analyzed: tat kulam pradahati āśu sānubandham śucā arpitam

original: BhP_01.07.049/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.07.049/1 dharmyaṃ nyāyyaṃ sakaruṇaṃ nirvyalīkaṃ samaṃ mahat
analyzed: dharmyam nyāyyam sa karuṇam nirvyalīkam samam mahat

original: BhP_01.07.049/3 rājā dharmasuto rājñyāḥpratyanandadvaco dvijāḥ
analyzed: rājā dharmasutaḥ rājñyāḥ pratyanandat vacaḥ dvijāḥ

original: BhP_01.07.050/1 nakulaḥ sahadevaśca yuyudhāno dhanañjayaḥ
analyzed: nakulaḥ sahadevaḥ ca yuyudhānaḥ dhanañjayaḥ

original: BhP_01.07.050/3 bhagavān devakīputro ye cānye yāśca yoṣitaḥ
analyzed: bhagavān devakīputraḥ ye ca anye yāḥ ca yoṣitaḥ

original: BhP_01.07.051/1 tatrāhāmarṣito bhīmastasya śreyān vadhaḥ smṛtaḥ
analyzed: tatra āha amarṣitaḥ bhīmaḥ tasya śreyān vadhaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: BhP_01.07.051/3 na bharturnātmanaścārthe yo 'han suptān śiśūn vṛthā
analyzed: na bhartuḥ na ātmanaḥ ca arthe yaḥ han suptān śiśūn vṛthā

original: BhP_01.07.052/1 niśamya bhīmagaditaṃ draupadyāśca caturbhujaḥ
analyzed: niśamya bhīma gaditam draupadyāḥ ca caturbhujaḥ

original: BhP_01.07.052/3 ālokya vadanaṃ sakhyuridam āha hasann iva
analyzed: ālokya vadanam sakhyuḥ idam āha hasan iva

original: BhP_01.07.053/0 śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_01.07.053/1 brahmabandhurna hantavya ātatāyī vadhārhaṇaḥ
analyzed: brahmabandhuḥ na hantavyaḥ ātatāyī vadha arhaṇaḥ

original: BhP_01.07.053/3 mayaivobhayam āmnātaṃ paripāhyanuśāsanam
analyzed: mayā eva ubhayam āmnātam paripāhi anuśāsanam

original: BhP_01.07.054/1 kuru pratiśrutaṃ satyaṃ yat tat sāntvayatā priyām
analyzed: kuru pratiśrutam satyam yat tat sāntvayatā priyām

original: BhP_01.07.054/3 priyaṃ ca bhīmasenasya pāñcālyā mahyam eva ca
analyzed: priyam ca bhīmasenasya pāñcālyāḥ mahyam eva ca

original: BhP_01.07.055/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.07.055/1 arjunaḥ sahasājñāya harerhārdam athāsinā
analyzed: arjunaḥ sahasā ājñāya hareḥ hārdam atha asinā

original: BhP_01.07.055/3 maṇiṃ jahāra mūrdhanyaṃ dvijasya sahamūrdhajam
analyzed: maṇim jahāra mūrdhanyam dvijasya saha mūrdhajam

original: BhP_01.07.056/1 vimucya raśanābaddhaṃ bālahatyāhataprabham
analyzed: vimucya raśanā baddham bāla hatyā hata prabham

original: BhP_01.07.056/3 tejasā maṇinā hīnaṃ śibirān nirayāpayat
analyzed: tejasā maṇinā hīnam śibirāt nirayāpayat

original: BhP_01.07.057/1 vapanaṃ draviṇādānaṃ sthānān niryāpaṇaṃ tathā
analyzed: vapanam draviṇa ādānam sthānāt niryāpaṇam tathā

original: BhP_01.07.057/3 eṣa hi brahmabandhūnāṃ vadho nānyo 'sti daihikaḥ
analyzed: eṣa hi brahmabandhūnām vadhaḥ na anyaḥ sti daihikaḥ

original: BhP_01.07.058/1 putraśokāturāḥ sarve pāṇḍavāḥ saha kṛṣṇayā
analyzed: putra śoka āturāḥ sarve pāṇḍavāḥ saha kṛṣṇayā

original: BhP_01.07.058/3 svānāṃ mṛtānāṃ yat kṛtyaṃ cakrurnirharaṇādikam
analyzed: svānām mṛtānām yat kṛtyam cakruḥ nirharaṇa ādikam

original: BhP_01.08.001/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.08.001/1 atha te samparetānāṃ svānām udakam icchatām
analyzed: atha te samparetānām svānām udakam icchatām

original: BhP_01.08.001/3 dātuṃ sakṛṣṇā gaṅgāyāṃ puraskṛtya yayuḥ striyaḥ
analyzed: dātum sa kṛṣṇāḥ gaṅgāyām puraskṛtya yayuḥ striyaḥ

original: BhP_01.08.002/1 te ninīyodakaṃ sarve vilapya ca bhṛśaṃ punaḥ
analyzed: te ninīya udakam sarve vilapya ca bhṛśam punar

original: BhP_01.08.002/3 āplutā haripādābjarajaḥpūtasarijjale
analyzed: āplutāḥ hari pāda abja rajaḥ pūta sarit jale

original: BhP_01.08.003/1 tatrāsīnaṃ kurupatiṃ dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ sahānujam
analyzed: tatra āsīnam kuru patim dhṛtarāṣṭram sahānujam

original: BhP_01.08.003/3 gāndhārīṃ putraśokārtāṃ pṛthāṃ kṛṣṇāṃ ca mādhavaḥ
analyzed: gāndhārīm putra śoka ārtām pṛthām kṛṣṇām ca mādhavaḥ

original: BhP_01.08.004/1 sāntvayām āsa munibhirhatabandhūñ śucārpitān
analyzed: sāntvayām āsa munibhiḥ hata bandhūm śucā arpitān

original: BhP_01.08.004/3 bhūteṣu kālasya gatiṃ darśayan na pratikriyām
analyzed: bhūteṣu kālasya gatim darśayan na pratikriyām

original: BhP_01.08.005/1 sādhayitvājātaśatroḥ svaṃ rājyaṃ kitavairhṛtam
analyzed: sādhayitvā ajātaśatroḥ svam rājyam kitavaiḥ hṛtam

original: BhP_01.08.005/3 ghātayitvāsato rājñaḥ kacasparśakṣatāyuṣaḥ
analyzed: ghātayitvā asataḥ rājñaḥ kaca sparśa kṣata āyuṣaḥ

original: BhP_01.08.006/1 yājayitvāśvamedhaistaṃ tribhiruttamakalpakaiḥ
analyzed: yājayitvā aśvamedhaiḥ tam tribhiḥ uttama kalpakaiḥ

original: BhP_01.08.006/3 tadyaśaḥ pāvanaṃ dikṣu śatamanyorivātanot
analyzed: tat yaśaḥ pāvanam dikṣu śatamanyoḥ iva atanot

original: BhP_01.08.007/1 āmantrya pāṇḍuputrāṃśca śaineyoddhavasaṃyutaḥ
analyzed: āmantrya pāṇḍu putrān ca śaineya uddhava saṃyutaḥ

original: BhP_01.08.007/3 dvaipāyanādibhirvipraiḥ pūjitaiḥ pratipūjitaḥ
analyzed: dvaipāyana ādibhiḥ vipraiḥ pūjitaiḥ pratipūjitaḥ

original: BhP_01.08.008/1 gantuṃ kṛtamatirbrahman dvārakāṃ ratham āsthitaḥ
analyzed: gantum kṛtamatiḥ brahman dvārakām ratham āsthitaḥ

original: BhP_01.08.008/3 upalebhe 'bhidhāvantīm uttarāṃ bhayavihvalām
analyzed: upalebhe bhidhāvantīm uttarām bhaya vihvalām

original: BhP_01.08.009/0 uttarovāca
analyzed: uttarā uvāca

original: BhP_01.08.009/1 pāhi pāhi mahāyogin devadeva jagatpate
analyzed: pāhi pāhi mahāyogin devadeva jagatpate

original: BhP_01.08.009/3 nānyaṃ tvadabhayaṃ paśye yatra mṛtyuḥ parasparam
analyzed: na anyam tvat abhayam paśye yatra mṛtyuḥ parasparam

original: BhP_01.08.010/1 abhidravati mām īśa śarastaptāyaso vibho
analyzed: abhidravati mām īśa śaraḥ tapta ayasaḥ vibho

original: BhP_01.08.010/3 kāmaṃ dahatu māṃ nātha mā me garbho nipātyatām
analyzed: kāmam dahatu mām nātha mā me garbhaḥ nipātyatām

original: BhP_01.08.011/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.08.011/1 upadhārya vacastasyā bhagavān bhaktavatsalaḥ
analyzed: upadhārya vacaḥ tasyāḥ bhagavān bhakta vatsalaḥ

original: BhP_01.08.011/3 apāṇḍavam idaṃ kartuṃ drauṇerastram abudhyata
analyzed: apāṇḍavam idam kartum drauṇeḥ astram abudhyata

original: BhP_01.08.012/1 tarhyevātha muniśreṣṭha pāṇḍavāḥ pañca sāyakān
analyzed: tarhi eva atha muni śreṣṭha pāṇḍavāḥ pañca sāyakān

original: BhP_01.08.012/3 ātmano 'bhimukhān dīptān ālakṣyāstrāṇyupādaduḥ
analyzed: ātmanaḥ bhimukhān dīptān ālakṣya astrāṇi upādaduḥ

original: BhP_01.08.013/1 vyasanaṃ vīkṣya tat teṣām ananyaviṣayātmanām
analyzed: vyasanam vīkṣya tat teṣām ananya viṣaya ātmanām

original: BhP_01.08.013/3 sudarśanena svāstreṇa svānāṃ rakṣāṃ vyadhādvibhuḥ
analyzed: sudarśanena sva astreṇa svānām rakṣām vyadhāt vibhuḥ

original: BhP_01.08.014/1 antaḥsthaḥ sarvabhūtānām ātmā yogeśvaro hariḥ
analyzed: antar sthaḥ sarva bhūtānām ātmā yogeśvaraḥ hariḥ

original: BhP_01.08.014/3 svamāyayāvṛṇodgarbhaṃ vairāṭyāḥ kurutantave
analyzed: sva māyayā avṛṇot garbham vairāṭyāḥ kuru tantave

original: BhP_01.08.015/1 yadyapyastraṃ brahmaśirastvamoghaṃ cāpratikriyam
analyzed: yadi api astram brahmaśiraḥ tu amogham ca apratikriyam

original: BhP_01.08.015/3 vaiṣṇavaṃ teja āsādya samaśāmyadbhṛgūdvaha
analyzed: vaiṣṇavam tejaḥ āsādya samaśāmyat bhṛgūdvaha

original: BhP_01.08.016/1 mā maṃsthā hyetadāścaryaṃ sarvāścaryamaye ñcyute
