analyzed: mā hi etat āścaryam sarva āścarya maye ñcyute

original: BhP_01.08.016/3 ya idaṃ māyayā devyā sṛjatyavati hantyajaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ idam māyayā devyā sṛjati avati hanti ajaḥ

original: BhP_01.08.017/1 brahmatejovinirmuktairātmajaiḥ saha kṛṣṇayā
analyzed: brahma tejaḥ vinirmuktaiḥ ātmajaiḥ saha kṛṣṇayā

original: BhP_01.08.017/3 prayāṇābhimukhaṃ kṛṣṇam idam āha pṛthā satī
analyzed: prayāṇa abhimukham kṛṣṇam idam āha pṛthā satī

original: BhP_01.08.018/0 kuntyuvāca
analyzed: kuntī uvāca

original: BhP_01.08.018/1 namasye puruṣaṃ tvādyam īśvaraṃ prakṛteḥ param
analyzed: namasye puruṣam tvā ādyam īśvaram prakṛteḥ param

original: BhP_01.08.018/3 alakṣyaṃ sarvabhūtānām antarbahiravasthitam
analyzed: alakṣyam sarva bhūtānām antar bahis avasthitam

original: BhP_01.08.019/1 māyājavanikācchannam ajñādhokṣajam avyayam
analyzed: māyā javanikā ācchannam ajña adhokṣajam avyayam

original: BhP_01.08.019/3 na lakṣyase mūḍhadṛśā naṭo nāṭyadharo yathā
analyzed: na lakṣyase mūḍha dṛśā naṭaḥ nāṭya dharaḥ yathā

original: BhP_01.08.020/1 tathā paramahaṃsānāṃ munīnām amalātmanām
analyzed: tathā paramahaṃsānām munīnām amala ātmanām

original: BhP_01.08.020/3 bhaktiyogavidhānārthaṃ kathaṃ paśyema hi striyaḥ
analyzed: bhakti yoga vidhāna artham katham paśyema hi striyaḥ

original: BhP_01.08.021/1 kṛṣṇāya vāsudevāya devakīnandanāya ca
analyzed: kṛṣṇāya vāsudevāya devakīnandanāya ca

original: BhP_01.08.021/3 nandagopakumārāya govindāya namo namaḥ
analyzed: nanda gopa kumārāya govindāya namaḥ namaḥ

original: BhP_01.08.022/1 namaḥ paṅkajanābhāya namaḥ paṅkajamāline
analyzed: namaḥ paṅkajanābhāya namaḥ paṅkaja māline

original: BhP_01.08.022/3 namaḥ paṅkajanetrāya namaste paṅkajāṅghraye
analyzed: namaḥ paṅkaja netrāya namaḥ te paṅkaja aṅghraye

original: BhP_01.08.023/1 yathā hṛṣīkeśa khalena devakī kaṃsena ruddhāticiraṃ śucārpitā
analyzed: yathā hṛṣīkeśa khalena devakī kaṃsena ruddhā ati ciram śucā arpitā

original: BhP_01.08.023/3 vimocitāhaṃ ca sahātmajā vibho tvayaiva nāthena muhurvipadgaṇāt
analyzed: vimocitā aham ca saha ātmajā vibho tvayā eva nāthena muhur vipad gaṇāt

original: BhP_01.08.024/1 viṣān mahāgneḥ puruṣādadarśanād asatsabhāyā vanavāsakṛcchrataḥ
analyzed: viṣāt mahā agneḥ puruṣāt adarśanāt asat sabhāyāḥ vana vāsa kṛcchrataḥ

original: BhP_01.08.024/3 mṛdhe mṛdhe 'nekamahārathāstrato drauṇyastrataścāsma hare 'bhirakṣitāḥ
analyzed: mṛdhe mṛdhe na eka mahā ratha astrataḥ drauṇi astrataḥ ca āsma

original: BhP_01.08.025/1 vipadaḥ santu tāḥ śaśvat tatra tatra jagadguro
analyzed: vipadaḥ santu tāḥ śaśvat tatra tatra jagadguro

original: BhP_01.08.025/3 bhavato darśanaṃ yat syādapunarbhavadarśanam
analyzed: bhavataḥ darśanam yat syāt apunarbhava darśanam

original: BhP_01.08.026/1 janmaiśvaryaśrutaśrībhiredhamānamadaḥ pumān
analyzed: janma aiśvarya śruta śrībhiḥ edhamānam adaḥ pumān

original: BhP_01.08.026/3 naivārhatyabhidhātuṃ vai tvām akiñcanagocaram
analyzed: na eva arhati abhidhātum vai tvām akiñcana gocaram

original: BhP_01.08.027/1 namo 'kiñcanavittāya nivṛttaguṇavṛttaye
analyzed: namaḥ kiñcana vittāya nivṛtta guṇavṛttaye

original: BhP_01.08.027/3 ātmārāmāya śāntāya kaivalyapataye namaḥ
analyzed: ātma ārāmāya śāntāya kaivalya pataye namaḥ

original: BhP_01.08.028/1 manye tvāṃ kālam īśānam anādinidhanaṃ vibhum
analyzed: manye tvām kālam īśānam an ādi nidhanam vibhum

original: BhP_01.08.028/3 samaṃ carantaṃ sarvatra bhūtānāṃ yan mithaḥ kaliḥ
analyzed: samam carantam sarvatra bhūtānām yat mithas kaliḥ

original: BhP_01.08.029/1 na veda kaścidbhagavaṃścikīrṣitaṃ tavehamānasya nṛṇāṃ viḍambanam
analyzed: na veda kaścid bhagavan cikīrṣitam tava īhamānasya nṛṇām viḍambanam

original: BhP_01.08.029/3 na yasya kaściddayito 'sti karhicid dveṣyaśca yasmin viṣamā matirnṛṇām
analyzed: na yasya kaścid dayitaḥ sti karhicit dveṣyaḥ ca yasmin viṣamā matiḥ nṛṇām

original: BhP_01.08.030/1 janma karma ca viśvātmann ajasyākarturātmanaḥ
analyzed: janma karma ca viśvātman ajasya akartuḥ ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_01.08.030/3 tiryaṅnṝṣiṣu yādaḥsu tadatyantaviḍambanam
analyzed: yādaḥsu tat atyanta viḍambanam

original: BhP_01.08.031/1 gopyādade tvayi kṛtāgasi dāma tāvad yā te daśāśrukalilāñjanasambhramākṣam
analyzed: gopī ādade tvayi kṛta āgasi dāma tāvat yā te daśa aśru kalila añjana sambhrama akṣam

original: BhP_01.08.031/3 vaktraṃ ninīya bhayabhāvanayā sthitasya sā māṃ vimohayati bhīrapi yadbibheti
analyzed: vaktram ninīya bhaya bhāvanayā sthitasya sā mām vimohayati bhīḥ api yat bibheti

original: BhP_01.08.032/1 kecidāhurajaṃ jātaṃ puṇyaślokasya kīrtaye
analyzed: kecid āhuḥ ajam jātam puṇyaślokasya kīrtaye

original: BhP_01.08.032/3 yadoḥ priyasyānvavāye malayasyeva candanam
analyzed: yadoḥ priyasya anvavāye malayasya iva candanam

original: BhP_01.08.033/1 apare vasudevasya devakyāṃ yācito 'bhyagāt
analyzed: apare vasudevasya devakyām yācitaḥ bhyagāt

original: BhP_01.08.033/3 ajastvam asya kṣemāya vadhāya ca suradviṣām
analyzed: ajaḥ tvam asya kṣemāya vadhāya ca suradviṣām

original: BhP_01.08.034/1 bhārāvatāraṇāyānye bhuvo nāva ivodadhau
analyzed: bhāra avatāraṇāya anye bhuvaḥ nāvaḥ iva udadhau

original: BhP_01.08.034/3 sīdantyā bhūribhāreṇa jāto hyātmabhuvārthitaḥ
analyzed: sīdantyāḥ bhūri bhāreṇa jātaḥ hi ātma bhuvā arthitaḥ

original: BhP_01.08.035/1 bhave 'smin kliśyamānānām avidyākāmakarmabhiḥ
analyzed: bhave smin kliśyamānānām avidyā kāma karmabhiḥ

original: BhP_01.08.035/3 śravaṇasmaraṇārhāṇi kariṣyann iti kecana
analyzed: śravaṇa smaraṇa arhāṇi kariṣyan iti kecana

original: BhP_01.08.036/1 śṛṇvanti gāyanti gṛṇantyabhīkṣṇaśaḥ smaranti nandanti tavehitaṃ janāḥ
analyzed: śṛṇvanti gāyanti gṛṇanti abhīkṣṇaśas smaranti nandanti tava īhitam janāḥ

original: BhP_01.08.036/3 ta eva paśyantyacireṇa tāvakaṃ bhavapravāhoparamaṃ padāmbujam
analyzed: te eva paśyanti acireṇa tāvakam bhava pravāha uparamam pada ambujam

original: BhP_01.08.037/1 apyadya nastvaṃ svakṛtehita prabho jihāsasi svit suhṛdo 'nujīvinaḥ
analyzed: api adya naḥ tvam sva kṛta īhita prabho jihāsasi svid suhṛdaḥ nujīvinaḥ

original: BhP_01.08.037/3 yeṣāṃ na cānyadbhavataḥ padāmbujāt parāyaṇaṃ rājasu yojitāṃhasām
analyzed: yeṣām na ca anyat bhavataḥ pada ambujāt parāyaṇam rājasu yojita aṃhasām

original: BhP_01.08.038/1 ke vayaṃ nāmarūpābhyāṃ yadubhiḥ saha pāṇḍavāḥ
analyzed: ke vayam nāma rūpābhyām yadubhiḥ saha pāṇḍavāḥ

original: BhP_01.08.038/3 bhavato 'darśanaṃ yarhi hṛṣīkāṇām iveśituḥ
analyzed: bhavataḥ darśanam yarhi hṛṣīkāṇām iva īśituḥ

original: BhP_01.08.039/1 neyaṃ śobhiṣyate tatra yathedānīṃ gadādhara
analyzed: nā iyam śobhiṣyate tatra yathā idānīm gadādhara

original: BhP_01.08.039/3 tvatpadairaṅkitā bhāti svalakṣaṇavilakṣitaiḥ
analyzed: tvad padaiḥ aṅkitā bhāti sva lakṣaṇa vilakṣitaiḥ

original: BhP_01.08.040/1 ime janapadāḥ svṛddhāḥ supakvauṣadhivīrudhaḥ
analyzed: ime janapadāḥ su ṛddhāḥ su pakva oṣadhi vīrudhaḥ

original: BhP_01.08.040/3 vanādrinadyudanvanto hyedhante tava vīkṣitaiḥ
analyzed: vana adri nadī udanvantaḥ hi edhante tava vīkṣitaiḥ

original: BhP_01.08.041/1 atha viśveśa viśvātman viśvamūrte svakeṣu me
analyzed: atha viśveśa viśvātman viśvamūrte svakeṣu me

original: BhP_01.08.041/3 snehapāśam imaṃ chindhi dṛḍhaṃ pāṇḍuṣu vṛṣṇiṣu
analyzed: sneha pāśam imam chindhi dṛḍham pāṇḍuṣu vṛṣṇiṣu

original: BhP_01.08.042/1 tvayi me 'nanyaviṣayā matirmadhupate 'sakṛt
analyzed: tvayi me nanya viṣayā matiḥ madhupate sakṛt

original: BhP_01.08.042/3 ratim udvahatādaddhā gaṅgevaugham udanvati
analyzed: ratim gaṅgā iva ogham udanvati

original: BhP_01.08.043/1 śrīkṛṣṇa kṛṣṇasakha vṛṣṇyṛṣabhāvanidhrug rājanyavaṃśadahanānapavargavīrya
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇasakha rājanya vaṃśa dahana an apavarga vīrya

original: BhP_01.08.043/3 govinda godvijasurārtiharāvatāra yogeśvarākhilaguro bhagavan namaste
analyzed: govinda go dvija sura ārti hara avatāra yoga īśvara akhila guro bhagavan namaḥ te

original: BhP_01.08.044/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.08.044/1 pṛthayetthaṃ kalapadaiḥ pariṇūtākhilodayaḥ
analyzed: pṛthayā ittham kala padaiḥ pariṇūta akhila udayaḥ

original: BhP_01.08.044/3 mandaṃ jahāsa vaikuṇṭho mohayann iva māyayā
analyzed: mandam jahāsa vaikuṇṭhaḥ mohayan iva māyayā

original: BhP_01.08.045/1 tāṃ bāḍham ityupāmantrya praviśya gajasāhvayam
analyzed: tām bāḍham iti upāmantrya praviśya gajasāhvayam

original: BhP_01.08.045/3 striyaśca svapuraṃ yāsyan premṇā rājñā nivāritaḥ
analyzed: striyaḥ ca sva puram yāsyan premṇā rājñā nivāritaḥ

original: BhP_01.08.046/1 vyāsādyairīśvarehājñaiḥ kṛṣṇenādbhutakarmaṇā
analyzed: vyāsa ādyaiḥ īśvara īhā jñaiḥ kṛṣṇena adbhuta karmaṇā

original: BhP_01.08.046/3 prabodhito 'pītihāsairnābudhyata śucārpitaḥ
analyzed: prabodhitaḥ pīti hāsaiḥ na abudhyata śucā arpitaḥ

original: BhP_01.08.047/1 āha rājā dharmasutaścintayan suhṛdāṃ vadham
analyzed: āha rājā dharmasutaḥ cintayan suhṛdām vadham

original: BhP_01.08.047/3 prākṛtenātmanā viprāḥ snehamohavaśaṃ gataḥ
analyzed: prākṛtena ātmanā viprāḥ sneha moha vaśam gataḥ

original: BhP_01.08.048/1 aho me paśyatājñānaṃ hṛdi rūḍhaṃ durātmanaḥ
analyzed: aho me paśyatā ajñānam hṛdi rūḍham durātmanaḥ

original: BhP_01.08.048/3 pārakyasyaiva dehasya bahvyo me 'kṣauhiṇīrhatāḥ
analyzed: pārakyasya eva dehasya bahvyaḥ me kṣauhiṇīḥ hatāḥ

original: BhP_01.08.049/1 bāladvijasuhṛnmitra pitṛbhrātṛgurudruhaḥ
analyzed: bāla dvija suhṛd mitra pitṛ bhrātṛ guru druhaḥ

original: BhP_01.08.049/3 na me syān nirayān mokṣo hyapi varṣāyutāyutaiḥ
analyzed: na me syāt nirayāt mokṣaḥ hi api varṣā yuta ayutaiḥ

original: BhP_01.08.050/1 naino rājñaḥ prajābharturdharmayuddhe vadho dviṣām
analyzed: na enaḥ rājñaḥ prajā bhartuḥ dharma yuddhe vadhaḥ dviṣām

original: BhP_01.08.050/3 iti me na tu bodhāya kalpate śāsanaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: iti me na tu bodhāya kalpate śāsanam vacaḥ

original: BhP_01.08.051/1 strīṇāṃ maddhatabandhūnāṃ droho yo 'sāvihotthitaḥ
analyzed: strīṇām mad hata bandhūnām drohaḥ

original: BhP_01.08.051/3 karmabhirgṛhamedhīyairnāhaṃ kalpo vyapohitum
analyzed: karmabhiḥ gṛhamedhīyaiḥ na aham kalpaḥ vyapohitum

original: BhP_01.08.052/1 yathā paṅkena paṅkāmbhaḥ surayā vā surākṛtam
analyzed: yathā paṅkena paṅka ambhaḥ surayā vā surā kṛtam

original: BhP_01.08.052/3 bhūtahatyāṃ tathaivaikāṃ na yajñairmārṣṭum arhati
analyzed: bhūta hatyām tathā eva ekām na yajñaiḥ mārṣṭum arhati

original: BhP_01.09.001/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.09.001/1 iti bhītaḥ prajādrohāt sarvadharmavivitsayā
analyzed: iti bhītaḥ prajā adrohāt sarva dharma vivitsayā

original: BhP_01.09.001/3 tato vinaśanaṃ prāgādyatra devavrato 'patat
analyzed: tatas vinaśanam prāgāt yatra devavrato patat

original: BhP_01.09.002/1 tadā te bhrātaraḥ sarve sadaśvaiḥ svarṇabhūṣitaiḥ
analyzed: tadā te bhrātaraḥ sarve sat aśvaiḥ svarṇa bhūṣitaiḥ

original: BhP_01.09.002/3 anvagacchan rathairviprā vyāsadhaumyādayastathā
analyzed: anvagacchan rathaiḥ viprāḥ vyāsa dhaumya ādayaḥ tathā

original: BhP_01.09.003/1 bhagavān api viprarṣe rathena sadhanañjayaḥ
analyzed: bhagavān api viprarṣe rathena sa dhanañjayaḥ

original: BhP_01.09.003/3 sa tairvyarocata nṛpaḥ kuvera iva guhyakaiḥ
analyzed: sa taiḥ vyarocata nṛpaḥ kuveraḥ iva guhyakaiḥ

original: BhP_01.09.004/1 dṛṣṭvā nipatitaṃ bhūmau divaścyutam ivāmaram
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā nipatitam bhūmau divaḥ cyutam iva amaram

original: BhP_01.09.004/3 praṇemuḥ pāṇḍavā bhīṣmaṃ sānugāḥ saha cakriṇā
analyzed: praṇemuḥ pāṇḍavāḥ bhīṣmam sa anugāḥ saha cakriṇā

original: BhP_01.09.005/1 tatra brahmarṣayaḥ sarve devarṣayaśca sattama
analyzed: tatra brahmarṣayaḥ sarve devarṣayaḥ ca sattama

original: BhP_01.09.005/3 rājarṣayaśca tatrāsan draṣṭuṃ bharatapuṅgavam
analyzed: rājarṣayaḥ ca tatra āsan draṣṭum bharata puṅgavam

original: BhP_01.09.006/1 parvato nārado dhaumyo bhagavān bādarāyaṇaḥ
BhP_01.09.006/3 bṛhadaśvo bharadvājaḥ saśiṣyo reṇukāsutaḥ
BhP_01.09.007/1 vasiṣṭha indrapramadastrito gṛtsamado 'sitaḥ
analyzed: vasiṣṭhaḥ indrapramadaḥ tritaḥ gṛtsamadaḥ sitaḥ

original: BhP_01.09.007/3 kakṣīvān gautamo 'triśca kauśiko 'tha sudarśanaḥ
analyzed: kakṣīvān gautamaḥ tris ca kauśikaḥ sudarśanaḥ

original: BhP_01.09.008/1 anye ca munayo brahman brahmarātādayo 'malāḥ
analyzed: anye ca munayaḥ brahman brahmarāta ādayaḥ malāḥ

original: BhP_01.09.008/3 śiṣyairupetā ājagmuḥ kaśyapāṅgirasādayaḥ
analyzed: śiṣyaiḥ upetāḥ ājagmuḥ kaśyapa aṅgirasa ādayaḥ

original: BhP_01.09.009/1 tān sametān mahābhāgān upalabhya vasūttamaḥ
analyzed: tān sametān mahābhāgān upalabhya vasūttamaḥ

original: BhP_01.09.009/3 pūjayām āsa dharmajño deśakālavibhāgavit
analyzed: pūjayām āsa dharma jñaḥ deśa kāla vibhāga vid

original: BhP_01.09.010/1 kṛṣṇaṃ ca tatprabhāvajña āsīnaṃ jagadīśvaram
analyzed: kṛṣṇam ca tad prabhāva jñaḥ āsīnam jagat īśvaram

original: BhP_01.09.010/3 hṛdisthaṃ pūjayām āsa māyayopāttavigraham
analyzed: hṛdistham pūjayām āsa māyayā upātta vigraham

original: BhP_01.09.011/1 pāṇḍuputrān upāsīnān praśrayapremasaṅgatān
analyzed: pāṇḍu putrān upāsīnān praśraya prema saṅga tān

original: BhP_01.09.011/3 abhyācaṣṭānurāgāśrairandhībhūtena cakṣuṣā
analyzed: cakṣuṣā

original: BhP_01.09.012/1 aho kaṣṭam aho 'nyāyyaṃ yadyūyaṃ dharmanandanāḥ
analyzed: aho kaṣṭam aho nyāyyam yat yūyam dharma nandanāḥ

original: BhP_01.09.012/3 jīvituṃ nārhatha kliṣṭaṃ vipradharmācyutāśrayāḥ
analyzed: jīvitum na arhatha kliṣṭam vipra dharma acyuta āśrayāḥ

original: BhP_01.09.013/1 saṃsthite 'tirathe pāṇḍau pṛthā bālaprajā vadhūḥ
analyzed: saṃsthite tirathe pāṇḍau pṛthā bāla prajā vadhūḥ

original: BhP_01.09.013/3 yuṣmatkṛte bahūn kleśān prāptā tokavatī muhuḥ
analyzed: yuṣmad kṛte bahūn kleśān prāptā tokavatī muhur

original: BhP_01.09.014/1 sarvaṃ kālakṛtaṃ manye bhavatāṃ ca yadapriyam
analyzed: sarvam kāla kṛtam manye bhavatām ca yat apriyam

original: BhP_01.09.014/3 sapālo yadvaśe loko vāyoriva ghanāvaliḥ
analyzed: sa pālaḥ yad vaśe lokaḥ vāyoḥ iva ghana āvaliḥ

original: BhP_01.09.015/1 yatra dharmasuto rājā gadāpāṇirvṛkodaraḥ
analyzed: yatra dharmasutaḥ rājā gadā pāṇiḥ vṛkodaraḥ

original: BhP_01.09.015/3 kṛṣṇo 'strī gāṇḍivaṃ cāpaṃ suhṛt kṛṣṇastato vipat
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ strī gāṇḍivam cāpam suhṛd kṛṣṇaḥ tatas vipad

original: BhP_01.09.016/1 na hyasya karhicidrājan pumān veda vidhitsitam
analyzed: na hi asya karhicit rājan pumān veda vidhitsitam

original: BhP_01.09.016/3 yadvijijñāsayā yuktā muhyanti kavayo 'pi hi
analyzed: yad vijijñāsayā yuktāḥ muhyanti kavayaḥ hi

original: BhP_01.09.017/1 tasmādidaṃ daivatantraṃ vyavasya bharatarṣabha
analyzed: tasmāt idam daiva tantram vyavasya bharata ṛṣabha

original: BhP_01.09.017/3 tasyānuvihito 'nāthā nātha pāhi prajāḥ prabho
analyzed: tasya anuvihitaḥ nāthāḥ nātha pāhi prajāḥ prabho

original: BhP_01.09.018/1 eṣa vai bhagavān sākṣādādyo nārāyaṇaḥ pumān
analyzed: eṣa vai bhagavān sākṣāt ādyaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ pumān

original: BhP_01.09.018/3 mohayan māyayā lokaṃ gūḍhaścarati vṛṣṇiṣu
analyzed: mohayan māyayā lokam gūḍhaḥ carati vṛṣṇiṣu

original: BhP_01.09.019/1 asyānubhāvaṃ bhagavān veda guhyatamaṃ śivaḥ
analyzed: asya anubhāvam bhagavān veda guhyatamam śivaḥ

original: BhP_01.09.019/3 devarṣirnāradaḥ sākṣādbhagavān kapilo nṛpa
analyzed: deva ṛṣiḥ nāradaḥ sākṣāt bhagavān kapilaḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_01.09.020/1 yaṃ manyase mātuleyaṃ priyaṃ mitraṃ suhṛttamam
analyzed: yam manyase mātuleyam priyam mitram suhṛttamam

original: BhP_01.09.020/3 akaroḥ sacivaṃ dūtaṃ sauhṛdādatha sārathim
analyzed: akaroḥ sacivam dūtam sauhṛdāt atha sārathim

original: BhP_01.09.021/1 sarvātmanaḥ samadṛśo hyadvayasyānahaṅkṛteḥ
analyzed: sarvātmanaḥ samadṛśaḥ hi advayasya anahaṅkṛteḥ

original: BhP_01.09.021/3 tatkṛtaṃ mativaiṣamyaṃ niravadyasya na kvacit
analyzed: tat kṛtam mati vaiṣamyam niravadyasya na kvacid

original: BhP_01.09.022/1 tathāpyekāntabhakteṣu paśya bhūpānukampitam
analyzed: tathā api ekānta bhakteṣu paśya bhūpa anukampitam

original: BhP_01.09.022/3 yan me 'sūṃstyajataḥ sākṣāt kṛṣṇo darśanam āgataḥ
analyzed: yat me sūn tyajataḥ sākṣāt kṛṣṇaḥ darśanam āgataḥ

original: BhP_01.09.023/1 bhaktyāveśya mano yasmin vācā yannāma kīrtayan
analyzed: bhakti āveśya manaḥ yasmin vācā yad nāma kīrtayan

original: BhP_01.09.023/3 tyajan kalevaraṃ yogī mucyate kāmakarmabhiḥ
analyzed: tyajan kalevaram yogī mucyate kāma karmabhiḥ

original: BhP_01.09.024/1 sa devadevo bhagavān pratīkṣatāṃ kalevaraṃ yāvadidaṃ hinomyaham
analyzed: sa devadevaḥ bhagavān pratīkṣatām kalevaram yāvat idam hinomi aham

original: BhP_01.09.024/3 prasannahāsāruṇalocanollasan mukhāmbujo dhyānapathaścaturbhujaḥ
analyzed: prasanna hāsa aruṇa locana ullasan mukha ambujaḥ dhyāna pathaḥ caturbhujaḥ

original: BhP_01.09.025/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.09.025/1 yudhiṣṭhirastadākarṇya śayānaṃ śarapañjare
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhiraḥ tat ākarṇya śayānam śara pañjare

original: BhP_01.09.025/3 apṛcchadvividhān dharmān ṛṣīṇāṃ cānuśṛṇvatām
analyzed: apṛcchat vividhān dharmān ṛṣīṇām ca anuśṛṇvatām

original: BhP_01.09.026/1 puruṣasvabhāvavihitān yathāvarṇaṃ yathāśramam
analyzed: puruṣa svabhāva vihitān yathāvarṇam yathāśramam

original: BhP_01.09.026/3 vairāgyarāgopādhibhyām āmnātobhayalakṣaṇān
analyzed: vairāgya rāga upādhibhyām āmnāta ubhaya lakṣaṇān

original: BhP_01.09.027/1 dānadharmān rājadharmān mokṣadharmān vibhāgaśaḥ
analyzed: dāna dharmān rāja dharmān mokṣa dharmān vibhāgaśaḥ

original: BhP_01.09.027/3 strīdharmān bhagavaddharmān samāsavyāsayogataḥ
BhP_01.09.028/1 dharmārthakāmamokṣāṃśca sahopāyān yathā mune
analyzed: dharma artha kāma mokṣān ca saha upāyān yathā mune

original: BhP_01.09.028/3 nānākhyānetihāseṣu varṇayām āsa tattvavit
analyzed: nānā ākhyāna itihāseṣu varṇayām āsa tattva vid

original: BhP_01.09.029/1 dharmaṃ pravadatastasya sa kālaḥ pratyupasthitaḥ
analyzed: dharmam pravadataḥ tasya sa kālaḥ pratyupasthitaḥ

original: BhP_01.09.029/3 yo yoginaśchandamṛtyorvāñchitastūttarāyaṇaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ yoginaḥ chanda mṛtyoḥ vāñchitaḥ tu uttarāyaṇaḥ

original: BhP_01.09.030/1 tadopasaṃhṛtya giraḥ sahasraṇīr vimuktasaṅgaṃ mana ādipūruṣe
analyzed: tadā upasaṃhṛtya giraḥ sahasraṇīḥ vimukta saṅgam manaḥ ādipūruṣe

original: BhP_01.09.030/3 kṛṣṇe lasatpītapaṭe caturbhuje puraḥ sthite 'mīlitadṛg vyadhārayat
analyzed: kṛṣṇe lasat pīta paṭe caturbhuje puras sthite mīlita dṛś vyadhārayat

original: BhP_01.09.031/1 viśuddhayā dhāraṇayā hatāśubhas tadīkṣayaivāśu gatāyudhaśramaḥ
analyzed: viśuddhayā dhāraṇayā hata aśubhaḥ tat īkṣaya eva āśu gata āyudha śramaḥ

original: BhP_01.09.031/3 nivṛttasarvendriyavṛttivibhramas tuṣṭāva janyaṃ visṛjañ janārdanam
analyzed: nivṛtta sarva indriya vṛtti vibhramaḥ tuṣṭāva janyam visṛjam janārdanam

original: BhP_01.09.032/0 śrībhīṣma uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhīṣmaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.09.032/1 iti matirupakalpitā vitṛṣṇā bhagavati sātvatapuṅgave vibhūmni
analyzed: iti matiḥ upakalpitā vitṛṣṇā bhagavati sātvata puṅgave vibhūmni

original: BhP_01.09.032/3 svasukham upagate kvacidvihartuṃ prakṛtim upeyuṣi yadbhavapravāhaḥ
analyzed: sva sukham upagate kvacid vihartum prakṛtim upeyuṣi yad bhava pravāhaḥ

original: BhP_01.09.033/1 tribhuvanakamanaṃ tamālavarṇaṃ ravikaragauravarāmbaraṃ dadhāne
analyzed: tribhuvana kamanam tamāla varṇam ravi kara gaura vara ambaram dadhāne

original: BhP_01.09.033/3 vapuralakakulāvṛtānanābjaṃ vijayasakhe ratirastu me 'navadyā
analyzed: vapuḥ alaka kula āvṛta ānana abjam vijaya sakhe ratiḥ astu me navadyā

original: BhP_01.09.034/1 yudhi turagarajovidhūmraviṣvak kacalulitaśramavāryalaṅkṛtāsye
analyzed: yudhi kaca lulita śrama vāri alaṅkṛta āsye

original: BhP_01.09.034/3 mama niśitaśarairvibhidyamāna tvaci vilasatkavace 'stu kṛṣṇa ātmā
analyzed: mama niśita śaraiḥ vibhidyamāna tvaci vilasat kavace stu kṛṣṇaḥ ātmā

original: BhP_01.09.035/1 sapadi sakhivaco niśamya madhye nijaparayorbalayo rathaṃ niveśya
analyzed: sapadi sakhi vacaḥ niśamya madhye nija parayoḥ balayoḥ ratham niveśya

original: BhP_01.09.035/3 sthitavati parasainikāyurakṣṇā hṛtavati pārthasakhe ratirmamāstu
analyzed: sthitavati para sainika āyuḥ akṣṇā hṛtavati pārtha sakhe ratiḥ mama astu

original: BhP_01.09.036/1 vyavahitapṛtanāmukhaṃ nirīkṣya svajanavadhādvimukhasya doṣabuddhyā
analyzed: vyavahita pṛtanā mukham nirīkṣya sva jana vadhāt vimukhasya doṣa buddhyā

original: BhP_01.09.036/3 kumatim aharadātmavidyayā yaś caraṇaratiḥ paramasya tasya me 'stu
analyzed: kumatim aharat ātma vidyayā yaḥ caraṇa ratiḥ paramasya tasya me stu

original: BhP_01.09.037/1 svanigamam apahāya matpratijñām ṛtam adhikartum avapluto rathasthaḥ
analyzed: sva nigamam apahāya mad pratijñām ṛtam adhikartum avaplutaḥ ratha sthaḥ

original: BhP_01.09.037/3 dhṛtarathacaraṇo 'bhyayāc caladgur haririva hantum ibhaṃ gatottarīyaḥ
analyzed: dhṛta ratha caraṇaḥ bhyayāt caladguḥ hariḥ iva hantum ibham gata uttarīyaḥ

original: BhP_01.09.038/1 śitaviśikhahato viśīrṇadaṃśaḥ kṣatajaparipluta ātatāyino me
analyzed: śita viśikha hataḥ viśīrṇa daṃśaḥ kṣataja pariplutaḥ ātatāyinaḥ me

original: BhP_01.09.038/3 prasabham abhisasāra madvadhārthaṃ sa bhavatu me bhagavān gatirmukundaḥ
analyzed: prasabham abhisasāra mad vadha artham sa bhavatu me bhagavān gatiḥ mukundaḥ

original: BhP_01.09.039/1 vijayarathakuṭumba āttatotre dhṛtahayaraśmini tacchriyekṣaṇīye
analyzed: vijaya rathakuṭumbe ātta totre dhṛta haya raśmini tad śriyā īkṣaṇīye

original: BhP_01.09.039/3 bhagavati ratirastu me mumūrṣor yam iha nirīkṣya hatā gatāḥ svarūpam
analyzed: bhagavati ratiḥ astu me mumūrṣoḥ yam iha nirīkṣya hatāḥ gatāḥ sva rūpam

original: BhP_01.09.040/1 lalitagativilāsavalguhāsa praṇayanirīkṣaṇakalpitorumānāḥ
analyzed: lalita gati vilāsa valgu hāsa praṇaya nirīkṣaṇa kalpita ūru mānāḥ

original: BhP_01.09.040/3 kṛtamanukṛtavatya unmadāndhāḥ prakṛtim agan kila yasya gopavadhvaḥ
analyzed: kṛtam anukṛtavatyaḥ unmada andhāḥ prakṛtim agan kila yasya gopa vadhvaḥ

original: BhP_01.09.041/1 munigaṇanṛpavaryasaṅkule 'ntaḥ sadasi yudhiṣṭhirarājasūya eṣām
analyzed: muni gaṇa nṛpa varya saṅkule ntar sadasi yudhiṣṭhira rājasūye eṣām

original: BhP_01.09.041/3 arhaṇam upapeda īkṣaṇīyo mama dṛśigocara eṣa āvirātmā
analyzed: arhaṇam upapede īkṣaṇīyaḥ mama dṛśi gocaraḥ eṣaḥ āvis ātmā

original: BhP_01.09.042/1 tam imam aham ajaṃ śarīrabhājāṃ hṛdi hṛdi dhiṣṭhitam ātmakalpitānām
analyzed: tam imam aham ajam śarīra bhājām hṛdi hṛdi dhiṣṭhitam ātma kalpitānām

original: BhP_01.09.042/3 pratidṛśam iva naikadhārkam ekaṃ samadhigato 'smi vidhūtabhedamohaḥ
analyzed: pratidṛśam iva nā ekadhā arkam ekam samadhigataḥ smi vidhūta bheda mohaḥ

original: BhP_01.09.043/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.09.043/1 kṛṣṇa evaṃ bhagavati manovāgdṛṣṭivṛttibhiḥ
analyzed: kṛṣṇe evam bhagavati manaḥ vāc dṛṣṭi vṛttibhiḥ

original: BhP_01.09.043/3 ātmanyātmānam āveśya so 'ntaḥśvāsa upāramat
analyzed: ātmani ātmānam āveśya saḥ ntar śvāsaḥ upāramat

original: BhP_01.09.044/1 sampadyamānam ājñāya bhīṣmaṃ brahmaṇi niṣkale
analyzed: sampadyamānam ājñāya bhīṣmam brahmaṇi niṣkale

original: BhP_01.09.044/3 sarve babhūvuste tūṣṇīṃ vayāṃsīva dinātyaye
analyzed: sarve babhūvuḥ te tūṣṇīm vayāṃsi iva dina atyaye

original: BhP_01.09.045/1 tatra dundubhayo nedurdevamānavavāditāḥ
analyzed: tatra dundubhayaḥ neduḥ deva mānava vāditāḥ

original: BhP_01.09.045/3 śaśaṃsuḥ sādhavo rājñāṃ khāt petuḥ puṣpavṛṣṭayaḥ
analyzed: śaśaṃsuḥ sādhavaḥ rājñām khāt petuḥ puṣpa vṛṣṭayaḥ

original: BhP_01.09.046/1 tasya nirharaṇādīni samparetasya bhārgava
analyzed: tasya nirharaṇa ādīni samparetasya bhārgava

original: BhP_01.09.046/3 yudhiṣṭhiraḥ kārayitvā muhūrtaṃ duḥkhito 'bhavat
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhiraḥ kārayitvā muhūrtam duḥkhitaḥ bhavat

original: BhP_01.09.047/1 tuṣṭuvurmunayo hṛṣṭāḥ kṛṣṇaṃ tadguhyanāmabhiḥ
analyzed: tuṣṭuvuḥ munayaḥ hṛṣṭāḥ kṛṣṇam tad guhya nāmabhiḥ

original: BhP_01.09.047/3 tataste kṛṣṇahṛdayāḥ svāśramān prayayuḥ punaḥ
analyzed: tatas te kṛṣṇa hṛdayāḥ sva āśramān prayayuḥ punar

original: BhP_01.09.048/1 tato yudhiṣṭhiro gatvā sahakṛṣṇo gajāhvayam
analyzed: tatas yudhiṣṭhiraḥ gatvā saha kṛṣṇaḥ gajāhvayam

original: BhP_01.09.048/3 pitaraṃ sāntvayām āsa gāndhārīṃ ca tapasvinīm
analyzed: pitaram sāntvayām āsa gāndhārīm ca tapasvinīm

original: BhP_01.09.049/1 pitrā cānumato rājā vāsudevānumoditaḥ
analyzed: pitrā ca anumataḥ rājā vāsudeva anumoditaḥ

original: BhP_01.09.049/3 cakāra rājyaṃ dharmeṇa pitṛpaitāmahaṃ vibhuḥ
analyzed: cakāra rājyam dharmeṇa pitṛpaitāmaham vibhuḥ

original: BhP_01.10.001/0 śaunaka uvāca
analyzed: śaunakaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.10.001/1 hatvā svarikthaspṛdha ātatāyino yudhiṣṭhiro dharmabhṛtāṃ variṣṭhaḥ
analyzed: hatvā sva riktha spṛdhaḥ ātatāyinaḥ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ dharma bhṛtām variṣṭhaḥ

original: BhP_01.10.001/3 sahānujaiḥ pratyavaruddhabhojanaḥ kathaṃ pravṛttaḥ kim akāraṣīt tataḥ
analyzed: saha anujaiḥ pratyavaruddha bhojanaḥ katham pravṛttaḥ kim akāraṣīt tatas

original: BhP_01.10.002/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.10.002/1 vaṃśaṃ kurorvaṃśadavāgninirhṛtaṃ saṃrohayitvā bhavabhāvano hariḥ
analyzed: vaṃśam kuroḥ vaṃśa davāgni nirhṛtam saṃrohayitvā bhava bhāvanaḥ hariḥ

original: BhP_01.10.002/3 niveśayitvā nijarājya īśvaro yudhiṣṭhiraṃ prītamanā babhūva ha
analyzed: niveśayitvā nija rājye īśvaraḥ yudhiṣṭhiram prīta manāḥ babhūva ha

original: BhP_01.10.003/1 niśamya bhīṣmoktam athācyutoktaṃ pravṛttavijñānavidhūtavibhramaḥ
analyzed: niśamya bhīṣma uktam atha acyuta uktam pravṛtta vijñāna vidhūta vibhramaḥ

original: BhP_01.10.003/3 śaśāsa gām indra ivājitāśrayaḥ paridhyupāntām anujānuvartitaḥ
analyzed: śaśāsa gām indraḥ iva ajita āśrayaḥ paridhi upāntām anujānu vartitaḥ

original: BhP_01.10.004/1 kāmaṃ vavarṣa parjanyaḥ sarvakāmadughā mahī
analyzed: kāmam vavarṣa parjanyaḥ sarva kāmadughā mahī

original: BhP_01.10.004/3 siṣicuḥ sma vrajān gāvaḥ payasodhasvatīrmudā
analyzed: siṣicuḥ sma vrajān gāvaḥ payasā udhasvatīḥ mudā

original: BhP_01.10.005/1 nadyaḥ samudrā girayaḥ savanaspativīrudhaḥ
analyzed: nadyaḥ samudrāḥ girayaḥ sa vanaspati vīrudhaḥ

original: BhP_01.10.005/3 phalantyoṣadhayaḥ sarvāḥ kāmam anvṛtu tasya vai
analyzed: phalanti oṣadhayaḥ sarvāḥ kāmam anvṛtu tasya vai

original: BhP_01.10.006/1 nādhayo vyādhayaḥ kleśā daivabhūtātmahetavaḥ
analyzed: na ādhayaḥ vyādhayaḥ kleśāḥ daiva bhūta ātma hetavaḥ

original: BhP_01.10.006/3 ajātaśatrāvabhavan jantūnāṃ rājñi karhicit
analyzed: ajātaśatrau abhavan jantūnām rājñi karhicit

original: BhP_01.10.007/1 uṣitvā hāstinapure māsān katipayān hariḥ
analyzed: uṣitvā hāstinapure māsān katipayān hariḥ

original: BhP_01.10.007/3 suhṛdāṃ ca viśokāya svasuśca priyakāmyayā
analyzed: suhṛdām ca viśokāya svasuḥ ca priya kāmyayā

original: BhP_01.10.008/1 āmantrya cābhyanujñātaḥ pariṣvajyābhivādya tam
analyzed: āmantrya ca abhyanujñātaḥ pariṣvajya abhivādya tam

original: BhP_01.10.008/3 āruroha rathaṃ kaiścit pariṣvakto 'bhivāditaḥ
analyzed: āruroha ratham kaiścid pariṣvaktaḥ bhivāditaḥ

original: BhP_01.10.009/1 subhadrā draupadī kuntī virāṭatanayā tathā
analyzed: subhadrā draupadī kuntī virāṭa tanayā tathā

original: BhP_01.10.009/3 gāndhārī dhṛtarāṣṭraśca yuyutsurgautamo yamau
analyzed: gāndhārī dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ ca yuyutsuḥ gautamaḥ yamau

original: BhP_01.10.010/1 vṛkodaraśca dhaumyaśca striyo matsyasutādayaḥ
analyzed: vṛkodaraḥ ca dhaumyaḥ ca striyaḥ matsya suta ādayaḥ

original: BhP_01.10.010/3 na sehire vimuhyanto virahaṃ śārṅgadhanvanaḥ
analyzed: na sehire vimuhyantaḥ viraham śārṅgadhanvanaḥ

original: BhP_01.10.011/1 satsaṅgān muktaduḥsaṅgo hātuṃ notsahate budhaḥ
analyzed: sat saṅgāt mukta duḥsaṅgaḥ hātum nā utsahate budhaḥ

original: BhP_01.10.011/3 kīrtyamānaṃ yaśo yasya sakṛdākarṇya rocanam
analyzed: kīrtyamānam yaśaḥ yasya sakṛt ākarṇya rocanam

original: BhP_01.10.012/1 tasmin nyastadhiyaḥ pārthāḥ saheran virahaṃ katham
analyzed: tasmin nyasta dhiyaḥ pārthāḥ saheran viraham katham

original: BhP_01.10.012/3 darśanasparśasaṃlāpa śayanāsanabhojanaiḥ
analyzed: darśana sparśa saṃlāpa śayana āsana bhojanaiḥ

original: BhP_01.10.013/1 sarve te 'nimiṣairakṣaistam anu drutacetasaḥ
analyzed: sarve te nimiṣaiḥ akṣaiḥ tam anu druta cetasaḥ

original: BhP_01.10.013/3 vīkṣantaḥ snehasambaddhā vicelustatra tatra ha
analyzed: vīkṣantaḥ sneha sambaddhāḥ viceluḥ tatra tatra ha

original: BhP_01.10.014/1 nyarundhann udgaladbāṣpam autkaṇṭhyāddevakīsute
analyzed: nyarundhan udgalat bāṣpam autkaṇṭhyāt devakī sute

original: BhP_01.10.014/3 niryātyagārān no 'bhadram iti syādbāndhavastriyaḥ
analyzed: niryāti agārāt naḥ bhadram iti syāt bāndhava striyaḥ

original: BhP_01.10.015/1 mṛdaṅgaśaṅkhabheryaśca vīṇāpaṇavagomukhāḥ
analyzed: mṛdaṅga śaṅkha bheryaḥ ca vīṇā paṇava gomukhāḥ

original: BhP_01.10.015/3 dhundhuryānakaghaṇṭādyā nedurdundubhayastathā
analyzed: dhundhuḥ yānaka ghaṇṭā ādyāḥ neduḥ dundubhayaḥ tathā

original: BhP_01.10.016/1 prāsādaśikharārūḍhāḥ kurunāryo didṛkṣayā
analyzed: prāsāda śikhara ārūḍhāḥ kuru nāryaḥ didṛkṣayā

original: BhP_01.10.016/3 vavṛṣuḥ kusumaiḥ kṛṣṇaṃ premavrīḍāsmitekṣaṇāḥ
analyzed: vavṛṣuḥ kusumaiḥ kṛṣṇam prema vrīḍā smita īkṣaṇāḥ

original: BhP_01.10.017/1 sitātapatraṃ jagrāha muktādāmavibhūṣitam
analyzed: sita ātapatram jagrāha muktā dāma vibhūṣitam

original: BhP_01.10.017/3 ratnadaṇḍaṃ guḍākeśaḥ priyaḥ priyatamasya ha
analyzed: ratna daṇḍam guḍākeśaḥ priyaḥ priyatamasya ha

original: BhP_01.10.018/1 uddhavaḥ sātyakiścaiva vyajane paramādbhute
analyzed: uddhavaḥ sātyakiḥ ca eva vyajane parama adbhute

original: BhP_01.10.018/3 vikīryamāṇaḥ kusumai reje madhupatiḥ pathi
analyzed: vikīryamāṇaḥ kusumaiḥ reje madhupatiḥ pathi

original: BhP_01.10.019/1 aśrūyantāśiṣaḥ satyāstatra tatra dvijeritāḥ
analyzed: aśrūyanta āśiṣaḥ satyāḥ tatra tatra dvija īritāḥ

original: BhP_01.10.019/3 nānurūpānurūpāśca nirguṇasya guṇātmanaḥ
analyzed: na anurūpa anurūpāḥ ca nirguṇasya guṇa ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_01.10.020/1 anyonyam āsīt sañjalpa uttamaślokacetasām
analyzed: anyonyam āsīt sañjalpaḥ uttamaśloka cetasām

original: BhP_01.10.020/3 kauravendrapurastrīṇāṃ sarvaśrutimanoharaḥ
analyzed: kaurava indra pura strīṇām sarva śruti manoharaḥ

original: BhP_01.10.021/1 sa vai kilāyaṃ puruṣaḥ purātano ya eka āsīdaviśeṣa ātmani
analyzed: sa vai kila ayam puruṣaḥ purātanaḥ yaḥ ekaḥ āsīt aviśeṣe ātmani

original: BhP_01.10.021/3 agre guṇebhyo jagadātmanīśvare nimīlitātman niśi suptaśaktiṣu
analyzed: agre guṇebhyaḥ jagadātmani īśvare nimīlita ātman niśi supta śaktiṣu

original: BhP_01.10.022/1 sa eva bhūyo nijavīryacoditāṃ svajīvamāyāṃ prakṛtiṃ sisṛkṣatīm
analyzed: saḥ eva bhūyas nija vīrya coditām sva jīva māyām prakṛtim sisṛkṣatīm

original: BhP_01.10.022/3 anāmarūpātmani rūpanāmanī vidhitsamāno 'nusasāra śāstrakṛt
analyzed: a nāma rūpa ātmani rūpa nāmanī vidhitsamānaḥ nusasāra śāstra kṛt

original: BhP_01.10.023/1 sa vā ayaṃ yat padam atra sūrayo jitendriyā nirjitamātariśvanaḥ
analyzed: sa vai ayam yat padam atra sūrayaḥ jita indriyāḥ nirjita mātariśvanaḥ

original: BhP_01.10.023/3 paśyanti bhaktyutkalitāmalātmanā nanveṣa sattvaṃ parimārṣṭum arhati
analyzed: paśyanti bhakti utkalita amala ātmanā nanu eṣa sattvam parimārṣṭum arhati

original: BhP_01.10.024/1 sa vā ayaṃ sakhyanugītasatkatho vedeṣu guhyeṣu ca guhyavādibhiḥ
analyzed: sa vai ayam sakhi anugīta sat kathaḥ vedeṣu guhyeṣu ca guhya vādibhiḥ

original: BhP_01.10.024/3 ya eka īśo jagadātmalīlayā sṛjatyavatyatti na tatra sajjate
analyzed: yaḥ ekaḥ īśaḥ jagat ātma līlayā sṛjati avati atti na tatra sajjate

original: BhP_01.10.025/1 yadā hyadharmeṇa tamodhiyo nṛpā jīvanti tatraiṣa hi sattvataḥ kila
analyzed: yadā hi adharmeṇa tamaḥ dhiyaḥ nṛpāḥ jīvanti tatra eṣa hi sattvataḥ kila

original: BhP_01.10.025/3 dhatte bhagaṃ satyam ṛtaṃ dayāṃ yaśo bhavāya rūpāṇi dadhadyuge yuge
analyzed: dhatte bhagam satyam ṛtam dayām yaśaḥ bhavāya rūpāṇi dadhat yuge yuge

original: BhP_01.10.026/1 aho alaṃ ślāghyatamaṃ yadoḥ kulam aho alaṃ puṇyatamaṃ madhorvanam
analyzed: aho alam ślāghyatamam yadoḥ kulam aho alam puṇyatamam madhoḥ vanam

original: BhP_01.10.026/3 yadeṣa puṃsām ṛṣabhaḥ śriyaḥ patiḥ svajanmanā caṅkramaṇena cāñcati
analyzed: yat eṣa puṃsām ṛṣabhaḥ śriyaḥ patiḥ sva janmanā caṅkramaṇena ca añcati

original: BhP_01.10.027/1 aho bata svaryaśasastiraskarī kuśasthalī puṇyayaśaskarī bhuvaḥ
analyzed: aho bata svar yaśasaḥ tiraskarī kuśasthalī puṇya yaśaskarī bhuvaḥ

original: BhP_01.10.027/3 paśyanti nityaṃ yadanugraheṣitaṃ smitāvalokaṃ svapatiṃ sma yatprajāḥ
analyzed: paśyanti nityam yad anugraha iṣitam smita avalokam sva patim sma yat prajāḥ

original: BhP_01.10.028/1 nūnaṃ vratasnānahutādineśvaraḥ samarcito hyasya gṛhītapāṇibhiḥ
analyzed: nūnam vrata snāna hutādinā īśvaraḥ samarcitaḥ hi asya gṛhīta pāṇibhiḥ

original: BhP_01.10.028/3 pibanti yāḥ sakhyadharāmṛtaṃ muhur vrajastriyaḥ sammumuhuryadāśayāḥ
analyzed: pibanti yāḥ sakhī adhara amṛtam muhur vrajastriyaḥ sammumuhuḥ yad āśayāḥ

original: BhP_01.10.029/1 yā vīryaśulkena hṛtāḥ svayaṃvare pramathya caidyapramukhān hi śuṣmiṇaḥ
analyzed: yāḥ vīrya śulkena hṛtāḥ svayaṃvare pramathya caidya pramukhān hi śuṣmiṇaḥ

original: BhP_01.10.029/3 pradyumnasāmbāmbasutādayo 'parā yāścāhṛtā bhaumavadhe sahasraśaḥ
analyzed: parāḥ yāḥ ca āhṛtāḥ bhauma vadhe sahasraśas

original: BhP_01.10.030/1 etāḥ paraṃ strītvam apāstapeśalaṃ nirastaśaucaṃ bata sādhu kurvate
analyzed: etāḥ param strī tvam apāsta peśalam nirasta śaucam bata sādhu kurvate

original: BhP_01.10.030/3 yāsāṃ gṛhāt puṣkaralocanaḥ patir na jātvapaityāhṛtibhirhṛdi spṛśan
analyzed: yāsām gṛhāt puṣkara locanaḥ patiḥ na jātu apaiti āhṛtibhiḥ hṛdi spṛśan

original: BhP_01.10.031/1 evaṃvidhā gadantīnāṃ sa giraḥ purayoṣitām
analyzed: evaṃvidhāḥ gadantīnām sa giraḥ pura yoṣitām

original: BhP_01.10.031/3 nirīkṣaṇenābhinandan sasmitena yayau hariḥ
analyzed: nirīkṣaṇena abhinandan sa smitena yayau hariḥ

original: BhP_01.10.032/1 ajātaśatruḥ pṛtanāṃ gopīthāya madhudviṣaḥ
analyzed: ajāta śatruḥ pṛtanām gopīthāya madhudviṣaḥ

original: BhP_01.10.032/3 parebhyaḥ śaṅkitaḥ snehāt prāyuṅkta caturaṅgiṇīm
analyzed: parebhyaḥ śaṅkitaḥ snehāt prāyuṅkta caturaṅgiṇīm

original: BhP_01.10.033/1 atha dūrāgatān śauriḥ kauravān virahāturān
analyzed: atha dūra āgatān śauriḥ kauravān viraha āturān

original: BhP_01.10.033/3 sannivartya dṛḍhaṃ snigdhān prāyāt svanagarīṃ priyaiḥ
analyzed: san nivartya dṛḍham snigdhān prāyāt sva nagarīm priyaiḥ

original: BhP_01.10.034/1 kurujāṅgalapāñcālān śūrasenān sayāmunān
analyzed: kurujāṅgala pāñcālān śūrasenān sa yāmunān

original: BhP_01.10.034/3 brahmāvartaṃ kurukṣetraṃ matsyān sārasvatān atha
analyzed: brahmāvartam kurukṣetram matsyān sārasvatān atha

original: BhP_01.10.035/1 marudhanvam atikramya sauvīrābhīrayoḥ parān
analyzed: maru dhanvam atikramya sauvīra ābhīrayoḥ parān

original: BhP_01.10.035/3 ānartān bhārgavopāgāc chrāntavāho manāg vibhuḥ
analyzed: ānartān bhārgava upāgāt śrānta vāhaḥ manāk vibhuḥ

original: BhP_01.10.036/1 tatra tatra ha tatratyairhariḥ pratyudyatārhaṇaḥ
analyzed: tatra tatra ha tatratyaiḥ hariḥ pratyudyata arhaṇaḥ

original: BhP_01.10.036/3 sāyaṃ bheje diśaṃ paścādgaviṣṭho gāṃ gatastadā
analyzed: sāyam bheje diśam paścāt gaviṣṭhaḥ gām gataḥ tadā

original: BhP_01.11.001/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.11.001/1 ānartān sa upavrajya svṛddhāñ janapadān svakān
analyzed: ānartān saḥ upavrajya su ṛddhām janapadān svakān

original: BhP_01.11.001/3 dadhmau daravaraṃ teṣāṃ viṣādaṃ śamayann iva
analyzed: dadhmau dara varam teṣām viṣādam śamayan iva

original: BhP_01.11.002/1 sa uccakāśe dhavalodaro daro 'pyurukramasyādharaśoṇaśoṇimā
analyzed: saḥ uccakāśe dhavala udaraḥ daraḥ pi urukramasya adhara śoṇa śoṇimā

original: BhP_01.11.002/3 dādhmāyamānaḥ karakañjasampuṭe yathābjakhaṇḍe kalahaṃsa utsvanaḥ
analyzed: dādhmāyamānaḥ kara kañja sampuṭe yathā abja khaṇḍe kalahaṃsaḥ utsvanaḥ

original: BhP_01.11.003/1 tam upaśrutya ninadaṃ jagadbhayabhayāvaham
analyzed: tam upaśrutya ninadam jagat bhaya bhaya āvaham

original: BhP_01.11.003/3 pratyudyayuḥ prajāḥ sarvā bhartṛdarśanalālasāḥ
analyzed: pratyudyayuḥ prajāḥ sarvāḥ bhartṛ darśana lālasāḥ

original: BhP_01.11.004/1 tatropanītabalayo raverdīpam ivādṛtāḥ
analyzed: tatra upanīta balayaḥ raveḥ dīpam iva ādṛtāḥ

original: BhP_01.11.004/3 ātmārāmaṃ pūrṇakāmaṃ nijalābhena nityadā
analyzed: ātma ārāmam pūrṇa kāmam nija lābhena nityadā

original: BhP_01.11.005/1 prītyutphullamukhāḥ procurharṣagadgadayā girā
analyzed: prīti utphulla mukhāḥ procuḥ harṣa gadgadayā girā

original: BhP_01.11.005/3 pitaraṃ sarvasuhṛdam avitāram ivārbhakāḥ
analyzed: pitaram sarva suhṛdam avitāram iva arbhakāḥ

original: BhP_01.11.006/1 natāḥ sma te nātha sadāṅghripaṅkajaṃ viriñcavairiñcyasurendravanditam
analyzed: natāḥ sma te nātha sadā aṅghri paṅkajam viriñca vairiñcya sura indra vanditam

original: BhP_01.11.006/3 parāyaṇaṃ kṣemam ihecchatāṃ paraṃ na yatra kālaḥ prabhavet paraḥ prabhuḥ
analyzed: parāyaṇam kṣemam iha icchatām param na yatra kālaḥ prabhavet paraḥ prabhuḥ

original: BhP_01.11.007/1 bhavāya nastvaṃ bhava viśvabhāvana tvam eva mātātha suhṛtpatiḥ pitā
analyzed: bhavāya naḥ tvam bhava viśvabhāvana tvam eva mātā atha suhṛd patiḥ pitā

original: BhP_01.11.007/3 tvaṃ sadgururnaḥ paramaṃ ca daivataṃ yasyānuvṛttyā kṛtino babhūvima
analyzed: tvam sat guruḥ naḥ paramam ca daivatam yasya anuvṛttyā kṛtinaḥ babhūvima

original: BhP_01.11.008/1 aho sanāthā bhavatā sma yadvayaṃ traiviṣṭapānām api dūradarśanam
analyzed: aho sa nāthāḥ bhavatā sma yat vayam traiviṣṭapānām api dūra darśanam

original: BhP_01.11.008/3 premasmitasnigdhanirīkṣaṇānanaṃ paśyema rūpaṃ tava sarvasaubhagam
analyzed: prema smita snigdha nirīkṣaṇa ānanam paśyema rūpam tava sarva saubhagam

original: BhP_01.11.009/1 yarhyambujākṣāpasasāra bho bhavān kurūn madhūn vātha suhṛddidṛkṣayā
analyzed: yarhi ambuja akṣa apasasāra bho bhavān kurūn madhūn vā atha suhṛd didṛkṣayā

original: BhP_01.11.009/3 tatrābdakoṭipratimaḥ kṣaṇo bhaved raviṃ vinākṣṇoriva nastavācyuta
analyzed: tatra abda koṭi pratimaḥ kṣaṇaḥ bhavet ravim naḥ tava acyuta

original: BhP_01.11.010/1 kathaṃ vayaṃ nātha ciroṣite tvayi prasannadṛṣṭyākhilatāpaśoṣaṇam
analyzed: katham vayam nātha cira uṣite tvayi prasanna dṛṣṭyā akhila tāpa śoṣaṇam

original: BhP_01.11.010/3 jīvema te sundarahāsaśobhitam apaśyamānā vadanaṃ manoharam
analyzed: jīvema te sundara hāsa śobhitam apaśyamānāḥ vadanam manoharam

original: BhP_01.11.011/1 iti codīritā vācaḥ prajānāṃ bhaktavatsalaḥ
analyzed: iti ca udīritāḥ vācaḥ prajānām bhakta vatsalaḥ

original: BhP_01.11.011/3 śṛṇvāno 'nugrahaṃ dṛṣṭyā vitanvan prāviśat puram
analyzed: śṛṇvānaḥ nugraham dṛṣṭyāḥ vitanvan prāviśat puram

original: BhP_01.11.012/1 madhubhojadaśārhārhakukurāndhakavṛṣṇibhiḥ
analyzed: madhu bhoja daśārha arha kukura andhaka vṛṣṇibhiḥ

original: BhP_01.11.012/3 ātmatulyabalairguptāṃ nāgairbhogavatīm iva
analyzed: ātma tulya balaiḥ guptām nāgaiḥ bhogavatīm iva

original: BhP_01.11.013/1 sarvartusarvavibhavapuṇyavṛkṣalatāśramaiḥ
analyzed: sarva ṛtu sarva vibhava puṇya vṛkṣa latā āśramaiḥ

original: BhP_01.11.013/3 udyānopavanārāmairvṛtapadmākaraśriyam
analyzed: udyāna upavana ārāmaiḥ vṛta padma ākara śriyam

original: BhP_01.11.014/1 gopuradvāramārgeṣu kṛtakautukatoraṇām
analyzed: gopura dvāra mārgeṣu kṛta kautuka toraṇām

original: BhP_01.11.014/3 citradhvajapatākāgrairantaḥ pratihatātapām
analyzed: citra dhvaja patākā agraiḥ antar pratihata ātapām

original: BhP_01.11.015/1 sammārjitamahāmārga rathyāpaṇakacatvarām
analyzed: sammārjita mahā mārga rathyā āpaṇaka catvarām

original: BhP_01.11.015/3 siktāṃ gandhajalairuptāṃ phalapuṣpākṣatāṅkuraiḥ
analyzed: siktām gandha jalaiḥ uptām phala puṣpa akṣata aṅkuraiḥ

original: BhP_01.11.016/1 dvāri dvāri gṛhāṇāṃ ca dadhyakṣataphalekṣubhiḥ
analyzed: dvāri dvāri gṛhāṇām ca dadhi akṣata phala ikṣubhiḥ

original: BhP_01.11.016/3 alaṅkṛtāṃ pūrṇakumbhairbalibhirdhūpadīpakaiḥ
analyzed: alaṅkṛtām pūrṇakumbhaiḥ balibhiḥ dhūpa dīpakaiḥ

original: BhP_01.11.017/1 niśamya preṣṭham āyāntaṃ vasudevo mahāmanāḥ
analyzed: niśamya preṣṭham āyāntam vasudevaḥ mahā manāḥ

original: BhP_01.11.017/3 akrūraścograsenaśca rāmaścādbhutavikramaḥ
analyzed: akrūraḥ ca ugrasenaḥ ca rāmaḥ ca adbhuta vikramaḥ

original: BhP_01.11.018/1 pradyumnaścārudeṣṇaśca sāmbo jāmbavatīsutaḥ
analyzed: pradyumnaḥ cārudeṣṇaḥ ca sāmbaḥ jāmbavatī sutaḥ

original: BhP_01.11.018/3 praharṣavegocchaśitaśayanāsanabhojanāḥ
analyzed: praharṣa vega ucchaśita śayana āsana bhojanāḥ

original: BhP_01.11.019/1 vāraṇendraṃ puraskṛtya brāhmaṇaiḥ sasumaṅgalaiḥ
analyzed: vāraṇa indram puraskṛtya brāhmaṇaiḥ sa su maṅgalaiḥ

original: BhP_01.11.019/3 śaṅkhatūryaninādena brahmaghoṣeṇa cādṛtāḥ
analyzed: śaṅkha tūrya ninādena brahmaghoṣeṇa ca ādṛtāḥ

original: BhP_01.11.019/5 pratyujjagmū rathairhṛṣṭāḥ praṇayāgatasādhvasāḥ
analyzed: pratyujjagmuḥ rathaiḥ hṛṣṭāḥ praṇaya āgata sādhvasāḥ

original: BhP_01.11.020/1 vāramukhyāśca śataśo yānaistaddarśanotsukāḥ
analyzed: vāramukhyāḥ ca śataśas yānaiḥ tad darśana utsukāḥ

original: BhP_01.11.020/3 lasatkuṇḍalanirbhātakapolavadanaśriyaḥ
BhP_01.11.021/1 naṭanartakagandharvāḥ sūtamāgadhavandinaḥ
analyzed: naṭa nartaka gandharvāḥ sūta māgadha vandinaḥ

original: BhP_01.11.021/3 gāyanti cottamaślokacaritānyadbhutāni ca
analyzed: gāyanti ca uttamaśloka caritāni adbhutāni ca

original: BhP_01.11.022/1 bhagavāṃstatra bandhūnāṃ paurāṇām anuvartinām
analyzed: bhagavān tatra bandhūnām paurāṇām anuvartinām

original: BhP_01.11.022/3 yathāvidhyupasaṅgamya sarveṣāṃ mānam ādadhe
analyzed: yathāvidhi upasaṅgamya sarveṣām mānam ādadhe

original: BhP_01.11.023/1 prahvābhivādanāśleṣakarasparśasmitekṣaṇaiḥ
analyzed: prahva abhivādana āśleṣa kara sparśa smita īkṣaṇaiḥ

original: BhP_01.11.023/3 āśvāsya cāśvapākebhyo varaiścābhimatairvibhuḥ
analyzed: āśvāsya ca aśva pākebhyaḥ varaiḥ ca abhimataiḥ vibhuḥ

original: BhP_01.11.024/1 svayaṃ ca gurubhirvipraiḥ sadāraiḥ sthavirairapi
analyzed: svayam ca gurubhiḥ vipraiḥ sa dāraiḥ sthaviraiḥ api

original: BhP_01.11.024/3 āśīrbhiryujyamāno 'nyairvandibhiścāviśat puram
analyzed: āśīrbhiḥ yujyamānaḥ nyaiḥ vandibhiḥ ca aviśat puram

original: BhP_01.11.025/1 rājamārgaṃ gate kṛṣṇe dvārakāyāḥ kulastriyaḥ
analyzed: rājamārgam gate kṛṣṇe dvārakāyāḥ kula striyaḥ

original: BhP_01.11.025/3 harmyāṇyāruruhurvipra tadīkṣaṇamahotsavāḥ
analyzed: harmyāṇi āruruhuḥ vipra tad īkṣaṇa mahā utsavāḥ

original: BhP_01.11.026/1 nityaṃ nirīkṣamāṇānāṃ yadapi dvārakaukasām
analyzed: nityam nirīkṣamāṇānām yat api dvārakā okasām

original: BhP_01.11.026/3 na vitṛpyanti hi dṛśaḥ śriyo dhāmāṅgam acyutam
analyzed: na vitṛpyanti hi dṛśaḥ śriyaḥ dhāma aṅgam acyutam

original: BhP_01.11.027/1 śriyo nivāso yasyoraḥ pānapātraṃ mukhaṃ dṛśām
analyzed: śriyaḥ nivāsaḥ yasya uraḥ pāna pātram mukham dṛśām

original: BhP_01.11.027/3 bāhavo lokapālānāṃ sāraṅgāṇāṃ padāmbujam
analyzed: bāhavaḥ lokapālānām sāraṅgāṇām pada ambujam

original: BhP_01.11.028/1 sitātapatravyajanairupaskṛtaḥ prasūnavarṣairabhivarṣitaḥ pathi
analyzed: sita ātapatra vyajanaiḥ upaskṛtaḥ prasūna varṣaiḥ abhivarṣitaḥ pathi

original: BhP_01.11.028/3 piśaṅgavāsā vanamālayā babhau ghano yathārkoḍupacāpavaidyutaiḥ
analyzed: piśaṅga vāsāḥ vanamālayā babhau ghanaḥ yathā arka uḍupa cāpa vaidyutaiḥ

original: BhP_01.11.029/1 praviṣṭastu gṛhaṃ pitroḥ pariṣvaktaḥ svamātṛbhiḥ
analyzed: praviṣṭaḥ tu gṛham pitroḥ pariṣvaktaḥ sva mātṛbhiḥ

original: BhP_01.11.029/3 vavande śirasā sapta devakīpramukhā mudā
analyzed: vavande śirasā sapta devakī pramukhāḥ mudā

original: BhP_01.11.030/1 tāḥ putram aṅkam āropya snehasnutapayodharāḥ
analyzed: tāḥ putram aṅkam āropya sneha snuta payodharāḥ

original: BhP_01.11.030/3 harṣavihvalitātmānaḥ siṣicurnetrajairjalaiḥ
analyzed: harṣa vihvalita ātmānaḥ siṣicuḥ netra jaiḥ jalaiḥ

original: BhP_01.11.031/1 athāviśat svabhavanaṃ sarvakāmam anuttamam
analyzed: athā aviśat sva bhavanam sarva kāmam anuttamam

original: BhP_01.11.031/3 prāsādā yatra patnīnāṃ sahasrāṇi ca ṣoḍaśa
analyzed: prāsādāḥ yatra patnīnām sahasrāṇi ca ṣoḍaśa

original: BhP_01.11.032/1 patnyaḥ patiṃ proṣya gṛhānupāgataṃ vilokya sañjātamanomahotsavāḥ
analyzed: patnyaḥ patim proṣya gṛhān upāgatam vilokya sañjāta manaḥ mahā utsavāḥ

original: BhP_01.11.032/3 uttasthurārāt sahasāsanāśayāt sākaṃ vratairvrīḍitalocanānanāḥ
analyzed: uttasthuḥ ārāt sahasā āsana āśayāt sākam vrataiḥ vrīḍita locana ānanāḥ

original: BhP_01.11.033/1 tam ātmajairdṛṣṭibhirantarātmanā durantabhāvāḥ parirebhire patim
analyzed: tam ātmajaiḥ dṛṣṭibhiḥ antarātmanā duranta bhāvāḥ parirebhire patim

original: BhP_01.11.033/3 niruddham apyāsravadambu netrayor vilajjatīnāṃ bhṛguvarya vaiklavāt
analyzed: niruddham api āsravat ambu netrayoḥ vilajjatīnām bhṛgu varya vaiklavāt

original: BhP_01.11.034/1 yadyapyasau pārśvagato rahogatas tathāpi tasyāṅghriyugaṃ navaṃ navam
analyzed: yadi api asau pārśva gataḥ rahaḥ gataḥ tathā api tasya aṅghri yugam navam navam

original: BhP_01.11.034/3 pade pade kā virameta tatpadāc calāpi yac chrīrna jahāti karhicit
analyzed: pade pade kā virameta tad padāt calā api yat śrīḥ na jahāti karhicit

original: BhP_01.11.035/1 evaṃ nṛpāṇāṃ kṣitibhārajanmanām akṣauhiṇībhiḥ parivṛttatejasām
analyzed: evam nṛpāṇām kṣiti bhāra janmanām akṣauhiṇībhiḥ parivṛtta tejasām

original: BhP_01.11.035/3 vidhāya vairaṃ śvasano yathānalaṃ mitho vadhenoparato nirāyudhaḥ
analyzed: vidhāya vairam śvasanaḥ yathā analam mithas vadhena uparataḥ nirāyudhaḥ

original: BhP_01.11.036/1 sa eṣa naraloke 'sminn avatīrṇaḥ svamāyayā
analyzed: saḥ eṣa nara loke smin avatīrṇaḥ sva māyayā

original: BhP_01.11.036/3 reme strīratnakūṭastho bhagavān prākṛto yathā
analyzed: reme strī ratna kūṭa sthaḥ bhagavān prākṛtaḥ yathā

original: BhP_01.11.037/1 uddāmabhāvapiśunāmalavalguhāsa
analyzed: uddāma bhāva piśuna amala valgu hāsa

original: BhP_01.11.037/2 vrīḍāvalokanihato madano 'pi yāsām
analyzed: vrīḍā avaloka nihataḥ madanaḥ pi yāsām

original: BhP_01.11.037/3 sammuhya cāpam ajahāt pramadottamāstā
analyzed: sammuhya cāpam ajahāt pramadā uttamā astā

original: BhP_01.11.037/4 yasyendriyaṃ vimathituṃ kuhakairna śekuḥ
analyzed: yasya indriyam vimathitum kuhakaiḥ na śekuḥ

original: BhP_01.11.038/1 tam ayaṃ manyate loko hyasaṅgam api saṅginam
analyzed: tam ayam manyate lokaḥ hi asaṅgam api saṅginam

original: BhP_01.11.038/3 ātmaupamyena manujaṃ vyāpṛṇvānaṃ yato 'budhaḥ
analyzed: ātma aupamyena manujam vyāpṛṇvānam yatas budhaḥ

original: BhP_01.11.039/1 etadīśanam īśasya prakṛtistho 'pi tadguṇaiḥ
analyzed: īśasya tad guṇaiḥ

original: BhP_01.11.039/3 na yujyate sadātmasthairyathā buddhistadāśrayā
analyzed: na yujyate sat ātma sthaiḥ yathā buddhiḥ tad āśrayā

original: BhP_01.11.040/1 taṃ menire 'balā mūḍhāḥ straiṇaṃ cānuvrataṃ rahaḥ
analyzed: tam menire balāḥ mūḍhāḥ straiṇam ca anuvratam rahaḥ

original: BhP_01.11.040/3 apramāṇavido bharturīśvaraṃ matayo yathā
analyzed: a pramāṇa vidaḥ bhartuḥ īśvaram matayaḥ yathā

original: BhP_01.12.001/0 śaunaka uvāca
analyzed: śaunakaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.12.001/1 aśvatthāmnopasṛṣṭena brahmaśīrṣṇorutejasā
analyzed: aśvatthāmnā upasṛṣṭena brahma śīrṣṇā uru tejasā

original: BhP_01.12.001/3 uttarāyā hato garbha īśenājīvitaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: uttarāyāḥ hataḥ garbhaḥ īśena ājīvitaḥ punar

original: BhP_01.12.002/1 tasya janma mahābuddheḥ karmāṇi ca mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: tasya janma mahābuddheḥ karmāṇi ca mahātmanaḥ

original: BhP_01.12.002/3 nidhanaṃ ca yathaivāsīt sa pretya gatavān yathā
analyzed: nidhanam ca yathā eva āsīt sa pretya gatavān yathā

original: BhP_01.12.003/1 tadidaṃ śrotum icchāmo gadituṃ yadi manyase
analyzed: tat idam śrotum icchāmaḥ gaditum yadi manyase

original: BhP_01.12.003/3 brūhi naḥ śraddadhānānāṃ yasya jñānam adāc chukaḥ
analyzed: brūhi naḥ śraddadhānānām yasya jñānam adāt śukaḥ

original: BhP_01.12.004/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.12.004/1 apīpaladdharmarājaḥ pitṛvadrañjayan prajāḥ
analyzed: apīpalat dharmarājaḥ pitṛ vat rañjayan prajāḥ

original: BhP_01.12.004/3 niḥspṛhaḥ sarvakāmebhyaḥ kṛṣṇapādānusevayā
analyzed: niḥspṛhaḥ sarva kāmebhyaḥ kṛṣṇa pāda anusevayā

original: BhP_01.12.005/1 sampadaḥ kratavo lokā mahiṣī bhrātaro mahī
analyzed: sampadaḥ kratavaḥ lokāḥ mahiṣī bhrātaraḥ mahī

original: BhP_01.12.005/3 jambūdvīpādhipatyaṃ ca yaśaśca tridivaṃ gatam
analyzed: jambūdvīpa ādhipatyam ca yaśaḥ ca tridivam gatam

original: BhP_01.12.006/1 kiṃ te kāmāḥ suraspārhā mukundamanaso dvijāḥ
analyzed: kim te kāmāḥ mukunda manasaḥ dvijāḥ

original: BhP_01.12.006/3 adhijahrurmudaṃ rājñaḥ kṣudhitasya yathetare
analyzed: adhijahruḥ mudam rājñaḥ kṣudhitasya yathā itare

original: BhP_01.12.007/1 māturgarbhagato vīraḥ sa tadā bhṛgunandana
analyzed: mātuḥ garbha gataḥ vīraḥ sa tadā bhṛgu nandana

original: BhP_01.12.007/3 dadarśa puruṣaṃ kañciddahyamāno 'stratejasā
analyzed: dadarśa puruṣam kañcid dahyamānaḥ stra tejasā

original: BhP_01.12.008/1 aṅguṣṭhamātram amalaṃ sphuratpuraṭamaulinam
analyzed: aṅguṣṭha mātram amalam sphurat puraṭa maulinam

original: BhP_01.12.008/3 apīvyadarśanaṃ śyāmaṃ taḍidvāsasam acyutam
analyzed: śyāmam taḍit vāsasam acyutam

original: BhP_01.12.009/1 śrīmaddīrghacaturbāhuṃ taptakāñcanakuṇḍalam
analyzed: śrīmat dīrgha catur bāhum tapta kāñcana kuṇḍalam

original: BhP_01.12.009/3 kṣatajākṣaṃ gadāpāṇim ātmanaḥ sarvato diśam
analyzed: kṣataja akṣam gadā pāṇim ātmanaḥ sarvatas diśam

original: BhP_01.12.009/5 paribhramantam ulkābhāṃ bhrāmayantaṃ gadāṃ muhuḥ
analyzed: paribhramantam ulkā ābhām bhrāmayantam gadām muhur

original: BhP_01.12.010/1 astratejaḥ svagadayā nīhāram iva gopatiḥ
analyzed: astra tejaḥ sva gadayā nīhāram iva gopatiḥ

original: BhP_01.12.010/3 vidhamantaṃ sannikarṣe paryaikṣata ka ityasau
analyzed: vidhamantam sannikarṣe paryaikṣata kaḥ iti asau

original: BhP_01.12.011/1 vidhūya tadameyātmā bhagavān dharmagub vibhuḥ
analyzed: vidhūya tat ameya ātmā bhagavān vibhuḥ

original: BhP_01.12.011/3 miṣato daśamāsasya tatraivāntardadhe hariḥ
analyzed: miṣataḥ daśa māsasya tatra eva antardadhe hariḥ

original: BhP_01.12.012/1 tataḥ sarvaguṇodarke sānukūlagrahodaye
analyzed: tatas sarva guṇa udarke sa anukūla graha udaye

original: BhP_01.12.012/3 jajñe vaṃśadharaḥ pāṇḍorbhūyaḥ pāṇḍurivaujasā
analyzed: jajñe vaṃśa dharaḥ pāṇḍoḥ bhūyas pāṇḍuḥ iva ojasā

original: BhP_01.12.013/1 tasya prītamanā rājā viprairdhaumyakṛpādibhiḥ
analyzed: tasya prīta manāḥ rājā vipraiḥ dhaumya kṛpa ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_01.12.013/3 jātakaṃ kārayām āsa vācayitvā ca maṅgalam
analyzed: jātakam kārayām āsa vācayitvā ca maṅgalam

original: BhP_01.12.014/1 hiraṇyaṃ gāṃ mahīṃ grāmān hastyaśvān nṛpatirvarān
analyzed: hiraṇyam gām mahīm grāmān hasti aśvān nṛpatiḥ varān

original: BhP_01.12.014/3 prādāt svannaṃ ca viprebhyaḥ prajātīrthe sa tīrthavit
analyzed: prādāt su annam ca viprebhyaḥ prajātīrthe sa tīrtha vid

original: BhP_01.12.015/1 tam ūcurbrāhmaṇāstuṣṭā rājānaṃ praśrayānvitam
analyzed: tam ūcuḥ brāhmaṇāḥ tuṣṭāḥ rājānam praśraya anvitam

original: BhP_01.12.015/3 eṣa hyasmin prajātantau purūṇāṃ pauravarṣabha
analyzed: eṣa hi asmin prajā tantau purūṇām paurava ṛṣabha

original: BhP_01.12.016/1 daivenāpratighātena śukle saṃsthām upeyuṣi
analyzed: daivena apratighātena śukle saṃsthām upeyuṣi

original: BhP_01.12.016/3 rāto vo 'nugrahārthāya viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā
analyzed: rātaḥ vaḥ nugraha arthāya viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā

original: BhP_01.12.017/1 tasmān nāmnā viṣṇurāta iti loke bhaviṣyati
analyzed: tasmāt nāmnā viṣṇurātaḥ iti loke bhaviṣyati

original: BhP_01.12.017/3 na sandeho mahābhāga mahābhāgavato mahān
analyzed: na sandehaḥ mahābhāga mahā bhāgavataḥ mahān

original: BhP_01.12.018/0 śrīrājovāca
analyzed: śrī rājā uvāca

original: BhP_01.12.018/1 apyeṣa vaṃśyān rājarṣīn puṇyaślokān mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: api eṣa vaṃśyān rājarṣīn puṇya ślokān mahātmanaḥ

original: BhP_01.12.018/3 anuvartitā svidyaśasā sādhuvādena sattamāḥ
analyzed: anuvartitā svid yaśasā sādhu vādena sattamāḥ

original: BhP_01.12.019/0 brāhmaṇā ūcuḥ
analyzed: brāhmaṇāḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_01.12.019/1 pārtha prajāvitā sākṣādikṣvākuriva mānavaḥ
analyzed: pārtha sākṣāt ikṣvākuḥ iva mānavaḥ

original: BhP_01.12.019/3 brahmaṇyaḥ satyasandhaśca rāmo dāśarathiryathā
analyzed: brahmaṇyaḥ satya sandhaḥ ca rāmaḥ dāśarathiḥ yathā

original: BhP_01.12.020/1 eṣa dātā śaraṇyaśca yathā hyauśīnaraḥ śibiḥ
analyzed: eṣa dātā śaraṇyaḥ ca yathā hi auśīnaraḥ śibiḥ

original: BhP_01.12.020/3 yaśo vitanitā svānāṃ dauṣyantiriva yajvanām
analyzed: yaśaḥ vitanitā svānām dauṣyantiḥ iva yajvanām

original: BhP_01.12.021/1 dhanvinām agraṇīreṣa tulyaścārjunayordvayoḥ
analyzed: dhanvinām agraṇīḥ eṣa tulyaḥ ca arjunayoḥ dvayoḥ

original: BhP_01.12.021/3 hutāśa iva durdharṣaḥ samudra iva dustaraḥ
analyzed: hutāśaḥ iva durdharṣaḥ samudraḥ iva dustaraḥ

original: BhP_01.12.022/1 mṛgendra iva vikrānto niṣevyo himavān iva
analyzed: mṛgendraḥ iva vikrāntaḥ niṣevyaḥ himavān iva

original: BhP_01.12.022/3 titikṣurvasudhevāsau sahiṣṇuḥ pitarāviva
analyzed: titikṣuḥ vasudhā iva asau sahiṣṇuḥ pitarau iva

original: BhP_01.12.023/1 pitāmahasamaḥ sāmye prasāde giriśopamaḥ
analyzed: pitāmaha samaḥ sāmye prasāde giriśa upamaḥ

original: BhP_01.12.023/3 āśrayaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ yathā devo ramāśrayaḥ
analyzed: āśrayaḥ sarva bhūtānām yathā devaḥ ramāśrayaḥ

original: BhP_01.12.024/1 sarvasadguṇamāhātmye eṣa kṛṣṇam anuvrataḥ
analyzed: sarva sat guṇa māhātmye eṣa kṛṣṇam anuvrataḥ

original: BhP_01.12.024/3 rantideva ivodāro yayātiriva dhārmikaḥ
analyzed: rantidevaḥ iva udāraḥ yayātiḥ iva dhārmikaḥ

original: BhP_01.12.025/1 hṛtyā balisamaḥ kṛṣṇe prahrāda iva sadgrahaḥ
analyzed: hṛtyā bali samaḥ kṛṣṇe prahrādaḥ iva sat grahaḥ

original: BhP_01.12.025/3 āhartaiṣo 'śvamedhānāṃ vṛddhānāṃ paryupāsakaḥ
analyzed: āhartā eṣaḥ śvamedhānām vṛddhānām paryupāsakaḥ

original: BhP_01.12.026/1 rājarṣīṇāṃ janayitā śāstā cotpathagāminām
analyzed: rājarṣīṇām janayitā śāstā ca utpatha gāminām

original: BhP_01.12.026/3 nigrahītā kalereṣa bhuvo dharmasya kāraṇāt
analyzed: nigrahītā kaleḥ eṣa bhuvaḥ dharmasya kāraṇāt

original: BhP_01.12.027/1 takṣakādātmano mṛtyuṃ dvijaputropasarjitāt
analyzed: takṣakāt ātmanaḥ mṛtyum dvija putra upasarjitāt

original: BhP_01.12.027/3 prapatsyata upaśrutya muktasaṅgaḥ padaṃ hareḥ
analyzed: prapatsyate upaśrutya mukta saṅgaḥ padam hareḥ

original: BhP_01.12.028/1 jijñāsitātmayāthārthyo munervyāsasutādasau
analyzed: jijñāsita ātma yāthārthyaḥ muneḥ vyāsa sutāt asau

original: BhP_01.12.028/3 hitvedaṃ nṛpa gaṅgāyāṃ yāsyatyaddhākutobhayam
analyzed: hitvā idam nṛpa gaṅgāyām yāsyati addhā akutobhayam

original: BhP_01.12.029/1 iti rājña upādiśya viprā jātakakovidāḥ
analyzed: iti rājñaḥ upādiśya viprāḥ jātaka kovidāḥ

original: BhP_01.12.029/3 labdhāpacitayaḥ sarve pratijagmuḥ svakān gṛhān
analyzed: labdha apacitayaḥ sarve pratijagmuḥ svakān gṛhān

original: BhP_01.12.030/1 sa eṣa loke vikhyātaḥ parīkṣiditi yat prabhuḥ
analyzed: saḥ eṣa loke vikhyātaḥ parīkṣit iti yat prabhuḥ

original: BhP_01.12.030/3 pūrvaṃ dṛṣṭam anudhyāyan parīkṣeta nareṣviha
analyzed: pūrvam dṛṣṭam anudhyāyan parīkṣeta nareṣu iha

original: BhP_01.12.031/1 sa rājaputro vavṛdhe āśu śukla ivoḍupaḥ
analyzed: sa rāja putraḥ vavṛdhe āśu śuklaḥ iva uḍupaḥ

original: BhP_01.12.031/3 āpūryamāṇaḥ pitṛbhiḥ kāṣṭhābhiriva so 'nvaham
analyzed: āpūryamāṇaḥ pitṛbhiḥ kāṣṭhābhiḥ iva saḥ nu aham

original: BhP_01.12.032/1 yakṣyamāṇo 'śvamedhena jñātidrohajihāsayā
analyzed: yakṣyamāṇaḥ śvamedhena jñāti droha jihāsayā

original: BhP_01.12.032/3 rājā labdhadhano dadhyau nānyatra karadaṇḍayoḥ
analyzed: rājā labdha dhanaḥ dadhyau na anyatra kara daṇḍayoḥ

original: BhP_01.12.033/1 tadabhipretam ālakṣya bhrātaro ñcyutacoditāḥ
analyzed: tad abhipretam ālakṣya bhrātaraḥ ñcyuta coditāḥ

original: BhP_01.12.033/3 dhanaṃ prahīṇam ājahrurudīcyāṃ diśi bhūriśaḥ
analyzed: dhanam prahīṇam ājahruḥ udīcyām diśi bhūriśas

original: BhP_01.12.034/1 tena sambhṛtasambhāro dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
analyzed: tena sambhṛta sambhāraḥ dharmaputraḥ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

original: BhP_01.12.034/3 vājimedhaistribhirbhīto yajñaiḥ samayajaddharim
analyzed: vājimedhaiḥ tribhiḥ bhītaḥ yajñaiḥ samayajat harim

original: BhP_01.12.035/1 āhūto bhagavān rājñā yājayitvā dvijairnṛpam
analyzed: āhūtaḥ bhagavān rājñā yājayitvā dvijaiḥ nṛpam

original: BhP_01.12.035/3 uvāsa katicin māsān suhṛdāṃ priyakāmyayā
analyzed: uvāsa katicid māsān suhṛdām priya kāmyayā

original: BhP_01.12.036/1 tato rājñābhyanujñātaḥ kṛṣṇayā sahabandhubhiḥ
analyzed: tatas rājñā abhyanujñātaḥ kṛṣṇayā saha bandhubhiḥ

original: BhP_01.12.036/3 yayau dvāravatīṃ brahman sārjuno yadubhirvṛtaḥ
analyzed: yayau dvāravatīm brahman sa arjunaḥ yadubhiḥ vṛtaḥ

original: BhP_01.13.001/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.13.001/1 vidurastīrthayātrāyāṃ maitreyādātmano gatim
analyzed: viduraḥ tīrtha yātrāyām maitreyāt ātmanaḥ gatim

original: BhP_01.13.001/3 jñātvāgāddhāstinapuraṃ tayāvāptavivitsitaḥ
analyzed: jñātvā agāt hāstinapuram tayā avāpta vivitsitaḥ

original: BhP_01.13.002/1 yāvataḥ kṛtavān praśnān kṣattā kauṣāravāgrataḥ
analyzed: yāvataḥ kṛtavān praśnān kṣattā kauṣārava agratas

original: BhP_01.13.002/3 jātaikabhaktirgovinde tebhyaścopararāma ha
analyzed: jāta eka bhaktiḥ govinde tebhyaḥ ca upararāma ha

original: BhP_01.13.003/1 taṃ bandhum āgataṃ dṛṣṭvā dharmaputraḥ sahānujaḥ
analyzed: tam bandhum āgatam dṛṣṭvā dharmaputraḥ sahānujaḥ

original: BhP_01.13.003/3 dhṛtarāṣṭro yuyutsuśca sūtaḥ śāradvataḥ pṛthā
analyzed: dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ yuyutsuḥ ca sūtaḥ śāradvataḥ pṛthā

original: BhP_01.13.004/1 gāndhārī draupadī brahman subhadrā cottarā kṛpī
analyzed: gāndhārī draupadī brahman subhadrā ca uttarā kṛpī

original: BhP_01.13.004/3 anyāśca jāmayaḥ pāṇḍorjñātayaḥ sasutāḥ striyaḥ
analyzed: anyāḥ ca jāmayaḥ pāṇḍoḥ jñātayaḥ sa sutāḥ striyaḥ

original: BhP_01.13.005/1 pratyujjagmuḥ praharṣeṇa prāṇaṃ tanva ivāgatam
analyzed: pratyujjagmuḥ praharṣeṇa prāṇam tanvaḥ iva āgatam

original: BhP_01.13.005/3 abhisaṅgamya vidhivat pariṣvaṅgābhivādanaiḥ
analyzed: abhisaṅgamya vidhivat pariṣvaṅga abhivādanaiḥ

original: BhP_01.13.006/1 mumucuḥ premabāṣpaughaṃ virahautkaṇṭhyakātarāḥ
analyzed: mumucuḥ prema bāṣpa ogham viraha autkaṇṭhya kātarāḥ

original: BhP_01.13.006/3 rājā tam arhayāṃ cakre kṛtāsanaparigraham
analyzed: rājā tam kṛta āsana parigraham

original: BhP_01.13.007/1 taṃ bhuktavantaṃ viśrāntam āsīnaṃ sukham āsane
analyzed: tam bhuktavantam viśrāntam āsīnam sukham āsane

original: BhP_01.13.007/3 praśrayāvanato rājā prāha teṣāṃ ca śṛṇvatām
analyzed: praśraya avanataḥ rājā prāha teṣām ca śṛṇvatām

original: BhP_01.13.008/0 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhiraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.13.008/1 api smaratha no yuṣmatpakṣacchāyāsamedhitān
analyzed: api smaratha naḥ yuṣmad pakṣa chāyā samedhitān

original: BhP_01.13.008/3 vipadgaṇādviṣāgnyādermocitā yat samātṛkāḥ
analyzed: vipad gaṇāt viṣa agni ādeḥ mocitāḥ yat sa mātṛkāḥ

original: BhP_01.13.009/1 kayā vṛttyā vartitaṃ vaścaradbhiḥ kṣitimaṇḍalam
analyzed: kayā vṛttyā vartitam vaḥ caradbhiḥ kṣiti maṇḍalam

original: BhP_01.13.009/3 tīrthāni kṣetramukhyāni sevitānīha bhūtale
analyzed: tīrthāni kṣetra mukhyāni sevitāni iha bhū tale

original: BhP_01.13.010/1 bhavadvidhā bhāgavatāstīrthabhūtāḥ svayaṃ vibho
analyzed: bhavadvidhāḥ bhāgavatāḥ tīrtha bhūtāḥ svayam vibho

original: BhP_01.13.010/3 tīrthīkurvanti tīrthāni svāntaḥsthena gadābhṛtā
analyzed: tīrthīkurvanti tīrthāni sva antaḥsthena gadābhṛtā

original: BhP_01.13.011/1 api naḥ suhṛdastāta bāndhavāḥ kṛṣṇadevatāḥ
analyzed: api naḥ suhṛdaḥ tāta bāndhavāḥ kṛṣṇa devatāḥ

original: BhP_01.13.011/3 dṛṣṭāḥ śrutā vā yadavaḥ svapuryāṃ sukham āsate
analyzed: dṛṣṭāḥ śrutāḥ vā yadavaḥ sva puryām sukham āsate

original: BhP_01.13.012/1 ityukto dharmarājena sarvaṃ tat samavarṇayat
analyzed: iti uktaḥ dharmarājena sarvam tat samavarṇayat

original: BhP_01.13.012/3 yathānubhūtaṃ kramaśo vinā yadukulakṣayam
analyzed: yathā anubhūtam kramaśas vinā yadu kula kṣayam

original: BhP_01.13.013/1 nanvapriyaṃ durviṣahaṃ nṛṇāṃ svayam upasthitam
analyzed: nanu apriyam durviṣaham nṛṇām svayam upasthitam

original: BhP_01.13.013/3 nāvedayat sakaruṇo duḥkhitān draṣṭum akṣamaḥ
analyzed: na āvedayat sa karuṇaḥ duḥkhitān draṣṭum akṣamaḥ

original: BhP_01.13.014/1 kañcit kālam athāvātsīt satkṛto devavat sukham
analyzed: kañcid kālam atha avātsīt satkṛtaḥ deva vat sukham

original: BhP_01.13.014/3 bhrāturjyeṣṭhasya śreyaskṛt sarveṣāṃ sukham āvahan
analyzed: bhrātuḥ jyeṣṭhasya śreyaskṛt sarveṣām sukham āvahan

original: BhP_01.13.015/1 abibhradaryamā daṇḍaṃ yathāvadaghakāriṣu
analyzed: abibhrat aryamā daṇḍam yathāvat agha kāriṣu

original: BhP_01.13.015/3 yāvaddadhāra śūdratvaṃ śāpādvarṣaśataṃ yamaḥ
analyzed: yāvat dadhāra śūdra tvam śāpāt varṣa śatam yamaḥ

original: BhP_01.13.016/1 yudhiṣṭhiro labdharājyo dṛṣṭvā pautraṃ kulandharam
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhiraḥ labdha rājyaḥ dṛṣṭvā pautram kulandharam

original: BhP_01.13.016/3 bhrātṛbhirlokapālābhairmumude parayā śriyā
analyzed: bhrātṛbhiḥ lokapāla ābhaiḥ mumude parayā śriyā

original: BhP_01.13.017/1 evaṃ gṛheṣu saktānāṃ pramattānāṃ tadīhayā
analyzed: evam gṛheṣu saktānām pramattānām tad īhayā

original: BhP_01.13.017/3 atyakrāmadavijñātaḥ kālaḥ paramadustaraḥ
analyzed: atyakrāmat avijñātaḥ kālaḥ parama dustaraḥ

original: BhP_01.13.018/1 vidurastadabhipretya dhṛtarāṣṭram abhāṣata
analyzed: viduraḥ tat abhipretya dhṛtarāṣṭram abhāṣata

original: BhP_01.13.018/3 rājan nirgamyatāṃ śīghraṃ paśyedaṃ bhayam āgatam
analyzed: rājan nirgamyatām śīghram paśya idam bhayam āgatam

original: BhP_01.13.019/1 pratikriyā na yasyeha kutaścit karhicit prabho
analyzed: pratikriyā na yasya iha kutaścid karhicit prabho

original: BhP_01.13.019/3 sa eṣa bhagavān kālaḥ sarveṣāṃ naḥ samāgataḥ
analyzed: saḥ eṣa bhagavān kālaḥ sarveṣām naḥ samāgataḥ

original: BhP_01.13.020/1 yena caivābhipanno 'yaṃ prāṇaiḥ priyatamairapi
analyzed: yena ca eva abhipannaḥ yam prāṇaiḥ priyatamaiḥ api

original: BhP_01.13.020/3 janaḥ sadyo viyujyeta kim utānyairdhanādibhiḥ
analyzed: janaḥ sadyas viyujyeta kim uta anyaiḥ dhana ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_01.13.021/1 pitṛbhrātṛsuhṛtputrā hatāste vigataṃ vayam
analyzed: pitṛ bhrātṛ suhṛd putrāḥ hatāḥ te vigatam vayam

original: BhP_01.13.021/3 ātmā ca jarayā grastaḥ parageham upāsase
analyzed: ātmā ca jarayā grastaḥ para geham upāsase

original: BhP_01.13.022/1 andhaḥ puraiva vadhiro mandaprajñāśca sāmpratam
analyzed: andhaḥ purā eva vadhiraḥ manda prajñāḥ ca sāmpratam

original: BhP_01.13.022/3 viśīrṇadanto mandāgniḥ sarāgaḥ kapham udvahan
analyzed: viśīrṇa dantaḥ manda agniḥ sa rāgaḥ kapham udvahan

original: BhP_01.13.023/1 aho mahīyasī jantorjīvitāśā yathā bhavān
analyzed: aho mahīyasī jantoḥ jīvita āśā yathā bhavān

original: BhP_01.13.023/3 bhīmāpavarjitaṃ piṇḍam ādatte gṛhapālavat
analyzed: bhīma apavarjitam piṇḍam ādatte gṛhapāla vat

original: BhP_01.13.024/1 agnirnisṛṣṭo dattaśca garo dārāśca dūṣitāḥ
analyzed: agniḥ nisṛṣṭaḥ dattaḥ ca garaḥ dārāḥ ca dūṣitāḥ

original: BhP_01.13.024/3 hṛtaṃ kṣetraṃ dhanaṃ yeṣāṃ taddattairasubhiḥ kiyat
analyzed: hṛtam kṣetram dhanam yeṣām tad dattaiḥ asubhiḥ kiyat

original: BhP_01.13.025/1 tasyāpi tava deho 'yaṃ kṛpaṇasya jijīviṣoḥ
analyzed: tasya api tava dehaḥ yam kṛpaṇasya jijīviṣoḥ

original: BhP_01.13.025/3 paraityanicchato jīrṇo jarayā vāsasī iva
analyzed: paraiti an icchataḥ jīrṇaḥ jarayā vāsasī iva

original: BhP_01.13.026/1 gatasvārtham imaṃ dehaṃ virakto muktabandhanaḥ
analyzed: gata sva artham imam deham viraktaḥ mukta bandhanaḥ

original: BhP_01.13.026/3 avijñātagatirjahyāt sa vai dhīra udāhṛtaḥ
analyzed: a vijñāta gatiḥ jahyāt sa vai dhīraḥ udāhṛtaḥ

original: BhP_01.13.027/1 yaḥ svakāt parato veha jātanirveda ātmavān
analyzed: yaḥ svakāt paratas vā iha jāta nirvedaḥ ātmavān

original: BhP_01.13.027/3 hṛdi kṛtvā hariṃ gehāt pravrajet sa narottamaḥ
analyzed: hṛdi kṛtvā harim gehāt pravrajet sa nara uttamaḥ

original: BhP_01.13.028/1 athodīcīṃ diśaṃ yātu svairajñātagatirbhavān
analyzed: atha udīcīm diśam yātu svaiḥ ajñāta gatiḥ bhavān

original: BhP_01.13.028/3 ito 'rvāk prāyaśaḥ kālaḥ puṃsāṃ guṇavikarṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: itas rvāk prāyaśas kālaḥ puṃsām guṇa vikarṣaṇaḥ

original: BhP_01.13.029/1 evaṃ rājā vidureṇānujena prajñācakṣurbodhita ājamīḍhaḥ
analyzed: evam rājā vidureṇa anujena prajñācakṣuḥ bodhitaḥ ājamīḍhaḥ

original: BhP_01.13.029/3 chittvā sveṣu snehapāśān draḍhimno niścakrāma bhrātṛsandarśitādhvā
analyzed: chittvā sveṣu sneha pāśān draḍhimnaḥ niścakrāma bhrātṛ sandarśita adhvā

original: BhP_01.13.030/1 patiṃ prayāntaṃ subalasya putrī pativratā cānujagāma sādhvī
analyzed: patim prayāntam subalasya putrī pativratā ca anujagāma sādhvī

original: BhP_01.13.030/3 himālayaṃ nyastadaṇḍapraharṣaṃ manasvinām iva sat samprahāraḥ
analyzed: himālayam nyasta daṇḍa praharṣam manasvinām iva sat samprahāraḥ

original: BhP_01.13.031/1 ajātaśatruḥ kṛtamaitro hutāgnir viprān natvā tilagobhūmirukmaiḥ
analyzed: ajātaśatruḥ kṛta maitraḥ huta agniḥ viprān natvā tila go bhūmi rukmaiḥ

original: BhP_01.13.031/3 gṛhaṃ praviṣṭo guruvandanāya na cāpaśyat pitarau saubalīṃ ca
analyzed: gṛham praviṣṭaḥ guru vandanāya na ca apaśyat pitarau saubalīm ca

original: BhP_01.13.032/1 tatra sañjayam āsīnaṃ papracchodvignamānasaḥ
analyzed: tatra sañjayam āsīnam papraccha udvigna mānasaḥ

original: BhP_01.13.032/3 gāvalgaṇe kva nastāto vṛddho hīnaśca netrayoḥ
analyzed: gāvalgaṇe kva naḥ tātaḥ vṛddhaḥ hīnaḥ ca netrayoḥ

original: BhP_01.13.033/1 ambā ca hataputrārtā pitṛvyaḥ kva gataḥ suhṛt
analyzed: ambā ca hata putrā ārtā pitṛvyaḥ kva gataḥ suhṛd

original: BhP_01.13.033/3 api mayyakṛtaprajñe hatabandhuḥ sa bhāryayā
analyzed: api mayi a kṛta prajñe hata bandhuḥ sa bhāryayā

original: BhP_01.13.033/5 āśaṃsamānaḥ śamalaṃ gaṅgāyāṃ duḥkhito 'patat
analyzed: āśaṃsamānaḥ śamalam gaṅgāyām duḥkhitaḥ patat

original: BhP_01.13.034/1 pitaryuparate pāṇḍau sarvān naḥ suhṛdaḥ śiśūn
analyzed: pitari uparate pāṇḍau sarvān naḥ suhṛdaḥ śiśūn

original: BhP_01.13.034/3 arakṣatāṃ vyasanataḥ pitṛvyau kva gatāvitaḥ
analyzed: arakṣatām vyasanataḥ pitṛvyau kva gatau itas

original: BhP_01.13.035/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.13.035/1 kṛpayā snehavaiklavyāt sūto virahakarśitaḥ
analyzed: kṛpayā sneha vaiklavyāt sūtaḥ viraha karśitaḥ

original: BhP_01.13.035/3 ātmeśvaram acakṣāṇo na pratyāhātipīḍitaḥ
analyzed: ātma īśvaram acakṣāṇaḥ na pratyāha atipīḍitaḥ

original: BhP_01.13.036/1 vimṛjyāśrūṇi pāṇibhyāṃ viṣṭabhyātmānam ātmanā
analyzed: vimṛjya aśrūṇi pāṇibhyām viṣṭabhya ātmānam ātmanā

original: BhP_01.13.036/3 ajātaśatruṃ pratyūce prabhoḥ pādāvanusmaran
analyzed: ajātaśatrum pratyūce prabhoḥ pādau anusmaran

original: BhP_01.13.037/0 sañjaya uvāca
analyzed: sañjayaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.13.037/1 nāhaṃ veda vyavasitaṃ pitrorvaḥ kulanandana
analyzed: na aham veda vyavasitam pitroḥ vaḥ kula nandana

original: BhP_01.13.037/3 gāndhāryā vā mahābāho muṣito 'smi mahātmabhiḥ
analyzed: gāndhāryā vā mahā bāho muṣitaḥ smi mahātmabhiḥ

original: BhP_01.13.038/1 athājagāma bhagavān nāradaḥ sahatumburuḥ
analyzed: atha ājagāma bhagavān nāradaḥ saha tumburuḥ

original: BhP_01.13.038/3 pratyutthāyābhivādyāha sānujo 'bhyarcayan munim
analyzed: pratyutthāya abhivādya āha sa anujaḥ bhyarcayan munim

original: BhP_01.13.039/0 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhiraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.13.039/1 nāhaṃ veda gatiṃ pitrorbhagavan kva gatāvitaḥ
analyzed: na aham veda gatim pitroḥ bhagavan kva gatau itas

original: BhP_01.13.039/3 ambā vā hataputrārtā kva gatā ca tapasvinī
analyzed: ambā vā hata putra ārtā kva gatā ca tapasvinī

original: BhP_01.13.040/1 karṇadhāra ivāpāre bhagavān pāradarśakaḥ
analyzed: karṇadhāraḥ iva apāre bhagavān pāra darśakaḥ

original: BhP_01.13.040/3 athābabhāṣe bhagavān nārado munisattamaḥ
analyzed: atha ābabhāṣe bhagavān nāradaḥ muni sattamaḥ

original: BhP_01.13.041/0 nārada uvāca
analyzed: nāradaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.13.041/1 mā kañcana śuco rājan yadīśvaravaśaṃ jagat
analyzed: mā kañcana śucaḥ rājan yadi īśvara vaśam jagat

original: BhP_01.13.041/3 lokāḥ sapālā yasyeme vahanti balim īśituḥ
analyzed: lokāḥ sa pālāḥ yasya ime vahanti balim īśituḥ

original: BhP_01.13.041/5 sa saṃyunakti bhūtāni sa eva viyunakti ca
analyzed: sa saṃyunakti bhūtāni saḥ eva viyunakti ca

original: BhP_01.13.042/1 yathā gāvo nasi protāstantyāṃ baddhāśca dāmabhiḥ
analyzed: yathā gāvaḥ nasi protāḥ tantyām baddhāḥ ca dāmabhiḥ

original: BhP_01.13.042/3 vāktantyāṃ nāmabhirbaddhā vahanti balim īśituḥ
analyzed: vāc tantyām nāmabhiḥ baddhāḥ vahanti balim īśituḥ

original: BhP_01.13.043/1 yathā krīḍopaskarāṇāṃ saṃyogavigamāviha
analyzed: yathā krīḍā upaskarāṇām saṃyoga vigamau iha

original: BhP_01.13.043/3 icchayā krīḍituḥ syātāṃ tathaiveśecchayā nṛṇām
analyzed: icchayā krīḍituḥ syātām tathā eva īśa icchayā nṛṇām

original: BhP_01.13.044/1 yan manyase dhruvaṃ lokam adhruvaṃ vā na cobhayam
analyzed: yat manyase dhruvam lokam adhruvam vā na ca ubhayam

original: BhP_01.13.044/3 sarvathā na hi śocyāste snehādanyatra mohajāt
analyzed: sarvathā na hi śocyāḥ te snehāt anyatra moha jāt

original: BhP_01.13.045/1 tasmāj jahyaṅga vaiklavyam ajñānakṛtam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: tasmāt jahi aṅga vaiklavyam ajñāna kṛtam ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_01.13.045/3 kathaṃ tvanāthāḥ kṛpaṇā varteraṃste ca māṃ vinā
analyzed: katham tu anāthāḥ kṛpaṇāḥ varteran te ca mām vinā

original: BhP_01.13.046/1 kālakarmaguṇādhīno deho 'yaṃ pāñcabhautikaḥ
analyzed: kāla karma guṇa adhīnaḥ dehaḥ yam pāñcabhautikaḥ

original: BhP_01.13.046/3 katham anyāṃstu gopāyet sarpagrasto yathā param
analyzed: katham anyān tu gopāyet sarpa grastaḥ yathā param

original: BhP_01.13.047/1 ahastāni sahastānām apadāni catuṣpadām
analyzed: a hastāni sa hastānām a padāni catuṣpadām

original: BhP_01.13.047/3 phalgūni tatra mahatāṃ jīvo jīvasya jīvanam
analyzed: phalgūni tatra mahatām jīvaḥ jīvasya jīvanam

original: BhP_01.13.048/1 tadidaṃ bhagavān rājann eka ātmātmanāṃ svadṛk
analyzed: tat idam bhagavān rājan ekaḥ ātmā ātmanām svadṛś

original: BhP_01.13.048/3 antaro 'nantaro bhāti paśya taṃ māyayorudhā
analyzed: antaraḥ nantaraḥ bhāti paśya tam māyayā urudhā

original: BhP_01.13.049/1 so 'yam adya mahārāja bhagavān bhūtabhāvanaḥ
analyzed: saḥ yam adya mahā rāja bhagavān bhūtabhāvanaḥ

original: BhP_01.13.049/3 kālarūpo 'vatīrṇo 'syām abhāvāya suradviṣām
analyzed: kāla rūpaḥ vatīrṇaḥ syām abhāvāya suradviṣām

original: BhP_01.13.050/1 niṣpāditaṃ devakṛtyam avaśeṣaṃ pratīkṣate
analyzed: niṣpāditam deva kṛtyam avaśeṣam pratīkṣate

original: BhP_01.13.050/3 tāvadyūyam avekṣadhvaṃ bhavedyāvadiheśvaraḥ
analyzed: tāvat yūyam avekṣadhvam bhavet yāvat iha īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_01.13.051/1 dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ saha bhrātrā gāndhāryā ca svabhāryayā
analyzed: dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ saha bhrātrā gāndhāryā ca sva bhāryayā

original: BhP_01.13.051/3 dakṣiṇena himavata ṛṣīṇām āśramaṃ gataḥ
analyzed: dakṣiṇena himavataḥ ṛṣīṇām āśramam gataḥ

original: BhP_01.13.052/1 srotobhiḥ saptabhiryā vai svardhunī saptadhā vyadhāt
analyzed: srotobhiḥ saptabhiḥ yā vai svardhunī saptadhā vyadhāt

original: BhP_01.13.052/3 saptānāṃ prītaye nānā saptasrotaḥ pracakṣate
analyzed: saptānām prītaye nānā sapta srotaḥ pracakṣate

original: BhP_01.13.053/1 snātvānusavanaṃ tasmin hutvā cāgnīn yathāvidhi
analyzed: snātvā anusavanam tasmin hutvā ca agnīn yathāvidhi

original: BhP_01.13.053/3 abbhakṣa upaśāntātmā sa āste vigataiṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: abbhakṣaḥ upaśānta ātmā saḥ āste vigata eṣaṇaḥ

original: BhP_01.13.054/1 jitāsano jitaśvāsaḥ pratyāhṛtaṣaḍindriyaḥ
BhP_01.13.054/3 haribhāvanayā dhvastarajaḥsattvatamomalaḥ
BhP_01.13.055/1 vijñānātmani saṃyojya kṣetrajñe pravilāpya tam
analyzed: vijñāna ātmani saṃyojya kṣetrajñe pravilāpya tam

original: BhP_01.13.055/3 brahmaṇyātmānam ādhāre ghaṭāmbaram ivāmbare
analyzed: brahmaṇi ātmānam ādhāre ghaṭa ambaram iva ambare

original: BhP_01.13.056/1 dhvastamāyāguṇodarko niruddhakaraṇāśayaḥ
analyzed: dhvasta māyā guṇa udarkaḥ niruddha karaṇa āśayaḥ

original: BhP_01.13.056/3 nivartitākhilāhāra āste sthāṇurivācalaḥ
analyzed: nivartita akhila āhāraḥ āste sthāṇuḥ iva acalaḥ

original: BhP_01.13.056/5 tasyāntarāyo maivābhūḥ sannyastākhilakarmaṇaḥ
analyzed: tasya antarāyaḥ mā eva abhūḥ sat nyasta akhila karmaṇaḥ

original: BhP_01.13.057/1 sa vā adyatanādrājan parataḥ pañcame 'hani
analyzed: sa vai adyatanāt rājan paratas pañcame hani

original: BhP_01.13.057/3 kalevaraṃ hāsyati svaṃ tac ca bhasmībhaviṣyati
analyzed: kalevaram hāsyati svam tat ca bhasmībhaviṣyati

original: BhP_01.13.058/1 dahyamāne 'gnibhirdehe patyuḥ patnī sahoṭaje
analyzed: dahyamāne gnibhiḥ dehe patyuḥ patnī saha uṭaje

original: BhP_01.13.058/3 bahiḥ sthitā patiṃ sādhvī tam agnim anu vekṣyati
analyzed: bahis sthitā patim sādhvī tam agnim anu vekṣyati

original: BhP_01.13.059/1 vidurastu tadāścaryaṃ niśāmya kurunandana
analyzed: viduraḥ tu tat āścaryam niśāmya kuru nandana

original: BhP_01.13.059/3 harṣaśokayutastasmādgantā tīrthaniṣevakaḥ
analyzed: harṣa śoka yutaḥ tasmāt gantā tīrtha niṣevakaḥ

original: BhP_01.13.060/1 ityuktvāthāruhat svargaṃ nāradaḥ sahatumburuḥ
analyzed: iti uktvā atha aruhat svargam nāradaḥ saha tumburuḥ

original: BhP_01.13.060/3 yudhiṣṭhiro vacastasya hṛdi kṛtvājahāc chucaḥ
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhiraḥ vacaḥ tasya hṛdi kṛtvā ajahāt śucaḥ

original: BhP_01.14.001/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.14.001/1 samprasthite dvārakāyāṃjiṣṇau bandhudidṛkṣayā
analyzed: samprasthite dvārakāyām jiṣṇau bandhu didṛkṣayā

original: BhP_01.14.001/3 jñātuṃ ca puṇyaślokasya kṛṣṇasya ca viceṣṭitam
analyzed: jñātum ca puṇyaślokasya kṛṣṇasya ca viceṣṭitam

original: BhP_01.14.002/1 vyatītāḥ katicin māsāstadā nāyāt tato 'rjunaḥ
analyzed: vyatītāḥ katicid māsāḥ tadā na āyāt tatas rjunaḥ

original: BhP_01.14.002/3 dadarśa ghorarūpāṇi nimittāni kurūdvahaḥ
analyzed: dadarśa ghora rūpāṇi nimittāni kuru udvahaḥ

original: BhP_01.14.003/1 kālasya ca gatiṃ raudrāṃ viparyastartudharmiṇaḥ
analyzed: kālasya ca gatim raudrām viparyasta ṛtu dharmiṇaḥ

original: BhP_01.14.003/3 pāpīyasīṃ nṛṇāṃ vārtāṃ krodhalobhānṛtātmanām
analyzed: pāpīyasīm nṛṇām vārtām krodha lobha anṛta ātmanām

original: BhP_01.14.004/1 jihmaprāyaṃ vyavahṛtaṃ śāṭhyamiśraṃ ca sauhṛdam
analyzed: jihma prāyam vyavahṛtam śāṭhya miśram ca sauhṛdam

original: BhP_01.14.004/3 pitṛmātṛsuhṛdbhrātṛdampatīnāṃ ca kalkanam
analyzed: pitṛ mātṛ suhṛd bhrātṛ dampatīnām ca kalkanam

original: BhP_01.14.005/1 nimittānyatyariṣṭāni kāle tvanugate nṛṇām
analyzed: nimittāni ati ariṣṭāni kāle tu anugate nṛṇām

original: BhP_01.14.005/3 lobhādyadharmaprakṛtiṃ dṛṣṭvovācānujaṃ nṛpaḥ
analyzed: lobha ādi adharma prakṛtim dṛṣṭvā uvāca anujam nṛpaḥ

original: BhP_01.14.006/0 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhiraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.14.006/1 sampreṣito dvārakāyāṃ jiṣṇurbandhudidṛkṣayāj
analyzed: sampreṣitaḥ dvārakāyām jiṣṇuḥ bandhu didṛkṣayā

original: BhP_01.14.006/3 ñātuṃ ca puṇyaślokasya kṛṣṇasya ca viceṣṭitam
analyzed: ñātum ca puṇyaślokasya kṛṣṇasya ca viceṣṭitam

original: BhP_01.14.007/1 gatāḥ saptādhunā māsā bhīmasena tavānujaḥ
analyzed: gatāḥ sapta adhunā māsāḥ bhīmasena tava anujaḥ

original: BhP_01.14.007/3 nāyāti kasya vā hetornāhaṃ vededam añjasā
analyzed: na āyāti kasya vā hetoḥ na aham veda idam añjasā

original: BhP_01.14.008/1 api devarṣiṇādiṣṭaḥ sa kālo 'yam upasthitaḥ
analyzed: api deva ṛṣiṇā ādiṣṭaḥ sa kālaḥ yam upasthitaḥ

original: BhP_01.14.008/3 yadātmano 'ṅgam ākrīḍaṃ bhagavān utsisṛkṣati
analyzed: yadā ātmanaḥ u ṅgam ākrīḍam bhagavān utsisṛkṣati

original: BhP_01.14.009/1 yasmān naḥ sampado rājyaṃ dārāḥ prāṇāḥ kulaṃ prajāḥ
analyzed: yasmāt naḥ sampadaḥ rājyam dārāḥ prāṇāḥ kulam prajāḥ

original: BhP_01.14.009/3 āsan sapatnavijayo lokāśca yadanugrahāt
analyzed: āsan sapatna vijayaḥ lokāḥ ca yad anugrahāt

original: BhP_01.14.010/1 paśyotpātān naravyāghra divyān bhaumān sadaihikān
analyzed: paśya utpātān nara vyāghra divyān bhaumān sa daihikān

original: BhP_01.14.010/3 dāruṇān śaṃsato 'dūrādbhayaṃ no buddhimohanam
analyzed: dāruṇān śaṃsataḥ dūrāt bhayam naḥ buddhi mohanam

original: BhP_01.14.011/1 ūrvakṣibāhavo mahyaṃ sphurantyaṅga punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: ūru akṣi bāhavaḥ mahyam sphuranti aṅga punar punar

original: BhP_01.14.011/3 vepathuścāpi hṛdaye ārāddāsyanti vipriyam
analyzed: vepathuḥ ca api hṛdaye ārāt dāsyanti vipriyam

original: BhP_01.14.012/1 śivaiṣodyantam ādityam abhirautyanalānanā
analyzed: śivā eṣā udyantam ādityam abhirauti anala ānanā

original: BhP_01.14.012/3 mām aṅga sārameyo 'yam abhirebhatyabhīruvat
analyzed: mām aṅga sārameyaḥ yam abhirebhati abhīru vat

original: BhP_01.14.013/1 śastāḥ kurvanti māṃ savyaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ paśavo 'pare
analyzed: śastāḥ kurvanti mām savyam dakṣiṇam paśavaḥ pare

original: BhP_01.14.013/3 vāhāṃśca puruṣavyāghra lakṣaye rudato mama
analyzed: vāhān ca puruṣa vyāghra lakṣaye rudataḥ mama

original: BhP_01.14.014/1 mṛtyudūtaḥ kapoto 'yam ulūkaḥ kampayan manaḥ
analyzed: mṛtyu dūtaḥ kapotaḥ yam ulūkaḥ kampayan manaḥ

original: BhP_01.14.014/3 pratyulūkaśca kuhvānairviśvaṃ vai śūnyam icchataḥ
analyzed: pratyulūkaḥ ca kuhvānaiḥ viśvam vai śūnyam icchataḥ

original: BhP_01.14.015/1 dhūmrā diśaḥ paridhayaḥ kampate bhūḥ sahādribhiḥ
analyzed: dhūmrāḥ diśaḥ paridhayaḥ kampate bhūḥ saha adribhiḥ

original: BhP_01.14.015/3 nirghātaśca mahāṃstāta sākaṃ ca stanayitnubhiḥ
analyzed: nirghātaḥ ca mahān tāta sākam ca stanayitnubhiḥ

original: BhP_01.14.016/1 vāyurvāti kharasparśo rajasā visṛjaṃstamaḥ
analyzed: vāyuḥ vāti khara sparśaḥ rajasā visṛjan tamaḥ

original: BhP_01.14.016/3 asṛg varṣanti jaladā bībhatsam iva sarvataḥ
analyzed: asṛj varṣanti jaladāḥ bībhatsam iva sarvatas

original: BhP_01.14.017/1 sūryaṃ hataprabhaṃ paśya grahamardaṃ mitho divi
analyzed: sūryam hata prabham paśya graha mardam mithas divi

original: BhP_01.14.017/3 sasaṅkulairbhūtagaṇairjvalite iva rodasī
analyzed: sa saṅkulaiḥ bhūta gaṇaiḥ jvalite iva rodasī

original: BhP_01.14.018/1 nadyo nadāśca kṣubhitāḥ sarāṃsi ca manāṃsi ca
analyzed: nadyaḥ nadāḥ ca kṣubhitāḥ sarāṃsi ca manāṃsi ca

original: BhP_01.14.018/3 na jvalatyagnirājyena kālo 'yaṃ kiṃ vidhāsyati
analyzed: na jvalati agniḥ ājyena kālaḥ yam kim vidhāsyati

original: BhP_01.14.019/1 na pibanti stanaṃ vatsā na duhyanti ca mātaraḥ
analyzed: na pibanti stanam vatsāḥ na duhyanti ca mātaraḥ

original: BhP_01.14.019/3 rudantyaśrumukhā gāvo na hṛṣyantyṛṣabhā vraje
analyzed: rudanti aśru mukhāḥ gāvaḥ na hṛṣyanti ṛṣabhāḥ vraje

original: BhP_01.14.020/1 daivatāni rudantīva svidyanti hyuccalanti ca
analyzed: daivatāni rudanti iva svidyanti hi uccalanti ca

original: BhP_01.14.020/3 ime janapadā grāmāḥ purodyānākarāśramāḥ
analyzed: ime janapadāḥ grāmāḥ pura udyāna ākara āśramāḥ

original: BhP_01.14.020/5 bhraṣṭaśriyo nirānandāḥ kim aghaṃ darśayanti naḥ
analyzed: bhraṣṭa śriyaḥ nirānandāḥ kim agham darśayanti naḥ

original: BhP_01.14.021/1 manya etairmahotpātairnūnaṃ bhagavataḥ padaiḥ
analyzed: manye etaiḥ mahā utpātaiḥ nūnam bhagavataḥ padaiḥ

original: BhP_01.14.021/3 ananyapuruṣaśrībhirhīnā bhūrhatasaubhagā
analyzed: ananya puruṣa śrībhiḥ hīnā bhūḥ hata saubhagā

original: BhP_01.14.022/1 iti cintayatastasya dṛṣṭāriṣṭena cetasā
analyzed: iti cintayataḥ tasya dṛṣṭa ariṣṭena cetasā

original: BhP_01.14.022/3 rājñaḥ pratyāgamadbrahman yadupuryāḥ kapidhvajaḥ
analyzed: rājñaḥ pratyāgamat brahman yadu puryāḥ kapidhvajaḥ

original: BhP_01.14.023/1 taṃ pādayornipatitam ayathāpūrvam āturam
analyzed: tam pādayoḥ nipatitam ayathāpūrvam āturam

original: BhP_01.14.023/3 adhovadanam abbindūn sṛjantaṃ nayanābjayoḥ
analyzed: adhas vadanam ap bindūn sṛjantam nayana abjayoḥ

original: BhP_01.14.024/1 vilokyodvignahṛdayo vicchāyam anujaṃ nṛpaḥ
analyzed: vilokya udvigna hṛdayaḥ vicchāyam anujam nṛpaḥ

original: BhP_01.14.024/3 pṛcchati sma suhṛn madhye saṃsmaran nāraderitam
analyzed: pṛcchati sma suhṛd madhye saṃsmaran nārada īritam

original: BhP_01.14.025/0 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhiraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.14.025/1 kaccidānartapuryāṃ naḥ svajanāḥ sukham āsate
analyzed: kaccit ānarta puryām naḥ sva janāḥ sukham āsate

original: BhP_01.14.025/3 madhubhojadaśārhārha sātvatāndhakavṛṣṇayaḥ
BhP_01.14.026/1 śūro mātāmahaḥ kaccit svastyāste vātha māriṣaḥ
analyzed: śūraḥ mātāmahaḥ kaccit svasti āste vā atha māriṣaḥ

original: BhP_01.14.026/3 mātulaḥ sānujaḥ kaccit kuśalyānakadundubhiḥ
analyzed: mātulaḥ sa anujaḥ kaccit kuśalī ānakadundubhiḥ

original: BhP_01.14.027/1 sapta svasārastatpatnyo mātulānyaḥ sahātmajāḥ
analyzed: sapta svasāraḥ tad patnyaḥ mātulānyaḥ saha ātmajāḥ

original: BhP_01.14.027/3 āsate sasnuṣāḥ kṣemaṃdevakīpramukhāḥ svayam
analyzed: āsate sa snuṣāḥ kṣemaṃdevakī pramukhāḥ svayam

original: BhP_01.14.028/1 kaccidrājāhuko jīvatyasatputro 'sya cānujaḥ
analyzed: kaccit rājā āhukaḥ jīvati asat putraḥ ca anujaḥ

original: BhP_01.14.028/3 hṛdīkaḥ sasuto 'krūro jayantagadasāraṇāḥ
analyzed: krūraḥ jayanta gada sāraṇāḥ

original: BhP_01.14.029/1 āsate kuśalaṃ kaccidye ca śatrujidādayaḥ
analyzed: āsate kuśalam kaccit ye ca śatrujit ādayaḥ

original: BhP_01.14.029/3 kaccidāste sukhaṃ rāmo bhagavān sātvatāṃ prabhuḥ
