analyzed: kaccit āste sukham rāmaḥ bhagavān sātvatām prabhuḥ

original: BhP_01.14.030/1 pradyumnaḥ sarvavṛṣṇīnāṃ sukham āste mahārathaḥ
analyzed: pradyumnaḥ sarva vṛṣṇīnām sukham āste mahā rathaḥ

original: BhP_01.14.030/3 gambhīrarayo 'niruddho vardhate bhagavān uta
analyzed: gambhīra rayaḥ niruddhaḥ vardhate bhagavān uta

original: BhP_01.14.031/1 suṣeṇaścārudeṣṇaśca sāmbo jāmbavatīsutaḥ
analyzed: suṣeṇaḥ cārudeṣṇaḥ ca sāmbaḥ jāmbavatī sutaḥ

original: BhP_01.14.031/3 anye ca kārṣṇipravarāḥ saputrā ṛṣabhādayaḥ
analyzed: anye ca kārṣṇi pravarāḥ sa putrāḥ ṛṣabha ādayaḥ

original: BhP_01.14.032/1 tathaivānucarāḥ śaureḥ śrutadevoddhavādayaḥ
analyzed: tathā eva anucarāḥ śaureḥ śrutadeva uddhava ādayaḥ

original: BhP_01.14.032/3 sunandanandaśīrṣaṇyā ye cānye sātvatarṣabhāḥ
analyzed: sunanda nanda śīrṣaṇyāḥ ye ca anye sātvata ṛṣabhāḥ

original: BhP_01.14.033/1 api svastyāsate sarve rāmakṛṣṇabhujāśrayāḥ
analyzed: api svasti āsate sarve rāma kṛṣṇa bhuja āśrayāḥ

original: BhP_01.14.033/3 api smaranti kuśalam asmākaṃ baddhasauhṛdāḥ
analyzed: api smaranti kuśalam asmākam baddha sauhṛdāḥ

original: BhP_01.14.034/1 bhagavān api govindo brahmaṇyo bhaktavatsalaḥ
analyzed: bhagavān api govindaḥ brahmaṇyaḥ bhakta vatsalaḥ

original: BhP_01.14.034/3 kaccit pure sudharmāyāṃ sukham āste suhṛdvṛtaḥ
analyzed: kaccit pure sudharmāyām sukham āste suhṛd vṛtaḥ

original: BhP_01.14.035/1 maṅgalāya ca lokānāṃ kṣemāya ca bhavāya ca
analyzed: maṅgalāya ca lokānām kṣemāya ca bhavāya ca

original: BhP_01.14.035/3 āste yadukulāmbhodhāvādyo 'nantasakhaḥ pumān
analyzed: āste yadu kula ambhodhau ādyaḥ nanta sakhaḥ pumān

original: BhP_01.14.036/1 yadbāhudaṇḍaguptāyāṃ svapuryāṃ yadavo 'rcitāḥ
analyzed: yad bāhu daṇḍa guptāyām sva puryām yadavaḥ rcitāḥ

original: BhP_01.14.036/3 krīḍanti paramānandaṃ mahāpauruṣikā iva
analyzed: krīḍanti parama ānandam mahā pauruṣikāḥ iva

original: BhP_01.14.037/1 yatpādaśuśrūṣaṇamukhyakarmaṇā satyādayo dvyaṣṭasahasrayoṣitaḥ
analyzed: yad pāda śuśrūṣaṇa mukhya karmaṇā satya ādayaḥ dvi aṣṭa sahasra yoṣitaḥ

original: BhP_01.14.037/3 nirjitya saṅkhye tridaśāṃstadāśiṣo haranti vajrāyudhavallabhocitāḥ
analyzed: nirjitya saṅkhye tridaśān tad āśiṣaḥ haranti vajrāyudha vallabha ucitāḥ

original: BhP_01.14.038/1 yadbāhudaṇḍābhyudayānujīvino yadupravīrā hyakutobhayā muhuḥ
analyzed: yad bāhu daṇḍa abhyudaya anujīvinaḥ yadu pravīrāḥ hi akutobhayāḥ muhur

original: BhP_01.14.038/3 adhikramantyaṅghribhirāhṛtāṃ balāt sabhāṃ sudharmāṃ surasattamocitām
analyzed: adhikramanti aṅghribhiḥ āhṛtām balāt sabhām sudharmām sura sattama ucitām

original: BhP_01.14.039/1 kaccit te 'nāmayaṃ tāta bhraṣṭatejā vibhāsi me
analyzed: kaccit te na amayam tāta bhraṣṭa tejāḥ vibhāsi me

original: BhP_01.14.039/3 alabdhamāno 'vajñātaḥ kiṃ vā tāta ciroṣitaḥ
analyzed: alabdha mānaḥ vajñātaḥ kim vā tāta cira uṣitaḥ

original: BhP_01.14.040/1 kaccin nābhihato 'bhāvaiḥ śabdādibhiramaṅgalaiḥ
analyzed: kaccit na abhihataḥ bhāvaiḥ śabda ādibhiḥ amaṅgalaiḥ

original: BhP_01.14.040/3 na dattam uktam arthibhya āśayā yat pratiśrutam
analyzed: na dattam uktam arthibhyaḥ āśayā yat pratiśrutam

original: BhP_01.14.041/1 kaccit tvaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ bālaṃ gāṃ vṛddhaṃ rogiṇaṃ striyam
analyzed: kaccit tvam brāhmaṇam bālam gām vṛddham rogiṇam striyam

original: BhP_01.14.041/3 śaraṇopasṛtaṃ sattvaṃ nātyākṣīḥ śaraṇapradaḥ
analyzed: śaraṇa upasṛtam sattvam na atyākṣīḥ śaraṇa pradaḥ

original: BhP_01.14.042/1 kaccit tvaṃ nāgamo 'gamyāṃ gamyāṃ vāsatkṛtāṃ striyam
analyzed: kaccit tvam na agamaḥ gamyām gamyām vā asatkṛtām striyam

original: BhP_01.14.042/3 parājito vātha bhavān nottamairnāsamaiḥ pathi
analyzed: parājitaḥ vā atha bhavān na uttamaiḥ na asamaiḥ pathi

original: BhP_01.14.043/1 api svit paryabhuṅkthāstvaṃ sambhojyān vṛddhabālakān
analyzed: api svid paryabhuṅkthāḥ tvam sambhojyān vṛddha bālakān

original: BhP_01.14.043/3 jugupsitaṃ karma kiñcit kṛtavān na yadakṣamam
analyzed: jugupsitam karma kiñcid kṛtavān na yat akṣamam

original: BhP_01.14.044/1 kaccit preṣṭhatamenātha hṛdayenātmabandhunā
analyzed: kaccit preṣṭhatamena atha hṛdayena ātma bandhunā

original: BhP_01.14.044/3 śūnyo 'smi rahito nityaṃ manyase te 'nyathā na ruk
analyzed: śūnyaḥ smi rahitaḥ nityam manyase te nyathā na ruj

original: BhP_01.15.001/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.15.001/1 evaṃ kṛṣṇasakhaḥ kṛṣṇo bhrātrā rājñā vikalpitaḥ
analyzed: evam kṛṣṇa sakhaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ bhrātrā rājñā vikalpitaḥ

original: BhP_01.15.001/3 nānāśaṅkāspadaṃ rūpaṃ kṛṣṇaviśleṣakarśitaḥ
analyzed: nānā śaṅkā āspadam rūpam kṛṣṇa viśleṣa karśitaḥ

original: BhP_01.15.002/1 śokena śuṣyadvadana hṛtsarojo hataprabhaḥ
analyzed: śokena śuṣyat vadana hṛd sarojaḥ hata prabhaḥ

original: BhP_01.15.002/3 vibhuṃ tam evānusmaran nāśaknot pratibhāṣitum
analyzed: vibhum tam eva anusmaran na aśaknot pratibhāṣitum

original: BhP_01.15.003/1 kṛcchreṇa saṃstabhya śucaḥ pāṇināmṛjya netrayoḥ
analyzed: kṛcchreṇa saṃstabhya śucaḥ pāṇinā āmṛjya netrayoḥ

original: BhP_01.15.003/3 parokṣeṇa samunnaddha praṇayautkaṇṭhyakātaraḥ
analyzed: parokṣeṇa samunnaddha praṇaya autkaṇṭhya kātaraḥ

original: BhP_01.15.004/1 sakhyaṃ maitrīṃ sauhṛdaṃ ca sārathyādiṣu saṃsmaran
analyzed: sakhyam maitrīm sauhṛdam ca sārathi ādiṣu saṃsmaran

original: BhP_01.15.004/3 nṛpam agrajam ityāha bāṣpagadgadayā girā
analyzed: nṛpam agrajam iti āha bāṣpa gadgadayā girā

original: BhP_01.15.005/0 arjuna uvāca
analyzed: arjunaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.15.005/1 vañcito 'haṃ mahārāja hariṇā bandhurūpiṇā
analyzed: vañcitaḥ ham mahā rāja hariṇā bandhu rūpiṇā

original: BhP_01.15.005/3 yena me 'pahṛtaṃ tejo devavismāpanaṃ mahat
analyzed: yena me pahṛtam tejaḥ deva vismāpanam mahat

original: BhP_01.15.006/1 yasya kṣaṇaviyogena loko hyapriyadarśanaḥ
analyzed: yasya kṣaṇa viyogena lokaḥ hi apriya darśanaḥ

original: BhP_01.15.006/3 ukthena rahito hyeṣa mṛtakaḥ procyate yathā
analyzed: ukthena rahitaḥ hi eṣa mṛtakaḥ procyate yathā

original: BhP_01.15.007/1 yatsaṃśrayāddrupadageham upāgatānāṃ rājñāṃ svayaṃvaramukhe smaradurmadānām
analyzed: yad saṃśrayāt drupada geham upāgatānām rājñām svayaṃvara mukhe smara durmadānām

original: BhP_01.15.007/3 tejo hṛtaṃ khalu mayābhihataśca matsyaḥ sajjīkṛtena dhanuṣādhigatā ca kṛṣṇā
analyzed: tejaḥ hṛtam khalu mayā abhihataḥ ca matsyaḥ sajjīkṛtena dhanuṣā adhigatā ca kṛṣṇā

original: BhP_01.15.008/1 yatsannidhāvaham u khāṇḍavam agnaye 'dām indraṃ ca sāmaragaṇaṃ tarasā vijitya
analyzed: yad sannidhau aham u khāṇḍavam agnaye dām indram ca sa amara gaṇam tarasā vijitya

original: BhP_01.15.008/3 labdhā sabhā mayakṛtādbhutaśilpamāyā digbhyo 'haran nṛpatayo balim adhvare te
analyzed: labdhā sabhā maya kṛtā adbhuta śilpa māyā digbhyaḥ haran nṛpatayaḥ balim adhvare te

original: BhP_01.15.009/1 yattejasā nṛpaśiro'ṅghrim ahan makhārtham āryo 'nujastava gajāyutasattvavīryaḥ
analyzed: yad tejasā nṛpa śiraḥ aṅghrim ahan makha artham āryaḥ nujaḥ tava gaja ayuta sattva vīryaḥ

original: BhP_01.15.009/3 tenāhṛtāḥ pramathanāthamakhāya bhūpā yanmocitāstadanayan balim adhvare te
analyzed: tena āhṛtāḥ pramatha nātha makhāya bhūpāḥ yad mocitāḥ tat anayan balim adhvare te

original: BhP_01.15.010/1 patnyāstavādhimakhakḷptamahābhiṣeka ślāghiṣṭhacārukabaraṃ kitavaiḥ sabhāyām
analyzed: patnyāḥ tava adhi makha kḷpta mahā abhiṣeka ślāghiṣṭha cāru kabaram kitavaiḥ sabhāyām

original: BhP_01.15.010/3 spṛṣṭaṃ vikīrya padayoḥ patitāśrumukhyā yastatstriyo 'kṛtahateśavimuktakeśāḥ
analyzed: spṛṣṭam vikīrya padayoḥ patita aśru mukhyāḥ yaḥ tad striyaḥ kṛta hata īśa vimukta keśāḥ

original: BhP_01.15.011/1 yo no jugopa vana etya durantakṛcchrād durvāsaso 'riracitādayutāgrabhug yaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ jugopa vane etya duranta kṛcchrāt durvāsasaḥ riracitāt ayuta agra bhuj yaḥ

original: BhP_01.15.011/3 śākānnaśiṣṭam upayujya yatastrilokīṃ tṛptām amaṃsta salile vinimagnasaṅghaḥ
analyzed: śāka anna śiṣṭam upayujya yatas trilokīm tṛptām amaṃsta salile vinimagna saṅghaḥ

original: BhP_01.15.012/1 yattejasātha bhagavān yudhi śūlapāṇir vismāpitaḥ sagirijo 'stram adān nijaṃ me
analyzed: yad tejasā atha bhagavān yudhi śūlapāṇiḥ vismāpitaḥ sa girijaḥ stram adāt nijam me

original: BhP_01.15.012/3 anye 'pi cāham amunaiva kalevareṇa prāpto mahendrabhavane mahadāsanārdham
analyzed: anye ca aham amunā eva kalevareṇa prāptaḥ mahā indra bhavane mahat āsana ardham

original: BhP_01.15.013/1 tatraiva me viharato bhujadaṇḍayugmaṃ gāṇḍīvalakṣaṇam arātivadhāya devāḥ
analyzed: tatra eva me viharataḥ bhuja daṇḍa yugmam gāṇḍīva lakṣaṇam arāti vadhāya devāḥ

original: BhP_01.15.013/3 sendrāḥ śritā yadanubhāvitam ājamīḍha tenāham adya muṣitaḥ puruṣeṇa bhūmnā
analyzed: sa indrāḥ śritāḥ yad anubhāvitam ājamīḍha tena aham adya muṣitaḥ puruṣeṇa bhūmnā

original: BhP_01.15.014/1 yadbāndhavaḥ kurubalābdhim anantapāram eko rathena tatare 'ham atīryasattvam
analyzed: yad bāndhavaḥ kuru bala abdhim ananta pāram ekaḥ rathena tatare ham atīrya sattvam

original: BhP_01.15.014/3 pratyāhṛtaṃ bahu dhanaṃ ca mayā pareṣāṃ tejāspadaṃ maṇimayaṃ ca hṛtaṃ śirobhyaḥ
analyzed: pratyāhṛtam bahu dhanam ca mayā pareṣām teja āspadam maṇi mayam ca hṛtam śirobhyaḥ

original: BhP_01.15.015/1 yo bhīṣmakarṇaguruśalyacamūṣvadabhra rājanyavaryarathamaṇḍalamaṇḍitāsu
analyzed: yaḥ bhīṣma karṇa guru śalya camūṣu adabhra rājanya varya ratha maṇḍala maṇḍitāsu

original: BhP_01.15.015/3 agrecaro mama vibho rathayūthapānām āyurmanāṃsi ca dṛśā saha oja ārcchat
analyzed: agre caraḥ mama vibhoḥ ratha yūthapānām āyuḥ manāṃsi ca dṛśā saha ojaḥ ārcchat

original: BhP_01.15.016/1 yaddoḥṣu mā praṇihitaṃ gurubhīṣmakarṇa naptṛtrigartaśalyasaindhavabāhlikādyaiḥ
analyzed: yad doḥṣu mā praṇihitam guru bhīṣma karṇa naptṛ trigarta śalya saindhava bāhlika ādyaiḥ

original: BhP_01.15.016/3 astrāṇyamoghamahimāni nirūpitāni nopaspṛśurnṛharidāsam ivāsurāṇi
analyzed: astrāṇi amogha mahimāni nirūpitāni na upaspṛśuḥ nṛhari dāsam iva āsurāṇi

original: BhP_01.15.017/1 sautye vṛtaḥ kumatinātmada īśvaro me yatpādapadmam abhavāya bhajanti bhavyāḥ
analyzed: sautye vṛtaḥ kumatinā ātma daḥ īśvaraḥ me yad pāda padmam abhavāya bhajanti bhavyāḥ

original: BhP_01.15.017/3 māṃ śrāntavāham arayo rathino bhuviṣṭhaṃ na prāharan yadanubhāvanirastacittāḥ
analyzed: mām śrānta vāham arayaḥ rathinaḥ bhuviṣṭham na prāharan yad anubhāva nirasta cittāḥ

original: BhP_01.15.018/1 narmāṇyudārarucirasmitaśobhitāni he pārtha he 'rjuna sakhe kurunandaneti
analyzed: narmāṇi udāra rucira smita śobhitāni he pārtha he rjuna sakhe kuru nandana iti

original: BhP_01.15.018/3 sañjalpitāni naradeva hṛdispṛśāni smarturluṭhanti hṛdayaṃ mama mādhavasya
analyzed: sañjalpitāni naradeva hṛdispṛśāni smartuḥ luṭhanti hṛdayam mama mādhavasya

original: BhP_01.15.019/1 śayyāsanāṭanavikatthanabhojanādiṣv aikyādvayasya ṛtavān iti vipralabdhaḥ
analyzed: śayyā āsana aṭana vikatthana bhojana ādiṣu aikyāt vayasyaḥ ṛtavān iti vipralabdhaḥ

original: BhP_01.15.019/3 sakhyuḥ sakheva pitṛvat tanayasya sarvaṃ sehe mahān mahitayā kumateraghaṃ me
analyzed: sakhyuḥ sakhā iva pitṛ vat tanayasya sarvam sehe mahān mahitayā kumateḥ agham me

original: BhP_01.15.020/1 so 'haṃ nṛpendra rahitaḥ puruṣottamena sakhyā priyeṇa suhṛdā hṛdayena śūnyaḥ
analyzed: saḥ ham nṛpa indra rahitaḥ puruṣottamena sakhyā priyeṇa suhṛdā hṛdayena śūnyaḥ

original: BhP_01.15.020/3 adhvanyurukramaparigraham aṅga rakṣan gopairasadbhirabaleva vinirjito 'smi
analyzed: adhvani urukrama parigraham aṅga rakṣan gopaiḥ asadbhiḥ abalā iva vinirjitaḥ smi

original: BhP_01.15.021/1 tadvai dhanusta iṣavaḥ sa ratho hayāste so 'haṃ rathī nṛpatayo yata ānamanti
analyzed: tat vai dhanuḥ te iṣavaḥ sa rathaḥ hayāḥ te saḥ ham rathī nṛpatayaḥ yatas ānamanti

original: BhP_01.15.021/3 sarvaṃ kṣaṇena tadabhūdasadīśariktaṃ bhasman hutaṃ kuhakarāddham ivoptam ūṣyām
analyzed: sarvam kṣaṇena tat abhūt asat īśa riktam bhasman hutam kuhaka rāddham iva uptam ūṣyām

original: BhP_01.15.022/1 rājaṃstvayānupṛṣṭānāṃ suhṛdāṃ naḥ suhṛtpure
analyzed: rājan tvayā anupṛṣṭānām suhṛdām naḥ suhṛd pure

original: BhP_01.15.022/3 vipraśāpavimūḍhānāṃ nighnatāṃ muṣṭibhirmithaḥ
analyzed: vipra śāpa vimūḍhānām nighnatām muṣṭibhiḥ mithas

original: BhP_01.15.023/1 vāruṇīṃ madirāṃ pītvā madonmathitacetasām
analyzed: vāruṇīm madirām pītvā mada unmathita cetasām

original: BhP_01.15.023/3 ajānatām ivānyonyaṃ catuḥpañcāvaśeṣitāḥ
analyzed: a jānatām iva anyonyam catur pañca avaśeṣitāḥ

original: BhP_01.15.024/1 prāyeṇaitadbhagavata īśvarasya viceṣṭitam
analyzed: prāyeṇa etat bhagavataḥ īśvarasya viceṣṭitam

original: BhP_01.15.024/3 mitho nighnanti bhūtāni bhāvayanti ca yan mithaḥ
analyzed: mithas nighnanti bhūtāni bhāvayanti ca yat mithas

original: BhP_01.15.025/1 jalaukasāṃ jale yadvan mahānto 'dantyaṇīyasaḥ
analyzed: jalaukasām jale yadvat mahāntaḥ danti aṇīyasaḥ

original: BhP_01.15.025/3 durbalān balino rājan mahānto balino mithaḥ
analyzed: durbalān balinaḥ rājan mahāntaḥ balinaḥ mithas

original: BhP_01.15.026/1 evaṃ baliṣṭhairyadubhirmahadbhiritarān vibhuḥ
analyzed: evam baliṣṭhaiḥ yadubhiḥ mahadbhiḥ itarān vibhuḥ

original: BhP_01.15.026/3 yadūn yadubhiranyonyaṃ bhūbhārān sañjahāra ha
analyzed: yadūn yadubhiḥ anyonyam bhū bhārān sañjahāra ha

original: BhP_01.15.027/1 deśakālārthayuktāni hṛttāpopaśamāni ca
analyzed: deśa kāla artha yuktāni hṛd tāpa upaśamāni ca

original: BhP_01.15.027/3 haranti smarataścittaṃ govindābhihitāni me
analyzed: haranti smarataḥ cittam govinda abhihitāni me

original: BhP_01.15.028/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.15.028/1 evaṃ cintayato jiṣṇoḥ kṛṣṇapādasaroruham
analyzed: evam cintayataḥ jiṣṇoḥ kṛṣṇa pāda saroruham

original: BhP_01.15.028/3 sauhārdenātigāḍhena śāntāsīdvimalā matiḥ
analyzed: sauhārdena ati gāḍhena śāntā āsīt vimalā matiḥ

original: BhP_01.15.029/1 vāsudevāṅghryanudhyāna paribṛṃhitaraṃhasā
BhP_01.15.029/3 bhaktyā nirmathitāśeṣa kaṣāyadhiṣaṇo 'rjunaḥ
analyzed: bhaktyā nirmathita aśeṣa kaṣāya dhiṣaṇaḥ rjunaḥ

original: BhP_01.15.030/1 gītaṃ bhagavatā jñānaṃ yat tat saṅgrāmamūrdhani
analyzed: gītam bhagavatā jñānam yat tat saṅgrāma mūrdhani

original: BhP_01.15.030/3 kālakarmatamoruddhaṃ punaradhyagamat prabhuḥ
analyzed: kāla karma tamaḥ ruddham punar adhyagamat prabhuḥ

original: BhP_01.15.031/1 viśoko brahmasampattyā sañchinnadvaitasaṃśayaḥ
analyzed: viśokaḥ brahma sampattyā sañchinna dvaita saṃśayaḥ

original: BhP_01.15.031/3 līnaprakṛtinairguṇyādaliṅgatvādasambhavaḥ
analyzed: līna prakṛti nairguṇyāt aliṅga tvāt asambhavaḥ

original: BhP_01.15.032/1 niśamya bhagavanmārgaṃ saṃsthāṃ yadukulasya ca
analyzed: niśamya bhagavat mārgam saṃsthām yadu kulasya ca

original: BhP_01.15.032/3 svaḥpathāya matiṃ cakre nibhṛtātmā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
analyzed: svaḥpathāya matim cakre nibhṛta ātmā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

original: BhP_01.15.033/1 pṛthāpyanuśrutya dhanañjayoditaṃ nāśaṃ yadūnāṃ bhagavadgatiṃ ca tām
analyzed: pṛthā api anuśrutya dhanañjaya uditam nāśam yadūnām bhagavat gatim ca tām

original: BhP_01.15.033/3 ekāntabhaktyā bhagavatyadhokṣaje niveśitātmopararāma saṃsṛteḥ
analyzed: ekānta bhaktyā bhagavati adhokṣaje niveśita ātmā upararāma saṃsṛteḥ

original: BhP_01.15.034/1 yayāharadbhuvo bhāraṃ tāṃ tanuṃ vijahāvajaḥ
analyzed: yayā aharat bhuvaḥ bhāram tām tanum vijahau ajaḥ

original: BhP_01.15.034/3 kaṇṭakaṃ kaṇṭakeneva dvayaṃ cāpīśituḥ samam
analyzed: kaṇṭakam kaṇṭakena iva dvayam ca api īśituḥ samam

original: BhP_01.15.035/1 yathā matsyādirūpāṇi dhatte jahyādyathā naṭaḥ
analyzed: yathā matsya ādi rūpāṇi dhatte jahyāt yathā naṭaḥ

original: BhP_01.15.035/3 bhūbhāraḥ kṣapito yenajahau tac ca kalevaram
analyzed: bhū bhāraḥ kṣapitaḥ yena jahau tat ca kalevaram

original: BhP_01.15.036/1 yadā mukundo bhagavān imāṃ mahīṃ jahau svatanvā śravaṇīyasatkathaḥ
analyzed: yadā mukundaḥ bhagavān imām mahīm jahau sva tanvā śravaṇīya sat kathaḥ

original: BhP_01.15.036/3 tadāharevāpratibuddhacetasām abhadrahetuḥ kaliranvavartata
analyzed: tadā ahar eva apratibuddha cetasām abhadra hetuḥ kaliḥ anvavartata

original: BhP_01.15.037/1 yudhiṣṭhirastat parisarpaṇaṃ budhaḥ pure ca rāṣṭre ca gṛhe tathātmani
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhiraḥ tat parisarpaṇam budhaḥ pure ca rāṣṭre ca gṛhe tathā ātmani

original: BhP_01.15.037/3 vibhāvya lobhānṛtajihmahiṃsanādyadharmacakraṃ gamanāya paryadhāt
analyzed: vibhāvya lobha anṛta jihma hiṃsana ādi adharma cakram gamanāya paryadhāt

original: BhP_01.15.038/1 svarāṭ pautraṃ vinayinam ātmanaḥ susamaṃ guṇaiḥ
analyzed: svarāj pautram vinayinam ātmanaḥ su samam guṇaiḥ

original: BhP_01.15.038/3 toyanīvyāḥ patiṃ bhūmerabhyaṣiñcadgajāhvaye
analyzed: toya nīvyāḥ patim bhūmeḥ abhyaṣiñcat gajāhvaye

original: BhP_01.15.039/1 mathurāyāṃ tathā vajraṃ śūrasenapatiṃ tataḥ
analyzed: mathurāyām tathā vajram śūrasena patim tatas

original: BhP_01.15.039/3 prājāpatyāṃ nirūpyeṣṭim agnīn apibadīśvaraḥ
analyzed: prājāpatyām nirūpya iṣṭim agnīn apibat īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_01.15.040/1 visṛjya tatra tat sarvaṃ dukūlavalayādikam
analyzed: visṛjya tatra tat sarvam dukūla valaya ādikam

original: BhP_01.15.040/3 nirmamo nirahaṅkāraḥ sañchinnāśeṣabandhanaḥ
analyzed: nirmamaḥ nirahaṅkāraḥ sañchinna aśeṣa bandhanaḥ

original: BhP_01.15.041/1 vācaṃ juhāva manasi tat prāṇa itare ca tam
analyzed: vācam juhāva manasi tat prāṇe itare ca tam

original: BhP_01.15.041/3 mṛtyāvapānaṃ sotsargaṃ taṃ pañcatve hyajohavīt
analyzed: mṛtyau apānam sa utsargam tam pañcatve hi ajohavīt

original: BhP_01.15.042/1 tritve hutvā ca pañcatvaṃ tac caikatve ñjuhon muniḥ
analyzed: tritve hutvā ca pañcatvam tat ca ekatve ñjuhot muniḥ

original: BhP_01.15.042/3 sarvam ātmanyajuhavīdbrahmaṇyātmānam avyaye
analyzed: sarvam ātmani ajuhavīt brahmaṇi ātmānam avyaye

original: BhP_01.15.043/1 cīravāsā nirāhāro baddhavāṅ muktamūrdhajaḥ
analyzed: cīra vāsāḥ nirāhāraḥ baddha vāc mukta mūrdhajaḥ

original: BhP_01.15.043/3 darśayann ātmano rūpaṃ jaḍonmattapiśācavat
analyzed: darśayan ātmanaḥ rūpam jaḍa unmatta piśāca vat

original: BhP_01.15.044/1 anavekṣamāṇo niragādaśṛṇvan badhiro yathā
analyzed: an avekṣamāṇaḥ niragāt aśṛṇvan badhiraḥ yathā

original: BhP_01.15.044/3 udīcīṃ praviveśāśāṃ gatapūrvāṃ mahātmabhiḥ
analyzed: udīcīm praviveśa āśām gata pūrvām mahātmabhiḥ

original: BhP_01.15.044/5 hṛdi brahma paraṃ dhyāyan nāvarteta yato gataḥ
analyzed: hṛdi brahma param dhyāyan na āvarteta yatas gataḥ

original: BhP_01.15.045/1 sarve tam anunirjagmurbhrātaraḥ kṛtaniścayāḥ
analyzed: sarve tam anunirjagmuḥ bhrātaraḥ kṛta niścayāḥ

original: BhP_01.15.045/3 kalinādharmamitreṇa dṛṣṭvā spṛṣṭāḥ prajā bhuvi
analyzed: kalinā adharma mitreṇa dṛṣṭvā spṛṣṭāḥ prajāḥ bhuvi

original: BhP_01.15.046/1 te sādhukṛtasarvārthā jñātvātyantikam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: te sādhu kṛta sarva arthāḥ jñātvā ātyantikam ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_01.15.046/3 manasā dhārayām āsurvaikuṇṭhacaraṇāmbujam
analyzed: manasā dhārayām āsuḥ vaikuṇṭha caraṇa ambujam

original: BhP_01.15.047/1 taddhyānodriktayā bhaktyā viśuddhadhiṣaṇāḥ pare
analyzed: tad dhyāna udriktayā bhaktyā viśuddha dhiṣaṇāḥ pare

original: BhP_01.15.047/3 tasmin nārāyaṇapade ekāntamatayo gatim
analyzed: tasmin nārāyaṇa pade ekānta matayaḥ gatim

original: BhP_01.15.048/1 avāpurduravāpāṃ te asadbhirviṣayātmabhiḥ
analyzed: avāpuḥ duravāpām te asadbhiḥ viṣaya ātmabhiḥ

original: BhP_01.15.048/3 vidhūtakalmaṣā sthānaṃ virajenātmanaiva hi
analyzed: vidhūta kalmaṣā sthānam virajena ātmanā eva hi

original: BhP_01.15.049/1 viduro 'pi parityajya prabhāse deham ātmanaḥ
analyzed: viduraḥ pi parityajya prabhāse deham ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_01.15.049/3 kṛṣṇāveśena taccittaḥ pitṛbhiḥ svakṣayaṃ yayau
analyzed: kṛṣṇa āveśena tad cittaḥ pitṛbhiḥ sva kṣayam yayau

original: BhP_01.15.050/1 draupadī ca tadājñāya patīnām anapekṣatām
analyzed: draupadī ca tat ājñāya patīnām an apekṣatām

original: BhP_01.15.050/3 vāsudeve bhagavati hyekāntamatirāpa tam
analyzed: vāsudeve bhagavati hi ekānta matiḥ āpa tam

original: BhP_01.15.051/1 yaḥ śraddhayaitadbhagavatpriyāṇāṃ pāṇḍoḥ sutānām iti samprayāṇam
analyzed: yaḥ śraddhayā etat bhagavat priyāṇām pāṇḍoḥ sutānām iti samprayāṇam

original: BhP_01.15.051/3 śṛṇotyalaṃ svastyayanaṃ pavitraṃ labdhvā harau bhaktim upaiti siddhim
analyzed: śṛṇoti alam svastyayanam pavitram labdhvā harau bhaktim upaiti siddhim

original: BhP_01.16.001/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.16.001/1 tataḥ parīkṣiddvijavaryaśikṣayā mahīṃ mahābhāgavataḥ śaśāsa ha
analyzed: tatas parīkṣit dvija varya śikṣayā mahīm mahā bhāgavataḥ śaśāsa ha

original: BhP_01.16.001/3 yathā hi sūtyām abhijātakovidāḥ samādiśan vipra mahadguṇastathā
analyzed: yathā hi sūtyām abhijāta kovidāḥ samādiśan vipra mahat guṇaḥ tathā

original: BhP_01.16.002/1 sa uttarasya tanayām upayema irāvatīm
analyzed: saḥ uttarasya tanayām upayeme irāvatīm

original: BhP_01.16.002/3 janamejayādīṃścaturastasyām utpādayat sutān
analyzed: janamejaya ādīn caturaḥ tasyām utpādayat sutān

original: BhP_01.16.003/1 ājahārāśvamedhāṃstrīn gaṅgāyāṃ bhūridakṣiṇān
analyzed: ājahāra aśvamedhān trīn gaṅgāyām bhūri dakṣiṇān

original: BhP_01.16.003/3 śāradvataṃ guruṃ kṛtvā devā yatrākṣigocarāḥ
analyzed: śāradvatam gurum kṛtvā devāḥ yatra akṣi gocarāḥ

original: BhP_01.16.004/1 nijagrāhaujasā vīraḥ kaliṃ digvijaye kvacit
analyzed: nijagrāha ojasā vīraḥ kalim digvijaye kvacid

original: BhP_01.16.004/3 nṛpaliṅgadharaṃ śūdraṃ ghnantaṃ gomithunaṃ padā
analyzed: nṛpa liṅga dharam śūdram ghnantam go mithunam padā

original: BhP_01.16.005/0 śaunaka uvāca
analyzed: śaunakaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.16.005/1 kasya hetornijagrāha kaliṃ digvijaye nṛpaḥ
analyzed: kasya hetoḥ nijagrāha kalim digvijaye nṛpaḥ

original: BhP_01.16.005/3 nṛdevacihnadhṛk śūdra ko 'sau gāṃ yaḥ padāhanat
analyzed: śūdra kaḥ sau gām yaḥ padā ahanat

original: BhP_01.16.005/5 tat kathyatāṃ mahābhāga yadi kṛṣṇakathāśrayam
analyzed: tat kathyatām mahābhāga yadi kṛṣṇa kathā āśrayam

original: BhP_01.16.006/1 athavāsya padāmbhoja makarandalihāṃ satām
analyzed: athavā asya pada ambhoja makaranda lihām satām

original: BhP_01.16.006/3 kim anyairasadālāpairāyuṣo yadasadvyayaḥ
analyzed: kim anyaiḥ asat ālāpaiḥ āyuṣaḥ yat asat vyayaḥ

original: BhP_01.16.007/1 kṣudrāyuṣāṃ nṛṇām aṅga martyānām ṛtam icchatām
analyzed: kṣudra āyuṣām nṛṇām aṅga martyānām ṛtam icchatām

original: BhP_01.16.007/3 ihopahūto bhagavān mṛtyuḥ śāmitrakarmaṇi
analyzed: iha upahūtaḥ bhagavān mṛtyuḥ śāmitra karmaṇi

original: BhP_01.16.008/1 na kaścin mriyate tāvadyāvadāsta ihāntakaḥ
analyzed: na kaścid mriyate tāvat yāvat āste iha antakaḥ

original: BhP_01.16.008/3 etadarthaṃ hi bhagavān āhūtaḥ paramarṣibhiḥ
analyzed: etad artham hi bhagavān āhūtaḥ parama ṛṣibhiḥ

original: BhP_01.16.008/5 aho nṛloke pīyeta harilīlāmṛtaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: aho nṛ loke pīyeta hari līlā amṛtam vacaḥ

original: BhP_01.16.009/1 mandasya mandaprajñasya vayo mandāyuṣaśca vai
analyzed: mandasya manda prajñasya vayaḥ manda āyuṣaḥ ca vai

original: BhP_01.16.009/3 nidrayā hriyate naktaṃ divā ca vyarthakarmabhiḥ
analyzed: nidrayā hriyate naktam divā ca vyartha karmabhiḥ

original: BhP_01.16.010/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.16.010/1 yadā parīkṣit kurujāṅgale 'vasat kaliṃ praviṣṭaṃ nijacakravartite
analyzed: yadā parīkṣit kurujāṅgale vasat kalim praviṣṭam nija cakra vartite

original: BhP_01.16.010/3 niśamya vārtām anatipriyāṃ tataḥ śarāsanaṃ saṃyugaśauṇḍirādade
analyzed: niśamya vārtām anatipriyām tatas śarāsanam saṃyuga śauṇḍiḥ ādade

original: BhP_01.16.011/1 svalaṅkṛtaṃ śyāmaturaṅgayojitaṃ rathaṃ mṛgendradhvajam āśritaḥ purāt
analyzed: su alaṅkṛtam śyāma turaṅga yojitam ratham mṛgendra dhvajam āśritaḥ purāt

original: BhP_01.16.011/3 vṛto rathāśvadvipapattiyuktayā svasenayā digvijayāya nirgataḥ
analyzed: vṛtaḥ ratha aśva dvipa patti yuktayā sva senayā digvijayāya nirgataḥ

original: BhP_01.16.012/1 bhadrāśvaṃ ketumālaṃ ca bhārataṃ cottarān kurūn
analyzed: bhadrāśvam ketumālam ca bhāratam ca uttarān kurūn

original: BhP_01.16.012/3 kimpuruṣādīni varṣāṇi vijitya jagṛhe balim
analyzed: kimpuruṣa ādīni varṣāṇi vijitya jagṛhe balim

original: BhP_01.16.013/1 nagarāṃśca vanāṃścaiva nadīśca vimalodakāḥ
analyzed: nagarān ca vanān ca eva nadīḥ ca vimala udakāḥ

original: BhP_01.16.013/3 puruṣān devakalpāṃśca nārīśca priyadarśanāḥ
analyzed: puruṣān deva kalpān ca nārīḥ ca priya darśanāḥ

original: BhP_01.16.014/1 adṛṣṭapūrvān subhagān sa dadarśa dhanañjayaḥ
analyzed: a dṛṣṭa pūrvān subhagān sa dadarśa dhanañjayaḥ

original: BhP_01.16.014/3 sadanāni ca śubhrāṇi nārīścāpsarasāṃ nibhāḥ
analyzed: sadanāni ca śubhrāṇi nārīḥ ca apsarasām

original: BhP_01.16.015/1 tatra tatropaśṛṇvānaḥ svapūrveṣāṃ mahātmanām
analyzed: tatra tatra upaśṛṇvānaḥ sva pūrveṣām mahātmanām

original: BhP_01.16.015/3 pragīyamāṇaṃ ca yaśaḥ kṛṣṇamāhātmyasūcakam
analyzed: pragīyamāṇam ca yaśaḥ kṛṣṇa māhātmya sūcakam

original: BhP_01.16.016/1 ātmānaṃ ca paritrātam aśvatthāmno 'stratejasaḥ
analyzed: ātmānam ca paritrātam aśvatthāmnaḥ stra tejasaḥ

original: BhP_01.16.016/3 snehaṃ ca vṛṣṇipārthānāṃ teṣāṃ bhaktiṃ ca keśave
analyzed: sneham ca vṛṣṇi pārthānām teṣām bhaktim ca keśave

original: BhP_01.16.017/1 tebhyaḥ paramasantuṣṭaḥ prītyujjṛmbhitalocanaḥ
analyzed: tebhyaḥ parama santuṣṭaḥ prīti ujjṛmbhita locanaḥ

original: BhP_01.16.017/3 mahādhanāni vāsāṃsi dadau hārān mahāmanāḥ
analyzed: mahādhanāni vāsāṃsi dadau hārān mahā manāḥ

original: BhP_01.16.018/1 sārathyapāraṣadasevanasakhyadautya
analyzed: sārathya pāraṣada sevana sakhya dautya

original: BhP_01.16.018/2 vīrāsanānugamanastavanapraṇāmān
analyzed: vīrāsana anugamana stavana praṇāmān

original: BhP_01.16.018/3 snigdheṣu pāṇḍuṣu jagatpraṇatiṃ ca viṣṇor
analyzed: snigdheṣu pāṇḍuṣu jagat praṇatim ca viṣṇoḥ

original: BhP_01.16.018/4 bhaktiṃ karoti nṛpatiścaraṇāravinde
analyzed: bhaktim karoti nṛpatiḥ caraṇa aravinde

original: BhP_01.16.019/1 tasyaivaṃ vartamānasya pūrveṣāṃ vṛttim anvaham
analyzed: tasya evam vartamānasya pūrveṣām vṛttim anvaham

original: BhP_01.16.019/3 nātidūre kilāścaryaṃ yadāsīt tan nibodha me
analyzed: na ati dūre kila āścaryam yat āsīt tat nibodha me

original: BhP_01.16.020/1 dharmaḥ padaikena caran vicchāyām upalabhya gām
analyzed: dharmaḥ padā ekena caran vicchāyām upalabhya gām

original: BhP_01.16.020/3 pṛcchati smāśruvadanāṃ vivatsām iva mātaram
analyzed: pṛcchati sma aśru vadanām vivatsām iva mātaram

original: BhP_01.16.021/0 dharma uvāca
analyzed: dharmaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.16.021/1 kaccidbhadre 'nāmayam ātmanaste vicchāyāsi mlāyateṣan mukhena
analyzed: kaccit bhadre na amayam ātmanaḥ te vicchāyā asi mlāyatā īṣat mukhena

original: BhP_01.16.021/3 ālakṣaye bhavatīm antarādhiṃ dūre bandhuṃ śocasi kañcanāmba
analyzed: ālakṣaye bhavatīm antara ādhim dūre bandhum śocasi kañcana amba

original: BhP_01.16.022/1 pādairnyūnaṃ śocasi maikapādam ātmānaṃ vā vṛṣalairbhokṣyamāṇam
analyzed: pādaiḥ nyūnam śocasi mā eka pādam ātmānam vā vṛṣalaiḥ bhokṣyamāṇam

original: BhP_01.16.022/3 āho surādīn hṛtayajñabhāgān prajā uta svin maghavatyavarṣati
analyzed: āho sura ādīn hṛta yajña bhāgān prajāḥ uta svid maghavati avarṣati

original: BhP_01.16.023/1 arakṣyamāṇāḥ striya urvi bālān śocasyatho puruṣādairivārtān
analyzed: arakṣyamāṇāḥ striyaḥ urvi bālān śocasi atho puruṣādaiḥ iva ārtān

original: BhP_01.16.023/3 vācaṃ devīṃ brahmakule kukarmaṇyabrahmaṇye rājakule kulāgryān
analyzed: vācam devīm brahma kule kukarmaṇi abrahmaṇye rāja kule kula agryān

original: BhP_01.16.024/1 kiṃ kṣatrabandhūn kalinopasṛṣṭān rāṣṭrāṇi vā tairavaropitāni
analyzed: kim kṣatrabandhūn kalinā upasṛṣṭān rāṣṭrāṇi vā taiḥ avaropitāni

original: BhP_01.16.024/3 itastato vāśanapānavāsaḥ snānavyavāyonmukhajīvalokam
analyzed: itas tatas vā aśana pāna vāsaḥ snāna vyavāya unmukha jīva lokam

original: BhP_01.16.025/1 yadvāmba te bhūribharāvatāra kṛtāvatārasya harerdharitri
analyzed: yat vā amba te bhūri bhara avatāra kṛta avatārasya hareḥ dharitri

original: BhP_01.16.025/3 antarhitasya smaratī visṛṣṭā karmāṇi nirvāṇavilambitāni
analyzed: antarhitasya smaratī visṛṣṭā karmāṇi nirvāṇa vilambitāni

original: BhP_01.16.026/1 idaṃ mamācakṣva tavādhimūlaṃ vasundhare yena vikarśitāsi
analyzed: idam mama ācakṣva tava ādhi mūlam vasundhare yena vikarśitā asi

original: BhP_01.16.026/3 kālena vā te balināṃ balīyasā surārcitaṃ kiṃ hṛtam amba saubhagam
analyzed: kālena vā te balinām balīyasā sura arcitam kim hṛtam amba saubhagam

original: BhP_01.16.027/0 dharaṇyuvāca
analyzed: dharaṇī uvāca

original: BhP_01.16.027/1 bhavān hi veda tat sarvaṃ yan māṃ dharmānupṛcchasi
analyzed: bhavān hi veda tat sarvam yat mām dharma anupṛcchasi

original: BhP_01.16.027/3 caturbhirvartase yena pādairlokasukhāvahaiḥ
analyzed: caturbhiḥ vartase yena pādaiḥ loka sukha āvahaiḥ

original: BhP_01.16.028/1 satyaṃ śaucaṃ dayā kṣāntistyāgaḥ santoṣa ārjavam
analyzed: satyam śaucam dayā kṣāntiḥ tyāgaḥ santoṣaḥ ārjavam

original: BhP_01.16.028/3 śamo damastapaḥ sāmyaṃ titikṣoparatiḥ śrutam
analyzed: śamaḥ damaḥ tapaḥ sāmyam titikṣā uparatiḥ śrutam

original: BhP_01.16.029/1 jñānaṃ viraktiraiśvaryaṃ śauryaṃ tejo balaṃ smṛtiḥ
analyzed: jñānam viraktiḥ aiśvaryam śauryam tejaḥ balam smṛtiḥ

original: BhP_01.16.029/3 svātantryaṃ kauśalaṃ kāntirdhairyaṃ mārdavam eva ca
analyzed: svātantryam kauśalam kāntiḥ dhairyam mārdavam eva ca

original: BhP_01.16.030/1 prāgalbhyaṃ praśrayaḥ śīlaṃ saha ojo balaṃ bhagaḥ
analyzed: prāgalbhyam praśrayaḥ śīlam sahaḥ ojaḥ balam bhagaḥ

original: BhP_01.16.030/3 gāmbhīryaṃ sthairyam āstikyaṃ kīrtirmāno 'nahaṅkṛtiḥ
analyzed: gāmbhīryam sthairyam āstikyam kīrtiḥ mānaḥ na ahaṅkṛtiḥ

original: BhP_01.16.031/1 ete cānye ca bhagavan nityā yatra mahāguṇāḥ
analyzed: ete ca anye ca bhagavat nityāḥ yatra mahā guṇāḥ

original: BhP_01.16.031/3 prārthyā mahattvam icchadbhirna viyanti sma karhicit
analyzed: prārthyāḥ mahat tvam icchadbhiḥ na viyanti sma karhicit

original: BhP_01.16.032/1 tenāhaṃ guṇapātreṇa śrīnivāsena sāmpratam
analyzed: tena aham guṇa pātreṇa śrīnivāsena sāmpratam

original: BhP_01.16.032/3 śocāmi rahitaṃ lokaṃ pāpmanā kalinekṣitam
analyzed: śocāmi rahitam lokam pāpmanā kalinā īkṣitam

original: BhP_01.16.033/1 ātmānaṃ cānuśocāmi bhavantaṃ cāmarottamam
analyzed: ātmānam ca anuśocāmi bhavantam ca amara uttamam

original: BhP_01.16.033/3 devān pitṝn ṛṣīn sādhūn sarvān varṇāṃstathāśramān
analyzed: devān pitṝn ṛṣīn sādhūn sarvān varṇān tathā āśramān

original: BhP_01.16.034/1 brahmādayo bahutithaṃ yadapāṅgamokṣa
analyzed: brahma ādayaḥ bahutitham yat apāṅga mokṣa

original: BhP_01.16.034/2 kāmāstapaḥ samacaran bhagavatprapannāḥ
analyzed: kāmāḥ tapaḥ samacaran bhagavat prapannāḥ

original: BhP_01.16.034/3 sā śrīḥ svavāsam aravindavanaṃ vihāya
analyzed: sā śrīḥ sva vāsam aravinda vanam vihāya

original: BhP_01.16.034/4 yatpādasaubhagam alaṃ bhajate 'nuraktā
analyzed: yad pāda saubhagam alam bhajate nu raktā

original: BhP_01.16.035/1 tasyāham abjakuliśāṅkuśaketuketaiḥ
analyzed: tasya aham abja kuliśa aṅkuśa ketu ketaiḥ

original: BhP_01.16.035/2 śrīmatpadairbhagavataḥ samalaṅkṛtāṅgī
analyzed: śrīmat padaiḥ bhagavataḥ samalaṅkṛta aṅgī

original: BhP_01.16.035/3 trīn atyaroca upalabhya tato vibhūtiṃ
analyzed: trīn atyaroce upalabhya tatas vibhūtim

original: BhP_01.16.035/4 lokān sa māṃ vyasṛjadutsmayatīṃ tadante
analyzed: lokān sa mām vyasṛjat utsmayatīm tad ante

original: BhP_01.16.036/1 yo vai mamātibharam āsuravaṃśarājñām
analyzed: yaḥ vai mama ati bharam āsura vaṃśa rājñām

original: BhP_01.16.036/2 akṣauhiṇīśatam apānudadātmatantraḥ
analyzed: akṣauhiṇī śatam apānudat ātmatantraḥ

original: BhP_01.16.036/3 tvāṃ duḥstham ūnapadam ātmani pauruṣeṇa
analyzed: tvām duḥstham ūna padam ātmani pauruṣeṇa

original: BhP_01.16.036/4 sampādayan yaduṣu ramyam abibhradaṅgam
analyzed: sampādayan yaduṣu ramyam abibhrat aṅgam

original: BhP_01.16.037/1 kā vā saheta virahaṃ puruṣottamasya
analyzed: kā vā saheta viraham puruṣottamasya

original: BhP_01.16.037/2 premāvalokarucirasmitavalgujalpaiḥ
BhP_01.16.037/3 sthairyaṃ samānam aharan madhumāninīnāṃ
analyzed: sthairyam samānam aharat madhu māninīnām

original: BhP_01.16.037/4 romotsavo mama yadaṅghriviṭaṅkitāyāḥ
analyzed: roma utsavaḥ mama yat aṅghri viṭaṅki tāyāḥ

original: BhP_01.16.038/1 tayorevaṃ kathayatoḥ pṛthivīdharmayostadā
analyzed: tayoḥ evam kathayatoḥ pṛthivī dharmayoḥ tadā

original: BhP_01.16.038/3 parīkṣin nāma rājarṣiḥ prāptaḥ prācīṃ sarasvatīm
analyzed: parīkṣit nāma rājarṣiḥ prāptaḥ prācīm sarasvatīm

original: BhP_01.17.001/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.17.001/1 tatra gomithunaṃ rājā hanyamānam anāthavat
analyzed: tatra go mithunam rājā hanyamānam anātha vat

original: BhP_01.17.001/3 daṇḍahastaṃ ca vṛṣalaṃ dadṛśe nṛpalāñchanam
analyzed: daṇḍa hastam ca vṛṣalam dadṛśe nṛpa lāñchanam

original: BhP_01.17.002/1 vṛṣaṃ mṛṇāladhavalaṃ mehantam iva bibhyatam
analyzed: vṛṣam mṛṇāla dhavalam mehantam iva bibhyatam

original: BhP_01.17.002/3 vepamānaṃ padaikena sīdantaṃ śūdratāḍitam
analyzed: vepamānam padā ekena sīdantam śūdra tāḍitam

original: BhP_01.17.003/1 gāṃ ca dharmadughāṃ dīnāṃ bhṛśaṃ śūdrapadāhatām
analyzed: gām ca dharma dughām dīnām bhṛśam śūdra pada āhatām

original: BhP_01.17.003/3 vivatsām āśruvadanāṃ kṣāmāṃ yavasam icchatīm
analyzed: vivatsām āśru vadanām kṣāmām yavasam icchatīm

original: BhP_01.17.004/1 papraccha ratham ārūḍhaḥ kārtasvaraparicchadam
analyzed: papraccha ratham ārūḍhaḥ kārtasvara paricchadam

original: BhP_01.17.004/3 meghagambhīrayā vācā samāropitakārmukaḥ
analyzed: megha gambhīrayā vācā samāropita kārmukaḥ

original: BhP_01.17.005/1 kastvaṃ maccharaṇe loke balāddhaṃsyabalān balī
analyzed: kaḥ tvam mad śaraṇe loke balāt haṃsi abalān balī

original: BhP_01.17.005/3 naradevo 'si veṣeṇa naṭavat karmaṇādvijaḥ
analyzed: naradevaḥ si veṣeṇa naṭa vat karmaṇā a dvijaḥ

original: BhP_01.17.006/1 yastvaṃ kṛṣṇe gate dūraṃ sahagāṇḍīvadhanvanā
analyzed: yaḥ tvam kṛṣṇe gate dūram saha gāṇḍīvadhanvanā

original: BhP_01.17.006/3 śocyo 'syaśocyān rahasi praharan vadham arhasi
analyzed: śocyaḥ si a śocyān rahasi praharan vadham arhasi

original: BhP_01.17.007/1 tvaṃ vā mṛṇāladhavalaḥ pādairnyūnaḥ padā caran
analyzed: tvam vā mṛṇāla dhavalaḥ pādaiḥ nyūnaḥ padā caran

original: BhP_01.17.007/3 vṛṣarūpeṇa kiṃ kaściddevo naḥ parikhedayan
analyzed: vṛṣa rūpeṇa kim kaścid devaḥ naḥ parikhedayan

original: BhP_01.17.008/1 na jātu kauravendrāṇāṃ dordaṇḍaparirambhite
analyzed: na jātu kaurava indrāṇām dos daṇḍa parirambhite

original: BhP_01.17.008/3 bhūtale 'nupatantyasmin vinā te prāṇināṃ śucaḥ
analyzed: bhū tale nupatanti asmin vinā te prāṇinām śucaḥ

original: BhP_01.17.009/1 mā saurabheyātra śuco vyetu te vṛṣalādbhayam
analyzed: mā saurabheya atra śucaḥ vyetu te vṛṣalāt bhayam

original: BhP_01.17.009/3 mā rodīramba bhadraṃ te khalānāṃ mayi śāstari
analyzed: mā rodīḥ amba bhadram te khalānām mayi śāstari

original: BhP_01.17.010/1 yasya rāṣṭre prajāḥ sarvāstrasyante sādhvyasādhubhiḥ
analyzed: yasya rāṣṭre prajāḥ sarvāḥ trasyante sādhvi asādhubhiḥ

original: BhP_01.17.010/3 tasya mattasya naśyanti kīrtirāyurbhago gatiḥ
analyzed: tasya mattasya naśyanti kīrtiḥ āyuḥ bhagaḥ gatiḥ

original: BhP_01.17.011/1 eṣa rājñāṃ paro dharmo hyārtānām ārtinigrahaḥ
analyzed: eṣa rājñām paraḥ dharmaḥ hi ārtānām ārti nigrahaḥ

original: BhP_01.17.011/3 ata enaṃ vadhiṣyāmi bhūtadruham asattamam
analyzed: atas enam vadhiṣyāmi bhūta druham asattamam

original: BhP_01.17.012/1 ko 'vṛścat tava pādāṃstrīn saurabheya catuṣpada
analyzed: kaḥ vṛścat tava pādān trīn saurabheya catuṣpada

original: BhP_01.17.012/3 mā bhūvaṃstvādṛśā rāṣṭre rājñāṃ kṛṣṇānuvartinām
analyzed: mā bhūvan tvādṛśāḥ rāṣṭre rājñām kṛṣṇa anuvartinām

original: BhP_01.17.013/1 ākhyāhi vṛṣa bhadraṃ vaḥ sādhūnām akṛtāgasām
analyzed: ākhyāhi vṛṣa bhadram vaḥ sādhūnām a kṛta āgasām

original: BhP_01.17.013/3 ātmavairūpyakartāraṃ pārthānāṃ kīrtidūṣaṇam
analyzed: ātma vairūpya kartāram pārthānām kīrti dūṣaṇam

original: BhP_01.17.014/1 jane 'nāgasyaghaṃ yuñjan sarvato 'sya ca madbhayam
analyzed: jane nāgasya agham yuñjan sarvatas sya ca mad bhayam

original: BhP_01.17.014/3 sādhūnāṃ bhadram eva syādasādhudamane kṛte
analyzed: sādhūnām bhadram eva syāt asādhu damane kṛte

original: BhP_01.17.015/1 anāgaḥsviha bhūteṣu ya āgaskṛn niraṅkuśaḥ
analyzed: anāgaḥsu iha bhūteṣu yaḥ āgaskṛt niraṅkuśaḥ

original: BhP_01.17.015/3 āhartāsmi bhujaṃ sākṣādamartyasyāpi sāṅgadam
analyzed: āhartāsmi bhujam sākṣāt amartyasya api sa aṅgadam

original: BhP_01.17.016/1 rājño hi paramo dharmaḥ svadharmasthānupālanam
analyzed: rājñaḥ hi paramaḥ dharmaḥ svadharma stha anupālanam

original: BhP_01.17.016/3 śāsato 'nyān yathāśāstram anāpadyutpathān iha
analyzed: śāsataḥ nyān yathāśāstram anāpadi utpathān iha

original: BhP_01.17.017/0 dharma uvāca
analyzed: dharmaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.17.017/1 etadvaḥ pāṇḍaveyānāṃ yuktam ārtābhayaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: etat vaḥ pāṇḍaveyānām yuktam ārta abhayam vacaḥ

original: BhP_01.17.017/3 yeṣāṃ guṇagaṇaiḥ kṛṣṇo dautyādau bhagavān kṛtaḥ
analyzed: yeṣām guṇa gaṇaiḥ kṛṣṇaḥ dautya ādau bhagavān kṛtaḥ

original: BhP_01.17.018/1 na vayaṃ kleśabījāni yataḥ syuḥ puruṣarṣabha
analyzed: na vayam kleśa bījāni yatas syuḥ puruṣa ṛṣabha

original: BhP_01.17.018/3 puruṣaṃ taṃ vijānīmo vākyabhedavimohitāḥ
analyzed: puruṣam tam vijānīmaḥ vākya bheda vimohitāḥ

original: BhP_01.17.019/1 kecidvikalpavasanā āhurātmānam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: kecid vikalpa vasanāḥ āhuḥ ātmānam ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_01.17.019/3 daivam anye 'pare karma svabhāvam apare prabhum
analyzed: daivam anye pare karma svabhāvam apare prabhum

original: BhP_01.17.020/1 apratarkyādanirdeśyāditi keṣvapi niścayaḥ
analyzed: apratarkyāt anirdeśyāt iti keṣu api niścayaḥ

original: BhP_01.17.020/3 atrānurūpaṃ rājarṣe vimṛśa svamanīṣayā
analyzed: atra anurūpam rājarṣe vimṛśa sva manīṣayā

original: BhP_01.17.021/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.17.021/1 evaṃ dharme pravadati sa samrāḍdvijasattamāḥ
analyzed: evam dharme pravadati sa samrāj dvijasattamāḥ

original: BhP_01.17.021/3 samāhitena manasā vikhedaḥ paryacaṣṭa tam
analyzed: samāhitena manasā vikhedaḥ paryacaṣṭa tam

original: BhP_01.17.022/0 rājovāca
analyzed: rājā uvāca

original: BhP_01.17.022/1 dharmaṃ bravīṣi dharmajña dharmo 'si vṛṣarūpadhṛk
analyzed: dharmam bravīṣi dharma jña dharmaḥ si vṛṣa rūpa dhṛk

original: BhP_01.17.022/3 yadadharmakṛtaḥ sthānaṃ sūcakasyāpi tadbhavet
analyzed: yat adharma kṛtaḥ sthānam sūcakasya api tat bhavet

original: BhP_01.17.023/1 athavā devamāyāyā nūnaṃ gatiragocarā
analyzed: athavā deva māyāyāḥ nūnam gatiḥ agocarā

original: BhP_01.17.023/3 cetaso vacasaścāpi bhūtānām iti niścayaḥ
analyzed: cetasaḥ vacasaḥ ca api bhūtānām iti niścayaḥ

original: BhP_01.17.024/1 tapaḥ śaucaṃ dayā satyam iti pādāḥ kṛte kṛtāḥ
analyzed: tapaḥ śaucam dayā satyam iti pādāḥ kṛte kṛtāḥ

original: BhP_01.17.024/3 adharmāṃśaistrayo bhagnāḥ smayasaṅgamadaistava
analyzed: adharma aṃśaiḥ trayaḥ bhagnāḥ smaya saṅga madaiḥ tava

original: BhP_01.17.025/1 idānīṃ dharma pādaste satyaṃ nirvartayedyataḥ
analyzed: idānīm dharma pādaḥ te satyam nirvartayet yatas

original: BhP_01.17.025/3 taṃ jighṛkṣatyadharmo 'yam anṛtenaidhitaḥ kaliḥ
analyzed: tam jighṛkṣati adharmaḥ yam anṛtena edhitaḥ kaliḥ

original: BhP_01.17.026/1 iyaṃ ca bhūmirbhagavatā nyāsitorubharā satī
analyzed: iyam ca bhūmiḥ bhagavatā nyāsitā uru bharā satī

original: BhP_01.17.026/3 śrīmadbhistatpadanyāsaiḥ sarvataḥ kṛtakautukā
analyzed: śrīmadbhiḥ tad padanyāsaiḥ sarvatas kṛta kautukā

original: BhP_01.17.027/1 śocatyaśrukalā sādhvī durbhagevojjhitā satī
analyzed: śocati aśru kalā sādhvī durbhagā iva ujjhitā satī

original: BhP_01.17.027/3 abrahmaṇyā nṛpavyājāḥ śūdrā bhokṣyanti mām iti
analyzed: a brahmaṇyāḥ nṛpa vyājāḥ śūdrāḥ bhokṣyanti mām iti

original: BhP_01.17.028/1 iti dharmaṃ mahīṃ caiva sāntvayitvā mahārathaḥ
analyzed: iti dharmam mahīm ca eva sāntvayitvā mahā rathaḥ

original: BhP_01.17.028/3 niśātam ādade khaḍgaṃ kalaye 'dharmahetave
analyzed: ādade khaḍgam kalaye dharma hetave

original: BhP_01.17.029/1 taṃ jighāṃsum abhipretya vihāya nṛpalāñchanam
analyzed: tam jighāṃsum abhipretya vihāya nṛpa lāñchanam

original: BhP_01.17.029/3 tatpādamūlaṃ śirasā samagādbhayavihvalaḥ
analyzed: tad pāda mūlam śirasā samagāt bhaya vihvalaḥ

original: BhP_01.17.030/1 patitaṃ pādayorvīraḥ kṛpayā dīnavatsalaḥ
analyzed: patitam pādayoḥ vīraḥ kṛpayā dīna vatsalaḥ

original: BhP_01.17.030/3 śaraṇyo nāvadhīc chlokya āha cedaṃ hasann iva
analyzed: śaraṇyaḥ na avadhīt ślokyaḥ āha ca idam hasan iva

original: BhP_01.17.031/0 rājovāca
analyzed: rājā uvāca

original: BhP_01.17.031/1 na te guḍākeśayaśodharāṇāṃ baddhāñjalervai bhayam asti kiñcit
analyzed: na te guḍākeśa yaśodharāṇām baddhāñjaleḥ vai bhayam asti kiñcid

original: BhP_01.17.031/3 na vartitavyaṃ bhavatā kathañcana kṣetre madīye tvam adharmabandhuḥ
analyzed: na vartitavyam bhavatā kathañcana kṣetre madīye tvam adharma bandhuḥ

original: BhP_01.17.032/1 tvāṃ vartamānaṃ naradevadeheṣvanupravṛtto 'yam adharmapūgaḥ
analyzed: tvām vartamānam naradeva deheṣu anupravṛttaḥ yam adharma pūgaḥ

original: BhP_01.17.032/3 lobho 'nṛtaṃ cauryam anāryam aṃho jyeṣṭhā ca māyā kalahaśca dambhaḥ
analyzed: lobhaḥ cauryam anāryam aṃhaḥ jyeṣṭhā ca māyā kalahaḥ ca dambhaḥ

original: BhP_01.17.033/1 na vartitavyaṃ tadadharmabandho dharmeṇa satyena ca vartitavye
analyzed: na vartitavyam tat adharma bandho dharmeṇa satyena ca vartitavye

original: BhP_01.17.033/3 brahmāvarte yatra yajanti yajñairyajñeśvaraṃ yajñavitānavijñāḥ
analyzed: brahmāvarte yatra yajanti yajñaiḥ yajñeśvaram yajña vitāna vijñāḥ

original: BhP_01.17.034/1 yasmin harirbhagavān ijyamāna ijyātmamūrtiryajatāṃ śaṃ tanoti
analyzed: yasmin hariḥ bhagavān ijyamānaḥ ijya ātma mūrtiḥ yajatām śam tanoti

original: BhP_01.17.034/3 kāmān amoghān sthirajaṅgamānām antarbahirvāyurivaiṣa ātmā
analyzed: kāmān amoghān sthira jaṅgamānām antar bahis vāyuḥ iva eṣa ātmā

original: BhP_01.17.035/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.17.035/1 parīkṣitaivam ādiṣṭaḥ sa kalirjātavepathuḥ
analyzed: parīkṣitā evam ādiṣṭaḥ sa kaliḥ jāta vepathuḥ

original: BhP_01.17.035/3 tam udyatāsim āhedaṃ daṇḍapāṇim ivodyatam
analyzed: tam udyata asim āha idam daṇḍa pāṇim iva udyatam

original: BhP_01.17.036/0 kaliruvāca
analyzed: kaliḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.17.036/1 yatra kva vātha vatsyāmi sārvabhauma tavājñayā
analyzed: yatra kva vā atha vatsyāmi sārvabhauma tava ājñayā

original: BhP_01.17.036/3 lakṣaye tatra tatrāpi tvām ātteṣuśarāsanam
analyzed: lakṣaye tatra tatra api tvām ātta iṣu śarāsanam

original: BhP_01.17.037/1 tan me dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭha sthānaṃ nirdeṣṭum arhasi
analyzed: tat me dharma bhṛtām śreṣṭha sthānam nirdeṣṭum arhasi

original: BhP_01.17.037/3 yatraiva niyato vatsya ātiṣṭhaṃste 'nuśāsanam
analyzed: yatra eva niyataḥ vatsye ātiṣṭhan te nuśāsanam

original: BhP_01.17.038/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.17.038/1 abhyarthitastadā tasmai sthānāni kalaye dadau
analyzed: abhyarthitaḥ tadā tasmai sthānāni kalaye dadau

original: BhP_01.17.038/3 dyūtaṃ pānaṃ striyaḥ sūnā yatrādharmaścaturvidhaḥ
analyzed: dyūtam pānam striyaḥ sūnā yatra adharmaḥ caturvidhaḥ

original: BhP_01.17.039/1 punaśca yācamānāya jātarūpam adāt prabhuḥ
analyzed: punar ca yācamānāya jātarūpam adāt prabhuḥ

original: BhP_01.17.039/3 tato 'nṛtaṃ madaṃ kāmaṃ rajo vairaṃ ca pañcamam
analyzed: tatas madam kāmam rajaḥ vairam ca pañcamam

original: BhP_01.17.040/1 amūni pañca sthānāni hyadharmaprabhavaḥ kaliḥ
analyzed: amūni pañca sthānāni hi adharma prabhavaḥ kaliḥ

original: BhP_01.17.040/3 auttareyeṇa dattāni nyavasat tannideśakṛt
analyzed: auttareyeṇa dattāni nyavasat tad nideśa kṛt

original: BhP_01.17.041/1 athaitāni na seveta bubhūṣuḥ puruṣaḥ kvacit
analyzed: atha etāni na seveta bubhūṣuḥ puruṣaḥ kvacid

original: BhP_01.17.041/3 viśeṣato dharmaśīlo rājā lokapatirguruḥ
analyzed: viśeṣataḥ dharma śīlaḥ rājā lokapatiḥ guruḥ

original: BhP_01.17.042/1 vṛṣasya naṣṭāṃstrīn pādān tapaḥ śaucaṃ dayām iti
analyzed: vṛṣasya naṣṭān trīn pādān tapaḥ śaucam dayām iti

original: BhP_01.17.042/3 pratisandadha āśvāsya mahīṃ ca samavardhayat
analyzed: pratisandadhe āśvāsya mahīm ca samavardhayat

original: BhP_01.17.043/1 sa eṣa etarhyadhyāsta āsanaṃ pārthivocitam
analyzed: saḥ eṣaḥ etarhi adhyāste āsanam pārthiva ucitam

original: BhP_01.17.043/3 pitāmahenopanyastaṃ rājñāraṇyaṃ vivikṣatā
analyzed: pitāmahena upanyastam rājñā araṇyam vivikṣatā

original: BhP_01.17.044/1 āste 'dhunā sa rājarṣiḥ kauravendraśriyollasan
analyzed: āste dhunā sa rājarṣiḥ kaurava indra śriyā ullasan

original: BhP_01.17.044/3 gajāhvaye mahābhāgaścakravartī bṛhacchravāḥ
analyzed: gajāhvaye mahābhāgaḥ cakravartī bṛhacchravāḥ

original: BhP_01.17.045/1 itthambhūtānubhāvo 'yam abhimanyusuto nṛpaḥ
analyzed: ittham bhūta anubhāvaḥ yam abhimanyu sutaḥ nṛpaḥ

original: BhP_01.17.045/3 yasya pālayataḥ kṣauṇīṃ yūyaṃ satrāya dīkṣitāḥ
analyzed: yasya pālayataḥ kṣauṇīm yūyam satrāya dīkṣitāḥ

original: BhP_01.18.001/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.18.001/1 yo vai drauṇyastravipluṣṭo na māturudare mṛtaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ vai drauṇi astra vipluṣṭaḥ na mātuḥ udare mṛtaḥ

original: BhP_01.18.001/3 anugrahādbhagavataḥ kṛṣṇasyādbhutakarmaṇaḥ
analyzed: anugrahāt bhagavataḥ kṛṣṇasya adbhuta karmaṇaḥ

original: BhP_01.18.002/1 brahmakopotthitādyastu takṣakāt prāṇaviplavāt
analyzed: brahma kopa utthitāt yaḥ tu takṣakāt prāṇa viplavāt

original: BhP_01.18.002/3 na sammumohorubhayādbhagavatyarpitāśayaḥ
analyzed: na sammumoha uru bhayāt bhagavati arpita āśayaḥ

original: BhP_01.18.003/1 utsṛjya sarvataḥ saṅgaṃ vijñātājitasaṃsthitiḥ
analyzed: utsṛjya sarvatas saṅgam vijñāta ajita saṃsthitiḥ

original: BhP_01.18.003/3 vaiyāsakerjahau śiṣyo gaṅgāyāṃ svaṃ kalevaram
analyzed: vaiyāsakeḥ jahau śiṣyaḥ gaṅgāyām svam kalevaram

original: BhP_01.18.004/1 nottamaślokavārtānāṃ juṣatāṃ tatkathāmṛtam
analyzed: na uttamaśloka vārtānām juṣatām tad kathā amṛtam

original: BhP_01.18.004/3 syāt sambhramo 'ntakāle 'pi smaratāṃ tatpadāmbujam
analyzed: syāt sambhramaḥ smaratām tad pada ambujam

original: BhP_01.18.005/1 tāvat kalirna prabhavet praviṣṭo 'pīha sarvataḥ
analyzed: tāvat kaliḥ na prabhavet praviṣṭaḥ u pi iha sarvatas

original: BhP_01.18.005/3 yāvadīśo mahān urvyām ābhimanyava ekarāṭ
analyzed: yāvat īśaḥ mahān urvyām ābhimanyavaḥ eka rāj

original: BhP_01.18.006/1 yasminn ahani yarhyeva bhagavān utsasarja gām
analyzed: yasmin ahani yarhi eva bhagavān utsasarja gām

original: BhP_01.18.006/3 tadaivehānuvṛtto 'sāvadharmaprabhavaḥ kaliḥ
analyzed: tadā eva iha anuvṛttaḥ saḥ avadharma prabhavaḥ kaliḥ

original: BhP_01.18.007/1 nānudveṣṭi kaliṃ samrāṭ sāraṅga iva sārabhuk
analyzed: na anudveṣṭi kalim samrāj sāraṅgaḥ iva sāra bhuj

original: BhP_01.18.007/3 kuśalānyāśu siddhyanti netarāṇi kṛtāni yat
analyzed: kuśalāni āśu siddhyanti na itarāṇi kṛtāni yat

original: BhP_01.18.008/1 kiṃ nu bāleṣu śūreṇa kalinā dhīrabhīruṇā
analyzed: kim nu bāleṣu śūreṇa kalinā dhīra bhīruṇā

original: BhP_01.18.008/3 apramattaḥ pramatteṣu yo vṛko nṛṣu vartate
analyzed: apramattaḥ pramatteṣu yaḥ vṛkaḥ nṛṣu vartate

original: BhP_01.18.009/1 upavarṇitam etadvaḥ puṇyaṃ pārīkṣitaṃ mayā
analyzed: upavarṇitam etat vaḥ puṇyam pārīkṣitam mayā

original: BhP_01.18.009/3 vāsudevakathopetam ākhyānaṃ yadapṛcchata
analyzed: vāsudeva kathā upetam ākhyānam yat apṛcchata

original: BhP_01.18.010/1 yā yāḥ kathā bhagavataḥ kathanīyorukarmaṇaḥ
analyzed: yāḥ yāḥ kathāḥ bhagavataḥ kathanīyā uru karmaṇaḥ

original: BhP_01.18.010/3 guṇakarmāśrayāḥ pumbhiḥ saṃsevyāstā bubhūṣubhiḥ
analyzed: guṇa karma āśrayāḥ pumbhiḥ saṃsevyāḥ tāḥ bubhūṣubhiḥ

original: BhP_01.18.011/0 ṛṣaya ūcuḥ
analyzed: ṛṣayaḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_01.18.011/1 sūta jīva samāḥ saumya śāśvatīrviśadaṃ yaśaḥ
analyzed: sūta jīva samāḥ saumya śāśvatīḥ viśadam yaśaḥ

original: BhP_01.18.011/3 yastvaṃ śaṃsasi kṛṣṇasya martyānām amṛtaṃ hi naḥ
analyzed: yaḥ tvam śaṃsasi kṛṣṇasya martyānām amṛtam hi naḥ

original: BhP_01.18.012/1 karmaṇyasminn anāśvāse dhūmadhūmrātmanāṃ bhavān
analyzed: karmaṇi asmin anāśvāse dhūma dhūmra ātmanām bhavān

original: BhP_01.18.012/3 āpāyayati govinda pādapadmāsavaṃ madhu
analyzed: āpāyayati govinda pāda padma āsavam madhu

original: BhP_01.18.013/1 tulayāma lavenāpi na svargaṃ nāpunarbhavam
analyzed: tulayāma lavena api na svargam na apunarbhavam

original: BhP_01.18.013/3 bhagavatsaṅgisaṅgasya martyānāṃ kim utāśiṣaḥ
analyzed: bhagavat saṅgi saṅgasya martyānām kim uta āśiṣaḥ

original: BhP_01.18.014/1 ko nāma tṛpyedrasavit kathāyāṃ mahattamaikāntaparāyaṇasya
analyzed: kaḥ nāma tṛpyet rasa vid kathāyām mahattama ekānta parāyaṇasya

original: BhP_01.18.014/3 nāntaṃ guṇānām aguṇasya jagmur yogeśvarā ye bhavapādmamukhyāḥ
analyzed: na antam guṇānām aguṇasya jagmuḥ yogeśvarāḥ ye bhava pādma mukhyāḥ

original: BhP_01.18.015/1 tan no bhavān vai bhagavatpradhāno mahattamaikāntaparāyaṇasya
analyzed: tat naḥ bhavān vai bhagavat pradhānaḥ mahattama ekānta parāyaṇasya

original: BhP_01.18.015/3 harerudāraṃ caritaṃ viśuddhaṃ śuśrūṣatāṃ no vitanotu vidvan
analyzed: hareḥ udāram caritam viśuddham śuśrūṣatām naḥ vitanotu vidvan

original: BhP_01.18.016/1 sa vai mahābhāgavataḥ parīkṣid yenāpavargākhyam adabhrabuddhiḥ
analyzed: sa vai mahā bhāgavataḥ parīkṣit yena apavarga ākhyam adabhra buddhiḥ

original: BhP_01.18.016/3 jñānena vaiyāsakiśabditena bheje khagendradhvajapādamūlam
analyzed: jñānena vaiyāsaki śabditena bheje khaga indra dhvaja pāda mūlam

original: BhP_01.18.017/1 tan naḥ paraṃ puṇyam asaṃvṛtārtham ākhyānam atyadbhutayoganiṣṭham
analyzed: tat naḥ param puṇyam asaṃvṛta artham ākhyānam ati adbhuta yoga niṣṭham

original: BhP_01.18.017/3 ākhyāhyanantācaritopapannaṃ pārīkṣitaṃ bhāgavatābhirāmam
analyzed: ākhyāhi ananta ācarita upapannam pārīkṣitam bhāgavata abhirāmam

original: BhP_01.18.018/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.18.018/1 aho vayaṃ janmabhṛto 'dya hāsma vṛddhānuvṛttyāpi vilomajātāḥ
analyzed: aho vayam janma bhṛtaḥ ha āsma vṛddha anuvṛttyā api viloma jātāḥ

original: BhP_01.18.018/3 dauṣkulyam ādhiṃ vidhunoti śīghraṃ mahattamānām abhidhānayogaḥ
analyzed: dauṣkulyam ādhim vidhunoti śīghram mahattamānām abhidhāna yogaḥ

original: BhP_01.18.019/1 kutaḥ punargṛṇato nāma tasya mahattamaikāntaparāyaṇasya
analyzed: kutas punar gṛṇataḥ nāma tasya mahattama ekānta parāyaṇasya

original: BhP_01.18.019/3 yo 'nantaśaktirbhagavān ananto mahadguṇatvādyam anantam āhuḥ
analyzed: yaḥ nanta śaktiḥ bhagavān anantaḥ mahat guṇa tva ādyam anantam āhuḥ

original: BhP_01.18.020/1 etāvatālaṃ nanu sūcitena guṇairasāmyānatiśāyanasya
analyzed: etāvatā alam nanu sūcitena guṇaiḥ asāmya anatiśāyanasya

original: BhP_01.18.020/3 hitvetarān prārthayato vibhūtir yasyāṅghrireṇuṃ juṣate 'nabhīpsoḥ
analyzed: hitvā itarān prārthayataḥ vibhūtiḥ yasya aṅghri reṇum juṣate nabhīpsoḥ

original: BhP_01.18.021/1 athāpi yatpādanakhāvasṛṣṭaṃ jagadviriñcopahṛtārhaṇāmbhaḥ
analyzed: athā api yat pāda nakha avasṛṣṭam jagat viriñca upahṛta arhaṇa ambhaḥ

original: BhP_01.18.021/3 seśaṃ punātyanyatamo mukundāt ko nāma loke bhagavatpadārthaḥ
analyzed: punāti anyatamaḥ mukundāt kaḥ nāma loke bhagavat padārthaḥ

original: BhP_01.18.022/1 yatrānuraktāḥ sahasaiva dhīrā vyapohya dehādiṣu saṅgam ūḍham
analyzed: yatra anuraktāḥ sahasā eva dhīrāḥ vyapohya deha ādiṣu saṅgam ūḍham

original: BhP_01.18.022/3 vrajanti tat pāramahaṃsyam antyaṃ yasminn ahiṃsopaśamaḥ svadharmaḥ
analyzed: vrajanti tat pāramahaṃsyam antyam yasmin ahiṃsā upaśamaḥ svadharmaḥ

original: BhP_01.18.023/1 ahaṃ hi pṛṣṭo 'ryamaṇo bhavadbhir ācakṣa ātmāvagamo 'tra yāvān
analyzed: aham hi pṛṣṭaḥ ryamaṇaḥ bhavadbhiḥ ācakṣe yāvān

original: BhP_01.18.023/3 nabhaḥ patantyātmasamaṃ patattriṇas tathā samaṃ viṣṇugatiṃ vipaścitaḥ
analyzed: nabhaḥ patanti ātma samam patattriṇaḥ tathā samam viṣṇu gatim vipaścitaḥ

original: BhP_01.18.024/1 ekadā dhanurudyamya vicaran mṛgayāṃ vane
analyzed: ekadā dhanuḥ udyamya vicaran mṛgayām vane

original: BhP_01.18.024/3 mṛgān anugataḥ śrāntaḥ kṣudhitastṛṣito bhṛśam
analyzed: mṛgān anugataḥ śrāntaḥ kṣudhitaḥ tṛṣitaḥ bhṛśam

original: BhP_01.18.025/1 jalāśayam acakṣāṇaḥ praviveśa tam āśramam
analyzed: jalāśayam a cakṣāṇaḥ praviveśa tam āśramam

original: BhP_01.18.025/3 dadarśa munim āsīnaṃ śāntaṃ mīlitalocanam
analyzed: dadarśa munim āsīnam śāntam mīlita locanam

original: BhP_01.18.026/1 pratiruddhendriyaprāṇa manobuddhim upāratam
analyzed: pratiruddha indriya prāṇa manaḥ buddhim upāratam

original: BhP_01.18.026/3 sthānatrayāt paraṃ prāptaṃ brahmabhūtam avikriyam
analyzed: sthāna trayāt param prāptam brahma bhūtam avikriyam

original: BhP_01.18.027/1 viprakīrṇajaṭācchannaṃ rauraveṇājinena ca
analyzed: viprakīrṇa jaṭā ācchannam rauraveṇa ajinena ca

original: BhP_01.18.027/3 viśuṣyattālurudakaṃ tathābhūtam ayācata
analyzed: viśuṣyat tāluḥ udakam tathābhūtam ayācata

original: BhP_01.18.028/1 alabdhatṛṇabhūmyādirasamprāptārghyasūnṛtaḥ
analyzed: a labdha tṛṇa bhūmi ādiḥ a samprāpta arghya sūnṛtaḥ

original: BhP_01.18.028/3 avajñātam ivātmānaṃ manyamānaścukopa ha
analyzed: avajñātam iva ātmānam manyamānaḥ cukopa ha

original: BhP_01.18.029/1 abhūtapūrvaḥ sahasā kṣuttṛḍbhyām arditātmanaḥ
analyzed: abhūta pūrvaḥ sahasā kṣudh tṛḍbhyām ardita ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_01.18.029/3 brāhmaṇaṃ pratyabhūdbrahman matsaro manyureva ca
analyzed: brāhmaṇam pratyabhūt brahman matsaraḥ manyuḥ eva ca

original: BhP_01.18.030/1 sa tu brahmaṛṣeraṃse gatāsum uragaṃ ruṣā
analyzed: sa tu brahma ṛṣeḥ aṃse gatāsum uragam ruṣā

original: BhP_01.18.030/3 vinirgacchan dhanuṣkoṭyā nidhāya puram āgataḥ
analyzed: vinirgacchan dhanuṣkoṭyā nidhāya puram āgataḥ

original: BhP_01.18.031/1 eṣa kiṃ nibhṛtāśeṣa karaṇo mīlitekṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: eṣa kim nibhṛta aśeṣa karaṇaḥ mīlita īkṣaṇaḥ

original: BhP_01.18.031/3 mṛṣāsamādhirāhosvit kiṃ nu syāt kṣatrabandhubhiḥ
analyzed: mṛṣā samādhiḥ āhosvit kim nu syāt kṣatrabandhubhiḥ

original: BhP_01.18.032/1 tasya putro 'titejasvī viharan bālako 'rbhakaiḥ
analyzed: tasya putraḥ ti tejasvī viharan bālakaḥ ṛbhakaiḥ

original: BhP_01.18.032/3 rājñāghaṃ prāpitaṃ tātaṃ śrutvā tatredam abravīt
analyzed: rājñā agham prāpitam tātam śrutvā tatra idam abravīt

original: BhP_01.18.033/1 aho adharmaḥ pālānāṃ pīvnāṃ balibhujām iva
analyzed: aho adharmaḥ pālānām pīvnām balibhujām iva

original: BhP_01.18.033/3 svāminyaghaṃ yaddāsānāṃ dvārapānāṃ śunām iva
analyzed: svāmini agham yat dāsānām dvārapānām śunām iva

original: BhP_01.18.034/1 brāhmaṇaiḥ kṣatrabandhurhi gṛhapālo nirūpitaḥ
analyzed: brāhmaṇaiḥ kṣatrabandhuḥ hi gṛhapālaḥ nirūpitaḥ

original: BhP_01.18.034/3 sa kathaṃ tadgṛhe dvāḥsthaḥ sabhāṇḍaṃ bhoktum arhati
analyzed: sa katham tad gṛhe dvāḥsthaḥ sa bhāṇḍam bhoktum arhati

original: BhP_01.18.035/1 kṛṣṇe gate bhagavati śāstaryutpathagāminām
analyzed: kṛṣṇe gate bhagavati śāstari utpatha gāminām

original: BhP_01.18.035/3 tadbhinnasetūn adyāhaṃ śāsmi paśyata me balam
analyzed: tad bhinna setūn adya aham śāsmi paśyata me balam

original: BhP_01.18.036/1 ityuktvā roṣatāmrākṣo vayasyān ṛṣibālakaḥ
analyzed: iti uktvā roṣa tāmra akṣaḥ vayasyān ṛṣi bālakaḥ

original: BhP_01.18.036/3 kauśikyāpa upaspṛśya vāgvajraṃ visasarja ha
analyzed: kauśikyā apaḥ upaspṛśya vāc vajram visasarja ha

original: BhP_01.18.037/1 iti laṅghitamaryādaṃ takṣakaḥ saptame 'hani
analyzed: iti laṅghita maryādam takṣakaḥ saptame hani

original: BhP_01.18.037/3 daṅkṣyati sma kulāṅgāraṃ codito me tatadruham
analyzed: daṅkṣyati sma kula aṅgāram coditaḥ me tata druham

original: BhP_01.18.038/1 tato 'bhyetyāśramaṃ bālo gale sarpakalevaram
analyzed: tatas bhyeti āśramam bālaḥ gale sarpa kalevaram

original: BhP_01.18.038/3 pitaraṃ vīkṣya duḥkhārto muktakaṇṭho ruroda ha
analyzed: pitaram vīkṣya duḥkha ārtaḥ mukta kaṇṭhaḥ ruroda ha

original: BhP_01.18.039/1 sa vā āṅgiraso brahman śrutvā sutavilāpanam
analyzed: sa vai āṅgirasaḥ brahman śrutvā suta vilāpanam

original: BhP_01.18.039/3 unmīlya śanakairnetre dṛṣṭvā cāṃse mṛtoragam
analyzed: unmīlya śanakais netre dṛṣṭvā ca aṃse mṛta uragam

original: BhP_01.18.040/1 visṛjya taṃ ca papraccha vatsa kasmāddhi rodiṣi
analyzed: visṛjya tam ca papraccha vatsa kasmāt hi rodiṣi

original: BhP_01.18.040/3 kena vā te 'pakṛtam ityuktaḥ sa nyavedayat
analyzed: kena vā te iti uktaḥ sa nyavedayat

original: BhP_01.18.041/1 niśamya śaptam atadarhaṃ narendraṃ sa brāhmaṇo nātmajam abhyanandat
analyzed: niśamya śaptam a tad arham narendram sa brāhmaṇaḥ na ātmajam abhyanandat

original: BhP_01.18.041/3 aho batāṃho mahadadya te kṛtam alpīyasi droha ururdamo dhṛtaḥ
analyzed: aho bata aṃhaḥ mahat adya te kṛtam alpīyasi drohe uruḥ damaḥ dhṛtaḥ

original: BhP_01.18.042/1 na vai nṛbhirnaradevaṃ parākhyaṃ sammātum arhasyavipakvabuddhe
analyzed: na vai nṛbhiḥ naradevam para ākhyam sammātum arhasi avipakva buddhe

original: BhP_01.18.042/3 yattejasā durviṣaheṇa guptā vindanti bhadrāṇyakutobhayāḥ prajāḥ
analyzed: yad tejasā durviṣaheṇa guptāḥ vindanti bhadrāṇi akutobhayāḥ prajāḥ

original: BhP_01.18.043/1 alakṣyamāṇe naradevanāmni rathāṅgapāṇāvayam aṅga lokaḥ
analyzed: a lakṣyamāṇe naradeva nāmni rathāṅga pāṇau ayam aṅga lokaḥ

original: BhP_01.18.043/3 tadā hi caurapracuro vinaṅkṣyatyarakṣyamāṇo 'vivarūthavat kṣaṇāt
analyzed: tadā hi caura pracuraḥ vinaṅkṣyati arakṣyamāṇaḥ vivarūtha vat kṣaṇāt

original: BhP_01.18.044/1 tadadya naḥ pāpam upaityananvayaṃ yan naṣṭanāthasya vasorvilumpakāt
analyzed: tat adya naḥ pāpam upaiti ananvayam yat naṣṭa nāthasya vasoḥ vilumpakāt

original: BhP_01.18.044/3 parasparaṃ ghnanti śapanti vṛñjate paśūn striyo 'rthān purudasyavo janāḥ
analyzed: parasparam ghnanti śapanti vṛñjate paśūn striyaḥ rthān puru dasyavaḥ janāḥ

original: BhP_01.18.045/1 tadāryadharmaḥ pravilīyate nṛṇāṃ varṇāśramācārayutastrayīmayaḥ
analyzed: tadā ārya dharmaḥ pravilīyate nṛṇām varṇa āśrama ācāra yutaḥ trayī mayaḥ

original: BhP_01.18.045/3 tato 'rthakāmābhiniveśitātmanāṃ śunāṃ kapīnām iva varṇasaṅkaraḥ
analyzed: tatas ṛtha kāma abhiniveśita ātmanām śunām kapīnām iva varṇa saṅkaraḥ

original: BhP_01.18.046/1 dharmapālo narapatiḥ sa tu samrāḍbṛhacchravāḥ
analyzed: dharmapālaḥ narapatiḥ sa tu samrāj bṛhacchravāḥ

original: BhP_01.18.046/3 sākṣān mahābhāgavato rājarṣirhayamedhayāṭ
analyzed: sākṣāt mahā bhāgavataḥ rājarṣiḥ hayamedha yāj

original: BhP_01.18.046/5 kṣuttṛṭśramayuto dīno naivāsmac chāpam arhati
analyzed: kṣudh tṛṣ śrama yutaḥ dīnaḥ na eva asmat śāpam arhati

original: BhP_01.18.047/1 apāpeṣu svabhṛtyeṣu bālenāpakvabuddhinā
analyzed: apāpeṣu sva bhṛtyeṣu bālena apakva buddhinā

original: BhP_01.18.047/3 pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ tadbhagavān sarvātmā kṣantum arhati
analyzed: pāpam kṛtam tat bhagavān sarva ātmā kṣantum arhati

original: BhP_01.18.048/1 tiraskṛtā vipralabdhāḥ śaptāḥ kṣiptā hatā api
analyzed: tiraskṛtāḥ vipralabdhāḥ śaptāḥ kṣiptāḥ hatāḥ api

original: BhP_01.18.048/3 nāsya tat pratikurvanti tadbhaktāḥ prabhavo 'pi hi
analyzed: na asya tat pratikurvanti tad bhaktāḥ hi

original: BhP_01.18.049/1 iti putrakṛtāghena so 'nutapto mahāmuniḥ
analyzed: iti putra kṛta aghena saḥ mahā muniḥ

original: BhP_01.18.049/3 svayaṃ viprakṛto rājñā naivāghaṃ tadacintayat
analyzed: svayam viprakṛtaḥ rājñā na eva agham tat acintayat

original: BhP_01.18.050/1 prāyaśaḥ sādhavo loke parairdvandveṣu yojitāḥ
analyzed: prāyaśas sādhavaḥ loke paraiḥ dvandveṣu yojitāḥ

original: BhP_01.18.050/3 na vyathanti na hṛṣyanti yata ātmāguṇāśrayaḥ
analyzed: na vyathanti na hṛṣyanti yatas ātmā a guṇa āśrayaḥ

original: BhP_01.19.001/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.19.001/1 mahīpatistvatha tatkarma garhyaṃ vicintayann ātmakṛtaṃ sudurmanāḥ
analyzed: mahīpatiḥ tu atha tat karma garhyam vicintayan ātma kṛtam su durmanāḥ

original: BhP_01.19.001/3 aho mayā nīcam anāryavat kṛtaṃ nirāgasi brahmaṇi gūḍhatejasi
analyzed: aho mayā nīcam anārya vat kṛtam nirāgasi brahmaṇi gūḍha tejasi

original: BhP_01.19.002/1 dhruvaṃ tato me kṛtadevahelanād duratyayaṃ vyasanaṃ nātidīrghāt
analyzed: dhruvam tatas me kṛta deva helanāt duratyayam vyasanam na ati dīrghāt

original: BhP_01.19.002/3 tadastu kāmaṃ hyaghaniṣkṛtāya me yathā na kuryāṃ punarevam addhā
analyzed: tat astu kāmam hi agha niṣkṛtāya me yathā na kuryām punar evam addhā

original: BhP_01.19.003/1 adyaiva rājyaṃ balam ṛddhakośaṃ prakopitabrahmakulānalo me
analyzed: adyā eva rājyam balam ṛddha kośam prakopita brahma kula analaḥ me

original: BhP_01.19.003/3 dahatvabhadrasya punarna me 'bhūt pāpīyasī dhīrdvijadevagobhyaḥ
analyzed: dahatu abhadrasya punar na me bhūt pāpīyasī dhīḥ dvija deva gobhyaḥ

original: BhP_01.19.004/1 sa cintayann ittham athāśṛṇodyathā muneḥ sutokto nirṛtistakṣakākhyaḥ
analyzed: sa cintayan ittham atha aśṛṇot yathā muneḥ suta uktaḥ nirṛtiḥ takṣaka ākhyaḥ

original: BhP_01.19.004/3 sa sādhu mene na cireṇa takṣakā nalaṃ prasaktasya viraktikāraṇam
analyzed: sa sādhu mene na cireṇa takṣakāḥ nalam prasaktasya virakti kāraṇam

original: BhP_01.19.005/1 atho vihāyemam amuṃ ca lokaṃ vimarśitau heyatayā purastāt
analyzed: atho vihāya imam amum ca lokam vimarśitau heya tayā purastāt

original: BhP_01.19.005/3 kṛṣṇāṅghrisevām adhimanyamāna upāviśat prāyam amartyanadyām
analyzed: kṛṣṇa aṅghri sevām adhimanyamānaḥ upāviśat prāyam amartya nadyām

original: BhP_01.19.006/1 yā vai lasacchrītulasīvimiśra kṛṣṇāṅghrireṇvabhyadhikāmbunetrī
analyzed: yā vai lasat śrī tulasī vimiśra kṛṣṇa aṅghri reṇu abhyadhika ambu netrī

original: BhP_01.19.006/3 punāti lokān ubhayatra seśān kastāṃ na seveta mariṣyamāṇaḥ
analyzed: punāti lokān ubhayatra sa īśān kaḥ tām na seveta mariṣyamāṇaḥ

original: BhP_01.19.007/1 iti vyavacchidya sa pāṇḍaveyaḥ prāyopaveśaṃ prati viṣṇupadyām
analyzed: iti vyavacchidya sa pāṇḍaveyaḥ prāya upaveśam prati viṣṇupadyām

original: BhP_01.19.007/3 dadhau mukundāṅghrim ananyabhāvo munivrato muktasamastasaṅgaḥ
analyzed: mukunda aṅghrim ananya bhāvaḥ muni vrataḥ mukta samasta saṅgaḥ

original: BhP_01.19.008/1 tatropajagmurbhuvanaṃ punānā mahānubhāvā munayaḥ saśiṣyāḥ
analyzed: tatra upajagmuḥ bhuvanam punānāḥ mahā anubhāvāḥ munayaḥ sa śiṣyāḥ

original: BhP_01.19.008/3 prāyeṇa tīrthābhigamāpadeśaiḥ svayaṃ hi tīrthāni punanti santaḥ
analyzed: prāyeṇa tīrtha abhigama apadeśaiḥ svayam hi tīrthāni punanti santaḥ

original: BhP_01.19.009/1 atrirvasiṣṭhaścyavanaḥ śaradvān ariṣṭanemirbhṛguraṅgirāśca
analyzed: atriḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ cyavanaḥ śaradvān ariṣṭanemiḥ bhṛguḥ aṅgirāḥ ca

original: BhP_01.19.009/3 parāśaro gādhisuto 'tha rāma utathya indrapramadedhmavāhau
analyzed: parāśaraḥ gādhi sutaḥ tha rāmaḥ utathyaḥ indrapramada idhmavāhau

original: BhP_01.19.010/1 medhātithirdevala ārṣṭiṣeṇo bhāradvājo gautamaḥ pippalādaḥ
analyzed: medhātithiḥ devalaḥ ārṣṭiṣeṇaḥ bhāradvājaḥ gautamaḥ pippalādaḥ

original: BhP_01.19.010/3 maitreya aurvaḥ kavaṣaḥ kumbhayonir dvaipāyano bhagavān nāradaśca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ aurvaḥ kavaṣaḥ kumbhayoniḥ dvaipāyanaḥ bhagavān nāradaḥ ca

original: BhP_01.19.011/1 anye ca devarṣibrahmarṣivaryā rājarṣivaryā aruṇādayaśca
analyzed: anye ca devarṣi brahmarṣi varyāḥ rājarṣi varyāḥ aruṇa ādayaḥ ca

original: BhP_01.19.011/3 nānārṣeyapravarān sametān abhyarcya rājā śirasā vavande
analyzed: nānā ārṣeya pravarān sametān abhyarcya rājā śirasā vavande

original: BhP_01.19.012/1 sukhopaviṣṭeṣvatha teṣu bhūyaḥ kṛtapraṇāmaḥ svacikīrṣitaṃ yat
analyzed: sukha upaviṣṭeṣu atha teṣu bhūyas kṛta praṇāmaḥ sva cikīrṣitam yat

original: BhP_01.19.012/3 vijñāpayām āsa viviktacetā upasthito 'gre 'bhigṛhītapāṇiḥ
analyzed: vijñāpayām āsa vivikta cetāḥ upasthitaḥ gre

original: BhP_01.19.013/0 rājovāca
analyzed: rājā uvāca

original: BhP_01.19.013/1 aho vayaṃ dhanyatamā nṛpāṇāṃ mahattamānugrahaṇīyaśīlāḥ
analyzed: aho vayam dhanyatamāḥ nṛpāṇām mahattama anugrahaṇīya śīlāḥ

original: BhP_01.19.013/3 rājñāṃ kulaṃ brāhmaṇapādaśaucād dūrādvisṛṣṭaṃ bata garhyakarma
analyzed: rājñām kulam brāhmaṇa pāda śaucāt dūrāt visṛṣṭam bata garhya karma

original: BhP_01.19.014/1 tasyaiva me 'ghasya parāvareśo vyāsaktacittasya gṛheṣvabhīkṣṇam
analyzed: tasya eva me parāvara īśaḥ vyāsakta cittasya gṛheṣu abhīkṣṇam

original: BhP_01.19.014/3 nirvedamūlo dvijaśāparūpo yatra prasakto bhayam āśu dhatte
analyzed: nirveda mūlaḥ dvija śāpa rūpaḥ yatra prasaktaḥ bhayam āśu dhatte

original: BhP_01.19.015/1 taṃ mopayātaṃ pratiyantu viprā gaṅgā ca devī dhṛtacittam īśe
analyzed: tam mā upayātam pratiyantu viprāḥ gaṅgā ca devī dhṛta cittam īśe

original: BhP_01.19.015/3 dvijopasṛṣṭaḥ kuhakastakṣako vā daśatvalaṃ gāyata viṣṇugāthāḥ
analyzed: dvija upasṛṣṭaḥ kuhakaḥ takṣakaḥ vā daśatu alam gāyata viṣṇu gāthāḥ

original: BhP_01.19.016/1 punaśca bhūyādbhagavatyanante ratiḥ prasaṅgaśca tadāśrayeṣu
analyzed: punar ca bhūyāt bhagavati anante ratiḥ prasaṅgaḥ ca tad āśrayeṣu

original: BhP_01.19.016/3 mahatsu yāṃ yām upayāmi sṛṣṭiṃ maitryastu sarvatra namo dvijebhyaḥ
analyzed: mahatsu yām yām upayāmi sṛṣṭim maitrī astu sarvatra namaḥ dvijebhyaḥ

original: BhP_01.19.017/1 iti sma rājādhyavasāyayuktaḥ prācīnamūleṣu kuśeṣu dhīraḥ
analyzed: iti sma rājā adhyavasāya yuktaḥ prācīna mūleṣu kuśeṣu dhīraḥ

original: BhP_01.19.017/3 udaṅmukho dakṣiṇakūla āste samudrapatnyāḥ svasutanyastabhāraḥ
analyzed: udak mukhaḥ dakṣiṇa kūle āste samudrapatnyāḥ sva suta nyasta bhāraḥ

original: BhP_01.19.018/1 evaṃ ca tasmin naradevadeve prāyopaviṣṭe divi devasaṅghāḥ
analyzed: evam ca tasmin naradeva deve prāya upaviṣṭe divi deva saṅghāḥ

original: BhP_01.19.018/3 praśasya bhūmau vyakiran prasūnair mudā muhurdundubhayaśca neduḥ
analyzed: praśasya bhūmau vyakiran prasūnaiḥ mudā muhur dundubhayaḥ ca neduḥ

original: BhP_01.19.019/1 maharṣayo vai samupāgatā ye praśasya sādhvityanumodamānāḥ
analyzed: mahā ṛṣayaḥ vai samupāgatāḥ ye praśasya sādhu iti anumodamānāḥ

original: BhP_01.19.019/3 ūcuḥ prajānugrahaśīlasārā yaduttamaślokaguṇābhirūpam
analyzed: ūcuḥ prajā anugraha śīla sārāḥ yat uttamaśloka guṇa abhirūpam

original: BhP_01.19.020/1 na vā idaṃ rājarṣivarya citraṃ bhavatsu kṛṣṇaṃ samanuvrateṣu
analyzed: na vai idam rājarṣi varya citram bhavatsu kṛṣṇam samanuvrateṣu

original: BhP_01.19.020/3 ye 'dhyāsanaṃ rājakirīṭajuṣṭaṃ sadyo jahurbhagavatpārśvakāmāḥ
analyzed: ye dhyāsanam rāja kirīṭa juṣṭam sadyas jahuḥ bhagavat pārśva kāmāḥ

original: BhP_01.19.021/1 sarve vayaṃ tāvadihāsmahe 'tha kalevaraṃ yāvadasau vihāya
analyzed: sarve vayam tāvat iha āsmahe kalevaram yāvat asau vihāya

original: BhP_01.19.021/3 lokaṃ paraṃ virajaskaṃ viśokaṃ yāsyatyayaṃ bhāgavatapradhānaḥ
analyzed: lokam param virajaskam viśokam yāsyati ayam bhāgavata pradhānaḥ

original: BhP_01.19.022/1 āśrutya tadṛṣigaṇavacaḥ parīkṣit samaṃ madhucyudguru cāvyalīkam
analyzed: āśrutya tat ṛṣi gaṇa vacaḥ parīkṣit samam madhu cyut guru ca avyalīkam

original: BhP_01.19.022/3 ābhāṣatainān abhinandya yuktān śuśrūṣamāṇaścaritāni viṣṇoḥ
analyzed: ābhāṣata enān abhinandya yuktān śuśrūṣamāṇaḥ caritāni viṣṇoḥ

original: BhP_01.19.023/1 samāgatāḥ sarvata eva sarve vedā yathā mūrtidharāstripṛṣṭhe
analyzed: samāgatāḥ sarvatas eva sarve vedāḥ yathā mūrti dharāḥ tripṛṣṭhe

original: BhP_01.19.023/3 nehātha nāmutra ca kaścanārtha ṛte parānugraham ātmaśīlam
analyzed: na iha atha na amutra ca kaścana arthaḥ ṛte para anugraham ātma śīlam

original: BhP_01.19.024/1 tataśca vaḥ pṛcchyam imaṃ vipṛcche viśrabhya viprā iti kṛtyatāyām
analyzed: tatas ca vaḥ pṛcchyam imam vipṛcche viśrabhya viprāḥ iti kṛtya tāyām

original: BhP_01.19.024/3 sarvātmanā mriyamāṇaiśca kṛtyaṃ śuddhaṃ ca tatrāmṛśatābhiyuktāḥ
analyzed: sarva ātmanā mriyamāṇaiḥ ca kṛtyam śuddham ca tatra āmṛśata abhiyuktāḥ

original: BhP_01.19.025/1 tatrābhavadbhagavān vyāsaputro yadṛcchayā gām aṭamāno 'napekṣaḥ
analyzed: tatra abhavat bhagavān vyāsa putraḥ yadṛcchayā gām aṭamānaḥ napekṣaḥ

original: BhP_01.19.025/3 alakṣyaliṅgo nijalābhatuṣṭo vṛtaśca bālairavadhūtaveṣaḥ
analyzed: alakṣya liṅgaḥ nija lābha tuṣṭaḥ vṛtaḥ ca bālaiḥ avadhūta veṣaḥ

original: BhP_01.19.026/1 taṃ dvyaṣṭavarṣaṃ sukumārapāda karorubāhvaṃsakapolagātram
analyzed: tam dvi aṣṭa varṣam sukumāra pāda kara ūru bāhu aṃsa kapola gātram

original: BhP_01.19.026/3 cārvāyatākṣonnasatulyakarṇa subhrvānanaṃ kambusujātakaṇṭham
analyzed: cāru āyata akṣa unnasa tulya karṇa su bhrū ānanam kambu sujāta kaṇṭham

original: BhP_01.19.027/1 nigūḍhajatruṃ pṛthutuṅgavakṣasam āvartanābhiṃ valivalgūdaraṃ ca
analyzed: nigūḍha jatrum pṛthu tuṅga vakṣasam āvarta nābhim vali valgu udaram ca

original: BhP_01.19.027/3 digambaraṃ vaktravikīrṇakeśaṃ pralambabāhuṃ svamarottamābham
analyzed: digambaram vaktra vikīrṇa keśam pralamba bāhum su amara uttama ābham

original: BhP_01.19.028/1 śyāmaṃ sadāpīvyavayo'ṅgalakṣmyā strīṇāṃ manojñaṃ rucirasmitena
analyzed: śyāmam strīṇām manojñam rucira smitena

original: BhP_01.19.028/3 pratyutthitāste munayaḥ svāsanebhyas tallakṣaṇajñā api gūḍhavarcasam
analyzed: pratyutthitāḥ te munayaḥ sva āsanebhyaḥ tad lakṣaṇa jñāḥ api gūḍha varcasam

original: BhP_01.19.029/1 sa viṣṇurāto 'tithaya āgatāya tasmai saparyāṃ śirasājahāra
analyzed: sa viṣṇurāto tithaye āgatāya tasmai saparyām śirasā ājahāra

original: BhP_01.19.029/3 tato nivṛttā hyabudhāḥ striyo 'rbhakā mahāsane sopaviveśa pūjitaḥ
analyzed: tatas nivṛttāḥ hi abudhāḥ striyaḥ ṛbhakāḥ mahā āsane saḥ upaviveśa pūjitaḥ

original: BhP_01.19.030/1 sa saṃvṛtastatra mahān mahīyasāṃ brahmarṣirājarṣidevarṣisaṅghaiḥ
analyzed: sa saṃvṛtaḥ tatra mahān mahīyasām brahmarṣi rājarṣi devarṣi saṅghaiḥ

original: BhP_01.19.030/3 vyarocatālaṃ bhagavān yathendur graharkṣatārānikaraiḥ parītaḥ
analyzed: vyarocata alam bhagavān yathā induḥ graha ṛkṣa tārā nikaraiḥ parītaḥ

original: BhP_01.19.031/1 praśāntam āsīnam akuṇṭhamedhasaṃ muniṃ nṛpo bhāgavato 'bhyupetya
analyzed: praśāntam āsīnam akuṇṭha medhasam munim nṛpaḥ bhāgavataḥ bhyupetya

original: BhP_01.19.031/3 praṇamya mūrdhnāvahitaḥ kṛtāñjalir natvā girā sūnṛtayānvapṛcchat
analyzed: praṇamya mūrdhnā avahitaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ natvā girā sūnṛtayā anvapṛcchat

original: BhP_01.19.032/0 parīkṣiduvāca
analyzed: parīkṣit uvāca

original: BhP_01.19.032/1 aho adya vayaṃ brahman satsevyāḥ kṣatrabandhavaḥ
analyzed: aho adya vayam brahman sat sevyāḥ kṣatra bandhavaḥ

original: BhP_01.19.032/3 kṛpayātithirūpeṇa bhavadbhistīrthakāḥ kṛtāḥ
analyzed: kṛpayā atithi rūpeṇa bhavadbhiḥ tīrthakāḥ kṛtāḥ

original: BhP_01.19.033/1 yeṣāṃ saṃsmaraṇāt puṃsāṃ sadyaḥ śuddhyanti vai gṛhāḥ
analyzed: yeṣām saṃsmaraṇāt puṃsām sadyas śuddhyanti vai gṛhāḥ

original: BhP_01.19.033/3 kiṃ punardarśanasparśa pādaśaucāsanādibhiḥ
analyzed: kim punar darśana sparśa pāda śauca āsana ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_01.19.034/1 sānnidhyāt te mahāyogin pātakāni mahāntyapi
analyzed: sānnidhyāt te mahā yogin pātakāni mahānti api

original: BhP_01.19.034/3 sadyo naśyanti vai puṃsāṃ viṣṇoriva suretarāḥ
analyzed: sadyas naśyanti vai puṃsām viṣṇoḥ iva suretarāḥ

original: BhP_01.19.035/1 api me bhagavān prītaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ pāṇḍusutapriyaḥ
analyzed: api me bhagavān prītaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ pāṇḍu suta priyaḥ

original: BhP_01.19.035/3 paitṛṣvaseyaprītyarthaṃ tadgotrasyāttabāndhavaḥ
analyzed: paitṛṣvaseya prīti artham tad gotrasya ātta bāndhavaḥ

original: BhP_01.19.036/1 anyathā te 'vyaktagaterdarśanaṃ naḥ kathaṃ nṛṇām
analyzed: anyathā te vyakta gateḥ darśanam naḥ katham nṛṇām

original: BhP_01.19.036/3 nitarāṃ mriyamāṇānāṃ saṃsiddhasya vanīyasaḥ
analyzed: nitarām mriyamāṇānām saṃsiddhasya vanīyasaḥ

original: BhP_01.19.037/1 ataḥ pṛcchāmi saṃsiddhiṃ yogināṃ paramaṃ gurum
analyzed: atas pṛcchāmi saṃsiddhim yoginām paramam gurum

original: BhP_01.19.037/3 puruṣasyeha yat kāryaṃ mriyamāṇasya sarvathā
analyzed: puruṣasya iha yat kāryam mriyamāṇasya sarvathā

original: BhP_01.19.038/1 yac chrotavyam atho japyaṃ yat kartavyaṃ nṛbhiḥ prabho
analyzed: yat śrotavyam atho japyam yat kartavyam nṛbhiḥ prabho

original: BhP_01.19.038/3 smartavyaṃ bhajanīyaṃ vā brūhi yadvā viparyayam
analyzed: smartavyam bhajanīyam vā brūhi yat vā viparyayam

original: BhP_01.19.039/1 nūnaṃ bhagavato brahman gṛheṣu gṛhamedhinām
analyzed: nūnam bhagavataḥ brahman gṛheṣu gṛhamedhinām

original: BhP_01.19.039/3 na lakṣyate hyavasthānam api godohanaṃ kvacit
analyzed: na lakṣyate hi avasthānam api godohanam kvacid

original: BhP_01.19.040/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_01.19.040/1 evam ābhāṣitaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ sa rājñā ślakṣṇayā girā
analyzed: evam ābhāṣitaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ sa rājñā ślakṣṇayā girā

original: BhP_01.19.040/3 pratyabhāṣata dharmajño bhagavān bādarāyaṇiḥ
analyzed: pratyabhāṣata dharma jñaḥ bhagavān bādarāyaṇiḥ
